title: 1 Vuthela Icingo
content:
# 1 Vuthela Icingo

 Mlindi, vuthel’ icilongo,Xwayis’ abadukile;Lowoozway’ icilingo, Angaphenduk’ aphile.  
CHORUS:Vuthel’ icilongo, mlindiiNkos’ ithi; Vuthela…Li vuthelefuthi-futhi;Bonkebangasindiswa
Li khalis’ eziqogweni, Endaweningendawo;Ba solwandlememezani: Indaba yokuphila.  
Yimemezeendleleni, Yith’ “Into zilungile;”Ku semnyamaemhlabeni, uBab’ u silindile.
Batsheleabasindwayo, uJes’ u yabanxusa.U yashokwabamdingayo: “Wozaniniphiliswe.”

title: 2 Emnyango Impela
content:
# 2 Emnyango Impela

 Inkos’ ifikil’ emnyango, Eyathwal’ isiphambano;Manjeabalungileyo, Ba zobutwayiYo.  
CHORUS:Emnyango... Emnyango...  Inkosiifikil’ emnyango;Iyeza… yon’ iyeza… I sifikileemnyango.  
Iz’bonisoyonk’ im’nyaka, Zithi: sewukhonalapha;Si zobonamasinyane, Ohleziphakade  
Qaphelaniemhlabeni, Inhluphekoazipheli;Ku zofikauMsindisi, AfeuMkhohlisi.  
Khonaezwenielisha, Si zohlalasingabasha;Abafayobangabhubhi, Kubenaphakade.

title: 3  Ubuso Nobuso
content:
# 3  Ubuso Nobuso

 Ubusobuzobukana, NoKrestuuMsindisiNgizakuthab’ ukumbona uJesuong’uMfeli  
CHORUS:Ubusobuzobukana, NgaphesheyakwomkhathiUbusobuzobukana, NoJes’ ekupheleni.  
Laphang’ bona kalufifi, Ku khon’ okusithayo;Ngelang’ elingeluvivi, Ngobon’ Okhazim’layo  
Ngizojabul’ ukubona, Kon’ okungaziwayo;Konkekokhanyiswakhona, Ku phel’ okuhluphayo.  
Ubusobuzobukana, NaYeuMhlengiwami;Ngobukananjalomina, NaY’ uMsindisiwami

title: 4 U Yeza
content:
# 4 U Yeza

 Imnand’ indab’ endlebeniyesihambi, Esazulakudenekhaya!Ku seduzeabuyengodum’ uMhlengi; Masiny’ uMbus’ u fike.   
CHORUS:U yeza, u yeza, masinyane, U yez’ emhlabenilapha;Izihambizonazifumanise IkhayaloMsindisi.     
Bonke labo abakade ba ngcwatshwayo, Ba zovuka ekupheleni.Ye nabasolwandle olujulileyo; Ukuphila bokufumana.   
Kwelisha ilizwe si zohlanganiswa;   Si hub’ ingoma yobukhosiNabavela eNyakatho ba zokuza,  Ba khonz’ iNkosi yamakhosi.   
Haleluya, amen! Haleluya futhi; Ngokwethembeka sobakhona.Lindani, thembani, kube isikhathi; Umqhele sesowufumana.

title: 5 Kude Kangakanani eKhaya?
content:
# 5 Kude Kangakanani eKhaya?

 Ekhaya ku sekude na? Ngi buzil’ umlindi yena.Wath’ ub’ suku: Bu yaphela, Manje seku yasa.Ngakho: U ngabusakhala,  Kodwa, hamba u phalale;U zofik’ ezinsukwini, Ezingasapheli!    
Se ngi buzile ibutho, Ingoma yebutho ithi:Ngesibindi ngi zokulwa, Ngay’inkemba yodwaNgakho: U ngabusakhala, Empini bekezela-Umvuz’ u phiw’ ophumile, Nxa esenqobile.    
Ngi buzile into zonke, Zi sho ngazwi linye zonke;Isikhathi si yaphela, Ikhaya li vele. Ngakho: U ngabusakhala, Iziboniso zi yandaKonkana ku yabubula, Ku fun’ inkululo.    
Ekhaya a kusekude, Yeka! Umkhumbulo omhle;Thokoza ke wena mhambi, Sul’ izinyembezi.Ngakho: U ngabusukhala; Si zohlangana phambili,Izinhlupho zi phelile: Emzin’ othulile.

title: 6 Lindani, Bangcwele
content:
# 6 Lindani, Bangcwele

     Lindani, khaliphanini;  Bonani iziboniso,Kanyisani izibani; Ngob’ uJes’ u lusindiso
CHORUSU yeza! Jes’ u yeza! U yeza, u zangodumo!UJesu u zakubusa, U yeza ngosindiso!
    Isithembiso seNkosi; Umusa owathengwayo,Zon’ izembatho zegazi; Zi sitshel’ indaba yazo.
    Im’buso I yachitheka; Yizw’ amasond’ egedleza.Ngomsa owandile landa; Icilongo li mpempeza!
    Zoni, uKrest’ u yanxusa; KuYise u sanimelePhangisan’ u khon’ umusa; Angakathi; Ku phelile

title: 7 Nxa Efika
content:
# 7 Nxa Efika

      Nxa esefikile Yena Ukubuth’ imfuyoIligugu lakhe yona Ukuyifuya. 
 CHORUSNjengazo inkanyezi kukanya umqheleNgobuhle bayokhanya bakhazimule 
     U yakusibutha sonke Si ngamagug’ AkheSi yokhanya si bemhlophe, Si thandeke le! 
    Abantwana abancane, Ba thanda uMhlengiBa ligugu kuJehova; Owab’ uMenzi.

title: 8 Nxa Bebizwa Phezulu
content:
# 8 Nxa Bebizwa Phezulu

 Nxa icilongo li khala nesikhathi si dlula;Kofika usuku olumi njaloAbasindisiweyo ezweni ba zobuthana;Bebizwa phezulu ngi zobakhona    
CHORUSNxa sebe bizwa phezulu ( 3 times )Bebizwa phezulu ngi zobakhona    
Ngesikhathi esihle lapho sebevuswa bonkeBa zoba nesimo esisha bonkeAbakhethiweyo uma sebeqoqelwa khona;Bebizwa phezulu ngi zobakhona    
Ma si yisebenzele iNkosi lize li shone;Ngothando lweNkosi ma sitshelane,Si ngafa u zophela umsebenzi wethu laphaBebizwa phezulu ngi zobakhona.

title: 9 UJes’ U Yeza Futhi!
10 Buthanani Emfuleni
content:
# 10 Buthanani Emfuleni

        Sobuthana emfulweni, Kanye nezingilosiAmanz’ ephum’ es’Hlalweni; KuJehova, iNkosi    
CHORUSYebo! sobuthana khona, Emfulweni omuhle khona leNabangcwele sohlangana; Emfulwen’ ocwebile    
Khona ogwini lomfula, Sohamba si khulekaSi dumisa ngokuthula, Imihla yethu yonke    
Emfuleni wokukhanya, Si zolahla umthwaloNgomusa si zokhululwa, Samkele imiqhele    
Emfuleni ocwebile, Alusekho usizi;Inhliziyo zi thabile, Ngehubo elimnandi

title: 11 Ngi Zokulandela
content:
# 11 Ngi Zokulandela

       Ngokulandela, Msindisi, Kuzo zonk’ izinsizi;Laph’ u khona ngolandela, Yebo ngi zolandela   
 CHORUSNgokulandela, Msindisi, Wen’ owacith’ igaziNoma bonke bekudela, Ngomsa ngi zolandela   
       Noma indlel’ i nameva, Njengolwandle lugubhaWayihamba leyondlela, Ngako ngi zolandela   
       Nakuzo izinhlupheko, Noma ngi lingwa ngazo‘Nkosi walingwa impela,  Ngako ngi zolandela   
     U ngi hol’ ezinhlungwini, Nakhon’ ebupofwiniWahlushwa waze wadelwa, Noko ngokulandela   
     Nom’ iJordan’ ebilayo, I ngeyesabekayo;Loku wena wayiwela, Nami ngokulandela

title: 12 Ku Khona uMthombo
content:
# 12 Ku Khona uMthombo 

        Ku khon’ uMthombo wegazi Ovel’ eNkosini, Zonk’ izoni zi ngagezwa, Ngokuy’ eNkosiniZi ngahlanjululwa Ezonweni zazo, Zonke zi ngathethelwa Ebubini bazo    
Isela elalengayo, Lathab’ ukubona, Lowo ‘Mthombo ofunayo Ukugez’ aboniNoma ngi nezono, Ngi ngahlanjululwa, Kuwo uMthombo waboni, Ngi nga gezisiswa    
Yebo, Wundlu elafayo Si yabona Wena, Ibandl’ elasindiswayo Selomele WenaLi namandl’ igazi Ukugez’ izono, Ibandla li ngasindiswa Li zonde ukwona    
      ‘Nkosi u ngilungisele Indawo ekhaya, Noma-nje ngi ngafanele Wena wa ngifelaWongipha umvuzo Ngay’ impilo entsha, Wongipha njalo umvuzo Ngay’ impilo entsha    
       Ku khon’ isihlabelelo, Ngaso ngi babaza, Amandlayo insindiso, Seloku ngahlanzwaNgi vuk’ engcwabeni Ngobabaza Wena, Lu phinde kaning’ ulimi Lu dumisa Wena

title: 13 Mhlope Ku Neqhwa
content:
# 13 Mhlope Ku Neqhwa 

 O, ‘Nkosi ngi fisa ukuphelelaNgi thanda ukuba u hlale namiXebula wonke amaxhwala amiNgi gezisiswe ngaphezu kweliqhwa    
 CHORUSKu neliqhwa Ye! Ku neliqhwaNgi gezisiswe ngaphezu kweliqhwa!    
       ‘Jesu ngiqaphele u sezulwiniNgelekelel’ ukuphum’ ebubiniNgi yazinikela ngokupheleleNgi gezisiswe ngaphezu kweliqhwa    
       ‘Jesu ngi yakunxusa ngokuncengaNgi kulindel’ ezinyaweni zAkhoNgi zinikela nako enginakoNgi gezisiswe ngaphezu kweliqhwa!    
’Jesu ngi linda ngokubekezelaPhenduka inhliziyo iyakhalaKulowo, okufunayo kawaliNgi gezisiswe ngaphezu kweliqhwa!

title: 14 Yizwa imali Iwa!
content:
# 14 Yizwa imali Iwa!

 Yizw’ imal’ ithelwa, Lalel’ i yawa;Ngeka Jesu yonke, Ma iye kuYe    
CHORUSKhence! Khence! Khence! Khence!Yizwe ithelwa!Ngeka Jesu yonke, Ma iye kuYe    
Khence! Khence njalo; Nank’ umnikeloKuYo iNdodana; Wezinganyana    
Noko si zingane, Si leth’ intwanaNxase si khulile; Som’ pha kakhulu    
Nxa si ngenalutho, Somuph’ uthando; U yakuthokoza, Emomotheka

title: 15 UJes’ U Yangithanda!
content:
# 15 UJes’ U Yangithanda!

        UJes’ u yangithanda,  Ku sho uMbhalo wAkhe NgabAkhe nabantwana, U ngamandl’ abo bonke    
CHORUSU yangithanda, Yebo, uJesu;U yangithanda, Ngitshelwa uMbhalo    
uJes’ u yangithanda, NguYe owangifelaWafa ngenxa yothando, Izulu walivula    
       uJes’ u yangithanda, Nanxa ngi gula laphaNgi sosizini namhla, UJes’ u yangilinda    
uJes’ u yangithanda, Wohlal’ eduze nami;Phambili u zofika, Angiph’ umqhele nami

title: 16 Zinyawana Qaphelani
content:
# 16 Zinyawana Qaphelani

        Ngi gezil’ izandla, Ngazenza zabamhlopeuJesu ngamnika, Zi msebenzele kuhlwe    
CHORUSNina, ‘zinyawana, Qaphelani bo!Lapho ning’sa khona, Kube kuJesu    
       Ngi tshel’ izindlebe,  Zizwe-ke, yonk’ imihlaUmsebenzi wonke, Ongenziwa yizandhla    
       Amehl’ alindile, Lapho zi qonde khonaNgi ngaze ngi gange, Bes’ uJesu ngi mona

title: 17 Luthando Olusithabisayo
content:
# 17 Luthando Olusithabisayo

        Si yathaba ngothando, Lu yasithabisa;Lu senza sibe nenqgondo, Kwabanye umusa    
CHORUS Inkos’ i thanda bonk’ abaYo, Si fis’ ukuba njengaYo;Si yathaba ngothando, Lu yasithabisa;Lu senza sibe nenqgondo, Kwabanye umusa    
       Ku khon’ usizi lapha;Ukufa nezono Ngokuthoba si ngazama, Si zuze umoni    
Ekupheleni lapha, Ebuya uJesu;Sohlabelela ingoma, Yothand’ olukhulu

title: 18 Mabutho ka Krestu Phambili
content:
# 18 Mabutho ka Krestu Phambili

        Mabutho ka Krestu, Hlomani nonke;Nilwe noSathani, Isitha kini.Nang’ uMholi wethu, NguYe uKrestu‘Nkosi yamakhosi, NguYe uMnqobi    
 CHORUSPambili Mabutho, Yanin’ empiniNang’ uJes’ uMholi, Ma ni mlandele    
Bhekhanini ‘bandla, Ithuthumela;Impi ka Sathani, Hlabelelani;I yesab’ uJesu, U zoyicitha!Ngezwi lokunqoba, I yokwahlulwa    
Hambisan’ okwempi, ‘Bandla leNkosi;Ma si balingise, AbanqobileNoko sahlukene, Si semi kanye;Lon’ ithemba lethu, Linye kuKrestu    
Amakhos’ omhlaba, Wonk’ a yabhubhaKeph’ iBandla lethu, Limi kuKrestu;Qhabo! A lahlulwa, Ngeke ladlulaWathembis’ uKrestu, Ng’ uMlawuli wethu    
Hlanganani bantu, Nebandla lethuVumanini nonke, Si bandla linyeIngoma yodumo, YeNkos’ uqoboZi dumise nathi, Nezingelosi

title: 19 Hlala U Lindile
content:
# 19 Hlala U Lindile

        O! mphefumlo wami, Hlala ulindileiNkosi ngamandhla ami, Noma se ngi wile    
O! lind’ u khuleke, Uze u dle ifaNgibonis’ iqiniso-ke, Nokuphil’ okusha    
O! yilwa nomlingi, Ngiphathise JesuNgi zoboph’ izinkalo nqi, Ngi qonde pezulu

title: 20 Vuka Khuthala Moya Wam
content:
# 20 Vuka Khuthala Moya Wam

        Izwi lika Nkulunkulu, ElikubizayoLi nomvuzo wakoMkhulu, Ku y’okhutheleyo    
Efwini lawofakazi, Konke kus’ obalaKhohlwa indlele eyize, U qonde phezulu    
uMsindisi, nguMqalisi, Walo loluhamboSobheka ezinyaweni, Owethu umvuzo

title: 21 Ngi Yeza eSiphambanweni
content:
# 21 Ngi Yeza eSiphambanweni

 Ngi yeza Nkosi yami, Ngi yimpuputhe minaNgi nikela okwami, KuWe ongangigcina    
 CHORUSNgi yeza Nkosi yami, KuWe Msindisi wamiNgi cela Menzi wami, Ak’ungamkele nami    
Umoya uyakhala, Ku bus’ okubi kimiuJes’ u thi lalela, Ngosusa konk’ okubi    
Konke ngi kunikela, Kanye nomoya wamiNgibe ngowAk’ impela, Kuze kube nanini    
Ngi z’esiphambanweni, Igazi lang’ophelaNgi zilahl’ othulini, NoKrestu ngi bethelwe    
Jesu woz’ ungamkhele, U ng’ enze ngi pheleleNgi bengohlanzekile, Dumo! kulo iWundlu

title: 22 Nami Futhi
content:
# 22 Nami Futhi

 Vuma, vuma ‘Nkosi yami, U be ukulunga kwam’;Themba ma u hlale nami, U phas’ imizamo yam’.
CHORUS‘Nkosi yam’, ‘Nkosi yam’,U phas’ imizamo yam’
Ma u ngizwe, ‘Nkosi yami, U ng’enzel’ umusa nam’.Sength’ ukuhamba kwami, U ngangiqondisa nam’
CHORUS‘Nkosi yam’, ‘Nkosi yam’,U ngangiqondisa nam’
Sekukade ngi ng’umoni, Kade ngi ngakuboniKwanga ngi ngaphiw’ ubomi, Xolela lesi ‘soni
CHORUS‘Nkosi yam’, ‘Nkosi yam’,Xolela lesi soni
Mninimandl’ osezulwini, Ngi kiph’ ezinsiziniNgi sindise ekoneni, Ngithembel’ eNkosini.
CHORUS‘Nkosi yam’, ‘Nkosi yam’,Ngithembel’ eNkosini

title: 23 Ngi Gcwalise Manje
content:
# 23 Ngi Gcwalise Manje

        Ngi gcwalise oMkhululi, NgoMoya oiNgcwele U nguMhlobo wethu, Mfeli Woza, woz’ u zakhele    
CHORUS Moya oiNgcwele Mina ngi kunxaneleManjena ngi gcwalise Wena Moya woMsindisi    
U ngangigcwalisa Wena, Indlela u yayaziNgi yakuswela-ke mina, Ngothando ngi gcwalise    
Mina ngi buthakathaka, Enyaweni ngoguqaNguWena wedw’ onamandla, Ngi size ngi yashona    
       Wena Moy’ u yaduduza, Inhliziy’ ediniweThina bantu si yafisa, U ze u sigcwalise

title: 24 Ngi Kufisa Izikhathi Zonke
content:
# 24 Ngi Kufisa Izikhathi Zonke

 Ngi yakufisa nje, Ngcwele-NgcweleAkukh’ ongangipha, Ukuthula    
CHORUSNgi yakufisa, Nkosi Izikhathi zonkeNgi busise, Msindisi, Ngi ze kuWe    
Ngi yakufisa nje, Hlala namiNgi ngeke ngahlulwe, Nxa u nami    
Ngi yakufisa nje, EnhlungwiniWoza masinyane, Hlala nami    
       Ngi yakufisa nje, Ngi fundiseIz’thembiso zonke, Uz’ u ngipe    
       Ngi yakufisa nje, Wen’ oNgcweleMangibe njengaWe, ‘Nkosi enhle

title: 25 Ngi Kunekela Konke
content:
# 25 Ngi Kunekela Konke

 Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu, Ngi nikela ngesihleNgi zothemba njalo kuYe, Ngi phile naYe lapha    
 CHORUS Ngi yanikela... Ngi yanikela...(Ngi yanikela)    (Ngi yanikela)Konke kuYe uMsindisi, Ngi yakushiya    
Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu,  Ngi guq’ ezinyaweniNgi del’ inzuzo yomhlaba, Ng’thatha Jesu ngi thathe    
Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu, Ng’enze ngcwele, MsindisiNgi phe owAkho uMoya, U be ngowam’impela    
Ngi nikela konk’ uJesu, Ngi zwa umlil’ oNgcweleNgenjabulo yensindiso,  Makube kuY’ udumo

title: 26 Ngi Nje
content:
# 26 Ngi Nje

 Ngi nje Nkosi, ngi za ngi nje, Yileli ilizwi lamiNgoba wangifela nami, Mvana yeNkosi ngi yeza     
Ngi nje Nkosi, ngi za ngi nje, Ngi ngesus’ icala lamiNgohlanzwa ngegazi nami, Mvana yeNkosi ngi yeza     
Ngi nje Nkosi, ngi za ngo nje, Ngi sempini yenhuphekoNgaphakathi nangaphandle, Mvana yeNkosi ngi yeza     
Ngi nje Nkosi, ngi za ngi nje, Ngi mpofu ngi yimpumputheKonke mangiphiwe nguWe, Mvana yeNkosi ngi yeza     
Ngi nje Nkosi, ngi za ngi nje, Ngi hlanzw’ inhliziyo yamiNgi gezeke, ngi bemhlophe, Mvana yeNkosi ngi yeza     
Ngi nje Nkosi, ngi za ngi nje, Uthando lu ngi nqobileLu ngi thabis’ inhliziyo, Mvana yeNkosi ngi yeza

title: 27 Si Vuselele Futhi
content:
# 27 Si Vuselele Futhi

        Si bong’ iNkosi, ngaYo iNdodanaYen’ uJesu osifeleyo thina     
 CHORUSAleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! AmenAleluya! Aleluya! Si vuse futhi!     
Si bonga Nkosi, NgaY’ uMoya wAkhoOsibonise uMsindisi ngaWo     
Akudunyiswe, lona lelo WundluElathwala izono zonke zethu     
Udumo lonke, lube kuWe, NkosiWena wasithenga ngoaWkho umusa     
Si vuselele ngal’ uthando lwAkhoNemiphefumlo mayivuswe njalo

title: 28 Yiba Nesineke Uze U Be Ngcwele
content:
# 28 Yiba Nesineke Uze U Be Ngcwele

        Yiba nesineke, sokukhulumaNaYe uMkhululi, kuY’ u ngeyamaYiba nobuhlobo nokululamaU-kuqondis’ izoni kuY’ iMvana   
Yiba nesineke emsebenziniEsokukhuleka laph’ elizweniNxa ku hlal’ uJesu enhiziyweniWozuz’ ukuthula laph’ emhlabeni     
Yiba nesineke sokusondelaKuYe uMsindisi, u zolandelaEkujabuleni wokuholelaNanxa ekhuluma u bolalela     
Yiba nesineke, thula u thi du!Yen’ u yakuthela ngokwaphezuluuMoy’ oiNgcwele u ng’uFakaziKa Jes’ uMsindisi, nguYen’ uMsizi

title: 29 Hlala Nami
content:
# 29 Hlala Nami

        Ku yeza ukuhlwa, hlala nami, U zuhlale nami, sekuyahlwaLapho abanye sebehluleka, Wena osizayo, hlala nami     
Ku shesh’ ukudlula ukuphila, Ubuhle bomhlaba buphi bona?Izinto zonke zi yaphenduka, Ongaphendukiyo hlala nami     
Ngi yakucela u hlale nami, U ngekho ngohlulwa yizilingoU ngezi ‘Nkosi, njengodlulayo, Kodwa ‘Nkosi yami, hlala nami     
Owahlala kade, hlala nami, Ungabongishiya nakancaneBekezel’ ububi bami bonke, Yiza-ke u zozakhela kimi     
Inhlupheko azinani kimi, Ang’esabi, nxa u khona WenaLu ngaphi u donsi lwakho kufa?, Ngi zokwahlula ngoba u nami

title: 30 Ukuhwalala
content:
# 30 Ukuhwalala

 Ilanga li yashona, Izulu li yasithaLinda u zukhuleke, Nxa ukukhanya kuthe Kwafiphala!     
 CHORUSNgcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! KuJehova!Umhlaba nezulu le, Ku yabonga uBaba uSomandla     
‘Nkosi, yokuphila kwam’, Izulu likhaya lam’Si buthe si yadinga, Umbuso wokulinga Oseduze!     
Ukuhlwa ku sondele, Ngomsa si haukeleUbuso nobukhosi, Ku sithwe zinkanyezi U yiNgcwele!     
Lapho si ngasaboni, Ubusuku neminiNazo izingelosi, Zi tusa ubukhosi Bu ka Jesu

title: 31 Langa Lomphefumlo Wami
content:
# 31 Langa Lomphefumlo Wami

 ‘Langa lomphefumlo wami, Msindisi othandekayoMakungafiki iyezi, Kuwe elingasithayo     
Nasekulaleni kwami, Nenkophe zi cimezileNgi ngaphumula kamnandi, Phezu kwaAkho ngeyamile     
Nanxa kuhlwa, nanxa kusa, Ngi yeluswa nguWe wedwaHlala nami, Wena Ndonsa, Ngi ngephile nxa ngi ngedwa     
Ngi saqala ukuvuka, Ngi busise ekuseniUkuze ngothando lwAkho, Ngi yofika ezulwini

title: 32 Isiphephelo Ngesikhati Sesiphepho
content:
# 32 Isiphephelo Ngesikhati Sesiphepho

     Inkos’ I liDwala lethu, I yisiphephelo sethuInqaba noMthunzi wethu, I yisiphephelo sethu 
 CHORUSLi Dwala... elinamandla, Ng’uMthunzi… owalomhlaba; Ng’uMholi... wethu impela, U yiSiphephelo sethu 
    uJesu nguMthunzi wethu, U yiSiphephelo sethu       As’esabi, u ngowethu, U yiSiphephelo sethu 
    Nxa si hanqwa impopoma, U yiSiphephelo sethu       Si huba yona ingoma, U yiSiphephelo sethu 
    Inqaba neDwala lethu, U yiSiphephelo sethu       Hlal’ eduze Msizi wethu, U yiSiphephelo sethu

title: 33 U Yangihola
content:
# 33 U Yangihola

     uJesu u yangihola, NgawAkh’ amazwi omusaKuko konk’ engikwenzayo, uJesu u yangihola 
 CHORUSU yangihola uJesu, Ngesandla sAkhe impelaNgi zakumlandela mina, uJesu u yangihola 
    Noma ku mnyama kuthe tsu! Nakuzo izikhukulaMina angesabi lutho, uJesu u yangihola 
    Angisoli, angikhali, ‘Nkosi, ngi zoqiniselaKuko konke ngiyathaba, uJesu u yangihola 
    Nxas’ uphelil’ umsebenzi, NgoJesu se ngi nqobile Angiyikwesab’ ukufa, Nas, eJordan’ wongihola

title: 34 Kuhle Moya Wami
content:
# 34 Kuhle Moya Wami

     Ngi nokuthula okunjengomfula, Nxa ngi nosiz’ olukhuluU ngi fundisile mina ukuthi, Kuhle-ke, kuhle, moya wami 
 CHORUSKuhle-ke... moya wam’Kuhle-ke, kuhle, moya wami 
    Nanxa-ke uSatani engihlupha, Ngaloku nje, ngi zonqobaNgokuba uJesu ng’uMsizi wami, Wacith’ igazi lAkhe ngami 
    Umcabango omuhle yilowo-ke, Iz’phosiso zami zonkeU zibethele esiphambanweni, Bonga iNkosi moya wami 
    ‘Nkosi lolosuku maluphangiswe, Amayezi azogoqwaLi khal’ icilongo, yehle iNkosi, Njalo-ke, kuhle moya wami

title: 35 Yeka Ubudlelwano
content:
# 35 Yeka Ubudlelwano

 Yek’ubudlelwano bu ka Jesu!, Oseyamise’ ezingalweniIzibusiso zona zi nkulu,  Nxa weyama kuY’ engalweni     
CHORUSYa ... ma, ya ... ma U sinde ekwesabeniYa ... ma, ya ... ma Eyama kuY’ezingalweni     
O, ku mnandi, ukuba ngumhambi, Mangeyam’ engalweni y’AkheIndlela i yakhanya kumhambi, Nxas’ eyam’ engalweni yAkhe     
Ngi ngesabani? Ngi ngesabani?, Se ngi nokuthula okuhleNanxa ngi fika ekulingweni, Ngoyama engalweni yAkhe

title: 36 Inkolo Yami I Bheka Phezulu
content:
# 36 Inkolo Yami I Bheka Phezulu

 Ngi yabheka kuWe,U ngi hlawuleleNkosi yami,Kaloku ma uzwe,Ngi khuleka kuWeU ngi thukulule,Ezonweni     
Ingathi umusa,U ngangiqinisaNgi kukhonze,Vus’ uthando lwami,Wena, Nkosi, yamiNgako konk’ okwami,Ngi kukhonze     
Nxa ku mnyama kimi,Ni bona usiziOlunzimaNgi phelekezele,U xosh’ ubumnyamaUkuze ngi fike, Ezulwini

title: 37 Eduze, Nkosi Yami, kuWe
content:
# 37 Eduze, Nkosi Yami, kuWe

        Eduze, Nkosi yam’ ‘duze kuWe! Nom’ isiphambano ngi sithweleYon’ ingoma yami, lapha yoba yile;  Eduze, Nkosi yam’, ‘duze kuWe!     
Noma mina ngi njengesihambi, Itshe li be umqamelo wamiKodw’ amaphupho am’ yila njalo athi; Eduze, Nkosi, yam’, ‘duze kuWe!     
Indlela yami i khanya kahle-U thumela ngomsa kimi konkeNengelosi zAkho zona zi ngi hole;  Eduze, Nkosi yam’, ‘duze kuWe!     
Ngokubonga ngomcabango wami, Osizini lwami olubanziNjalw’ enhluphekweni ngohlabela ngithi; Eduze, Nkosi yam’, ‘duze kuWe!     
Lapha se ngi phaphela phezulu, Se ngi dlule ilanga nenyangaNgohlabel’ ingoma, ngi bheke phezulu; Eduze, Nkosi yam’, ‘duze kuWe!

title: 38 Yima Edwaleni
content:
# 38 Yima Edwaleni

     Qinisela kuBaba ezweni, Naphakathi kwesiphithiphithi,iDwala kuphel’ elinamandla, Ekulweni nesitha. 
 CHORUS Ma sim’ eDwaleni,Si qin’ eDwaleniPhezulu ku ka Krestu; Uma si nganqoba,Si yophephela,Esixukwini phezulu. 
    Qinisela ngokulungileyo, Ingesab’ okubi inhliziyo,uKrestu kuphela oyosiza, Izoni zonke lapha 
    Qinisel’ eqinisweni lonke, Noma li nzima lodlula konkeYiDwala kiphela elosiza, Kuyo yonk’ imisinga

title: 39 ’Dwala Eliqinileyo
content:
# 39 ’Dwala Eliqinileyo

     uJesu li Dwala lami, NguYe uSindiso lwamiNgi ngeze ngathemb’ okwami, Ngophaswa yiDwala lami 
 CHORUSuJesu Krestu liDwalaKonk’ okunye ku zodlulaKonk’ okunye ku zodlula 
    Nobumnyama bu phambi kwam’, Ma ngi ngozeli, Themba lam’Nez’phepho endleleni yam’ Ma ngi ngalahl’ inkolo yam’ 
    Isifungo si qinile, Kulabo abamthembileNanxa mina ngi dangele, uJesu ngi samthembile 
    Nxa ku khala’ itilongo, KuYena ngi khuphukeleNgi gqokiswe ngobungcwele, Es’ godlweni ngi yovela

title: 40 Themba Nilalele
content:
# 40 Themba Nilalele

 Nxa si yilandela, iNkosi ngempelaKu zokhany’ endleleni yethuSi lalel’ uKrestu, Si be naYe laphaUma si muzwa, si mhlonipha     
 CHORUSLalelani! Akukho okunyeOkuthabis’ iNkosi, Um’ i ngelalelwe     
Akukho thunzana, Akukho yezanaKu xoshwa ukumomothekaAku ngesabeke, Asinge bubuleUma si muzwa, si mhlonipa     
     Akukho bunzima, Akukho bulimaYena angebususe kithiuMsindisi wethu, Konke ku ngehlupheUma si muzwa, si mhlonipha     
Namhla si ngebone, Uthando lu khonaNxa si beka konk’ elathiniZi gqitshwe izono, Asiph’ ukwethabaUma si muzwa, si mhlonopha     
       Ngakukudlelana, NangokuthandanaSohamb’ endleleni si ngezwaOkuhle si kwenze, Si mlandele naphiUma si muzwa, si mhlonipha

title: 41 Inkosi Ibe Nawe
content:
# 41 Inkosi Ibe Nawe

 Inkosi ize ibe nawe; I ku qondis’ amasangoI ku biyele ngothando, Size si phinde si bonane
CHORUSSize si ... hlangane, Phambili ku ka JesuSize si ... hlangane,Si phinde si hlangane futhi
Inkosi ize ibe nawe, I ku londoloze kahleI kondle njalo ngokudla, Size si phinde si bonane
Inkosi ize ibe nawe; Nxa u s’ekuhluphekeniI ku gon’ ezingalweni, Size si phinde si bonane
Inkosi ize ibe nawe; I ku donsel’ othandweniI ku sindis’ ekufeni, Size si phinde si bonane

title: 42 Asisoze Si Valelise!
content:
# 42 Asisoze Si Valelise!

 Nxa si hlangana nezihlobo, Ku khon’ ukwethabaKu lethel’ usizi oqobo, Nxase s’ehlukana
CHORUSEzulwin’ akwehlukanwa, AkuvaleliswaKu lelo lizwe elihle, Kwakh’ abalungile
Si yajabula nxa si bona, Abakithi laphaKodwa si sakhalela lona, Izwe lokwethaba
Amazwi a thi: "Sala kahle!" Phind’ awakhulunywa;Kodwa ingoma ezingcwele, Zi yahlatshelelwa

title: 43 Lele KuJesu
content:
# 43 Lele KuJesu

 U lele kuJesu yena,Lapha ku ngakhalwa khona;U thol’ ubuthongo yena,Angevuswe kubo yena.
U lele kuJesu kahle,U lele njal’ elindile;Yen’ ekholwa ebhekile,Lelo themba elingcwele.
U lele kuJesu – thula!U zolala ngokuphumla;U namandla uMsindisi,Ukumvus’ ekupheleni
U lele kuJes’ iNkosi,U yovuswa ng’uMsindisi;Ka salesabi iliba,uMphilisi wolivula

title: 44 Umsindisi Wami Kuqala
content:
# 44 Umsindisi Wami Kuqala

        Nxa umsebenzi wami u suphelile lapha,Nalomzimba wembeswe ukungafi;Ngi zomazi uMsindisi wami ngaphesheya,U zakungithokozelela ngefa.
CHORUSNgi zoma ... zi ngi zomazi, Mina ngi zakum’ eduze kwAkhe Ngi zoma ... zi ngi zomazi, Ngamanxeb’ ezandleni zAkhe.
Wo! Ukwethaba kwami nxa ngi mbona ngobuso,Neliso elinomusa kimina;Inhliziyo yami I zakumbonga ngothando,Olungilungiseleyo ikhaya.
Wo! Ngokukhumbula-ke, ngabakade ba shona,Nokuvalelisa kweth’ ethuneni;Khona eEdeni asisoze sahlukana,Kodwa ngi fis’ ukumbon’ uMsindisi.
       Ngi zongen’ emzini ngezimhlophe izingubo,A ngi selapho kungakhalwa khona;Ngi zakuhlabel’ ingoma yabasindisweyo,Ngize ngi bone uMsindisi khona.

title: 45 Ngi Phe iBhaibhele
content:
# 45 Ngi Phe iBhaibhele

 Ngi ph’ iBhaibhele elikhanyisayo, Kuze ku thokozisw’ ohambayoAkukho ‘lifu elingasisitha, KuJes’ oweza kusisindisa
CHORUSNgi ph’ iBhaibhele ‘sithunyw’ esingcwele Lize nami li ngi khanyiseleIzithembiso nothando ndawonye, Ku zohlala phakade ku kunye
Ngi ph’ iBhaibhele nxa ku khon’ usizi, Nanxa umoya wami u pansiNgi ph’amazwi a khulunywa nguJesu, Kuze ku bonw ‘uMkhululi wethu
Ngi ph’ iBhaibhele ekhanyis’ indlela  Lize li bonis’ ingozi laphaLi yisiban’ esikhanyisa kahle;  Ukuze ngi mbone ngi mlandele
Ngi ph’iBhaibhele yiso isibane  Ozosiphakamis’ elibeniLi nokukhanyisa kwasezulwini, Naphesheya kwalo iJordani

title: 46 Amazwi Amangalisay’
content:
# 46 Amazwi Amangalisay’

 Phinda u ngi hlabelele, Amazw’ okuphila;Ma ngi bon’ ubuhle bawo, Amazw’ okuphila;Ngamazwi omusa, A yangifundisa
CHORUSNgamazwi amahle wona, A yamangalisa;Ngamazwi amahle wona, A yamangalisa.
       uJesu wabapha bonke, Amazw’ okuphila;Soni, u yabizwa, yizwa amazw’ okuphila.Saphiwa ngesihle, a sisa kuJesu
Ba tshele abantu bonke, amazw’ okuphila;A leth’ ukuthula wona, NgoJes’ uMsindisi;U yahlambulula Inhliziyo zethu

title: 47 Udonga Lwas’ eJordani
content:
# 47 Udonga Lwas’ eJordani

        Ngi yakuma eJordani, Nangaphesheya le!Ngi pons’ iso lami kulo, Izwe laseKhenan
 CHORUSSi zophumula ezweni elihle ..., Se ku yisikhashanyana nje ...,Si hube ingoma ka Mosi neWundlu; Sibe noJesu phakade.
Emagcekeni amahle, A khanya kuphelauJesu ilanga lethu U xosh’ ubusuku
Ngofika nini phezulu, Ngize ngi busiswe!Ng’ombona nini uBaba, Ngi phuml’ eMbusweni!
I thabile inhliziyo, Ngoba ngi yahamba;Noma ngi hanqiwe mina, Ngesibindi ngoya!

title: 48 Thokoza Phambili
content:
# 48 Thokoza Phambili

 Ekupheleni sothokoza, Se si buthana ekhaya;Si leth’ izithungu zethu, eJerusalem’ eNtsha.
 CHORUSTho...ko...za, thoko-thokoza, Tho…ko…za, thoko-thokozaKu… nge phel’ ukuthokoza Ngob’ usuku buyeza.
Ingoma za khona zi mnandi, Si yobonga si ngathuli;S’dums’ iNkosi kamnandi, eJerusalem’ eNtsha.
Ku si lindele ukwethaba, Izindlu zi ningi khona;Zi lungiswe nguY’ uJesu, eJerusalem’ eNtsha.

title: 49 Yinye Inkumbul’ Emnandi
content:
# 49 Yinye Inkumbul’ Emnandi

 Inkumbul’ emnandi, I yabuya kimi;Ngi sondel’ ekhaya lami, Ku nokoqala.
 CHORUSNgi sondel’ ekhaya lami;Ngi sondel’ ekhaya namhlaKu nokokuqala.
       Eduze k’uBaba, Ezindlini zAkhe;Ku seduze nesiHlalo, Sobukhosi bAkhe.
Ku duze ngi hambe, Ngi lahle im’thwalo;Ngi shiy’ inhlupheko lapha, Ng’amukel’ umqhele.

title: 50 Ku Khona Izwe Elihle
content:
# 50 Ku Khona Izwe Elihle

 Li khon’ izwe elihl’ impela,  Se si bon’ ukukhanya kwalo;uBaba wethu u khona le,  U yasakhela izindlu ke.
 CHORUSKhona le... Pambili... Sobuthen’ ezweni elihle...Khona le... Pambili... Sobuthen’ ezweni elihle...
Si zohlabel’ ezwen’elihle, Ingoma yeNkosi yakhona;Inhliziy’ asoze zakhala, Ezweni lelo lokuphumla.
       KuBaba wethu ophezulu; Si zohlokomisa ngodumo;Ngale ‘Sipho esing’ uJesu, Imhla yonk’ abe Sibusiso.

title: 51 Si Bhaphathize Busha
content:
# 51 Si Bhaphathize Busha

 Si bhaphathize ngamandla Akho Ngothando si vuse, Jesu ngokwAkho
 CHORUSSi yakhuleka, Nkosi si yancenga!Ngothando, ngoMoya, si bhaphathize
 A si fanele, O! si nensilaNkosi ma si gezwe, kokubi konke
 We, juba lami, Yehlela lapha!Si yakuncenga, Mana eduze
Lalel’ ilizwi!, lasezulwini U thandeka kimi, Ngi yajabula

title: 52 Woza Mthombo
content:
# 52 Woza Mthombo

     Woza, Mthombo wez’ busiso, Wena wokudunyiswa;Imifula eyomusa, I fanel’ ukubongwa;Ngi fundis’ ukuhlonipha, Umusa wAkho kimi;Eyam’ inhiziyo y’ophe, Ngothando lwAkho kimi.    
     Mina ngi zozifunela, Ilitshe lokuphepha;     Ngomsa wAkho ngothembela, Ekufiken’ ekhaya;     uJesu wangingenisa, Emhlambini owAkhe     Engozini ngasindiswa, Ngalo igazi lAkhe.    
    Ngi necala elikhulu, Ngomusa owangipha;    Vumel’ ukulunga Krestu, Ku ngi buyise namhla;    ‘Nkosi, ngi ses’ebubini, Ngi thoba phambi kwakho;    Nansi inhliziyo yami, Beka uphawu lwAkho.

title: 53 Moya oNgcwele, Mholi oThembekayo
content:
# 53 Moya oNgcwele, Mholi oThembekayo

    Wena Moy’ oiNgcwele, Seku kad’ u lindile,Ngesandla ma ngi holwe,  Mina mhambi ehlane;Okhathele a bonge Izwi loduduzayo;Nyenyeza, "Mhambi woza, Ngokuqondis’ ekhaya"    
     Mhlobo Wen’ osizayo, U yathand’ ozamayo,U ngasishiyi lapha, Kakhulu si yesaba, Nxa izulu liduma, NgakuWe, ngokweyama;Nyenyeza, "Mhambi woza, Ngokuqondis’ ekhaya"    
     Nkosi yethu enkulu, Si qondise phezulu,Ngokukhuleka kwethu, Noma amabiz’ ethu;A khon’ ezulwini na? Izwi li yaphendula:"Mhambi, mhambi, woza la, Ngokuqondis’ ekhaya"

title: 54 Inhliziyo Ehlanziweyo
content:
# 54 Inhliziyo Ehlanziweyo 

     Into engiyifisayo,  Indlela yam’eqondile;Nezilingo zi yashisa, Ng’hlambulule, ng’hlambulule.    
 CHORUSNgi hlambulule phakathi, Noma ngomlilo ngovuma;Noma ku njani, Angali Isono ma sif’ impela.    
    Nxa ngi bona ukukhanya, Ngi yathaba emoyeni;Ngi fun’ inhliziyo entsha Kuhle kimi, kuhle kimi.    
     Ngi fis’ ukudel’ okubi, Ngi nomthwalo, se ngi file;Ubuhle kimina buphi? Ngi ngcolile, ngi ngcolile.    
     Uma kuthe lenhliziyo, Ya thand’ ukukulandela;Ng’enze ngibe ngophilayo Ngibe ngcwele, ngibe ngcwele.

title: 55  U-ke Waya KuJesu Na?
content:
# 55  U-ke Waya KuJesu Na?

 U-ke waya kuJesu wahlanziswa? U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu?U yawuthemba umusa wAkhe na? U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu?
 CHORUSU mhlope... Njengeqhwa...?  U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu?  Inhliziyo yakh’ imhlophe njengeqhwa? U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu
 U yahamb’ imihla yonke noJesu? U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu?U yaphumla njalo-njalo kuKrestu - U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu?
Nxa uMyen’ ebuya u yobamhlope? U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu?Nezindlu, kambe, u suzilindeke? U gezil’ egazin’ leWundlu?
Lahla ingub’ eyoniwe yisono U gezw’ egazini leWundlu?U khona uMthombo ogelezayo, Woza egazini leWundlu

title: 56  Nkosi, Ngi Yeza Ekhaya
content:
# 56  Nkosi, Ngi Yeza Ekhaya

 Ngi zulile kude, Nkosi,Se ngi yabuya Ngi dinwe yizono zami Nkosi, ngi yeza
 CHORUSNgi yeza ekhaya, Se ngi khathele  Vul’ ingalo zothando, Nkosi ng’amkele
Kade ngi cita im’nyaka, Se ngi yabuya;Manje, se ngi yaphenduka Nkosi, ngi yeza .
 Ngi dinwe ukulahleka, Se ngi yabuya;Ngi themba ilizwi lAkho, Nkos, ngi yeza.
 Ngi ncenga ngokukwethemba, Se ngi yabuya;uJesu wafela mina, Nkosi ngi yeza.
Nkosi, hlanzisisa mina, Se ngi yabuya;Ma ngi bemhlope njengeqhwa, Nkosi, ngi yeza.

title: 57  Lowo Ozwayo
content:
# 57  Lowo Ozwayo

 Lowo ozwayo maka memeze;Ivangeli ma li zungeze izwe.Lapho ku khon’ abantu ku menyezwe,Othandayo mak’ eze!
 CHORUSLow’ othandayo, makasheshise;A memezel’ indab’ ezintabeni,uBab’ uyabiza odukileyo,Othandayo mak’ eze!
 Wena ozayo sheshisa phela;Umnyango u savuliwe, wongena.uJesu u thi: "Ngi yiNdlela mina";Othandayo mak’ eze
 Low’ ovumayo nas’ is’thembiso;Kuy’ osithandayo se si me njalo.Si yiMpilo enhle eme phakade;Othandayo mak’ eze!

title: 58  Bayethe, Nkosi Ya Makosi
content:
# 58  Bayethe, Nkosi Ya Makosi

 Bayethe! Ku Jes’ iNkosi, Zi thob’ ingelosi;Maka thweswe umqhele, Kuthiwe, Bayethe! Maka thweswe umqhele, Kuthiwe, Bayethe!
 Nina enikethiweyo, Nsal’ eyingcosana Hloniphani Owafayo, Kuthiwe, Bayethe!Hloniphani Owafayo, Kuthiwe, Bayethe!
Makuthi bonk’ abezizwe, Abakulelizwe Ba mukhothamele Yena, Kuthiwe Bayethe!Ba mukhothamele Yena, Kuthiwe Bayethe!
Nalabaya abangcwele, Nabo si nga guqa Si mdumis’ uSimakade, Kuthiwe Bayethe! Si mdumis’ uSimakade, Kuthiwe Bayethe!

title: 59 Jesu Mthandi wo Moya Wami
content:
# 59 Jesu Mthandi wo Moya Wami

 Jes’ othand’ umoya wam’, Ngi vume ngize kuWe; Nxa izilingo zonke, Noko zi ngi hanqile.Ma ngi sithele ngaWe; Wena Msindisi wami.Ekupheleni thata; Nank’ umphefumlo wami.    
 Jesu, ngi yasintula, Sona isiphephelo.Uze u ngangishiyi, KuWe ngi yasondela.O, Msizi wami nguWe, iThemba lami lonke.Ngembes’ ikhanda lami, Ngazo impiko zakho.    
 Ngi fisa Wena wedwa, Krestu Msindisi wami;Mvusi webawileyo,  Melaphi weziguli.NguWe wedwa oNgcwele, Kimi ngokubi konke.Ngi yenyanyeka mina, Wen’ u gcwele okuhle.    
 Ngi bona um’sa kuWe, Wokhungihlambulula.Ngenziwe ngaphakathi, Ngi hlale ngi cwebile.Mthombo wokuphila kwam’, Ngi nathise ngesihle.Hlal’ enhliziyweni yam’ Kuze kube phakade.

title: 60 Jesu Njabulo Yenhliziyo Enothando
content:
# 60 Jesu Njabulo Yenhliziyo Enothando

 Jesu Mthandi wenhliziyo,Muthimbo wokusindisa; Ku lazo zonke izinto Si yakukhalela thina.    
Jesu u y’isinkwa sethu,Si nike si phile ngaso,Si zonatha emthonjeni,Ukuze si kholisiswe.    
Jesu sazalw’ esonweni,Sa si banjwe ekufeni;Si kholwa ngamandla Akho, Ukusisindisa ngAwo.    
Jesu woz’ u hlale nathi,Lungis’ ukuphila kwethu;Xosh’ ubumnyama besono,Ku sal’ ezwen’ ukukhanya.

title: 61 Okunye NgoJesu
content:
# 61 Okunye NgoJesu

     Ngo Jesu ngi thand’ukwazi,Ngi tshel’ abanye ngomusaBa thole ukuxolelwa;Ngoweza ukusifela. 
 CHORUSOkunye ngo Jesu, Okunye ngo Jesu,Yena mina wang’ophela;Yena ngami wazidela. 
    Ngo Jesu ma ngi fundiswe!NgeyAkh’ ingqondo ng’aziswe?Moy’ oNgcwele Mfundisi wam’,Veza okuka Krestu kim’. 
    NaY’ uJesu ma ngi zwane,NaY’ uJesu ngi thandane;Ngi zwe izwi lAkhe kimi:Li khuluma konke kimi. 
    NgoJesu nab’ ubukhosi,Ngize ngi hlabe lomkhosi;Ngi babaze ngi ngathuli,Ngal’ iWundlu loKuthula.

title: 62 Jesu Wami, Ngi Yakuthanda
content:
# 62 Jesu Wami, Ngi Yakuthanda

    Ngi yakuthanda Wena Jesu wami,Ngenxa yAkho ngi del’ izono namhla;U ng’ uMsindisi-ke,, noMhlengi wami,Uma ngakuthanda Jesu, ku namhla. 
    Ngi yakuthanda, ngoba wangithanda,Esiphambanweni ngahlaulelwa;Ngi yakuthanda ngoba wangifela,Uma ngakuthanda Jesu, ku namhla.     Ekuphileni nakuko ukufa,uMsindisi wami ngi zomdumisa;Ngothi ecansini lami lokufa,Uma ngakuthanda Jesu, ku namhla.      Endlini zobukosi ngi jabule,Ngi hlal’ ezulwini ngi kudumisa;Ngi hlabelele ngi thwele umqhele,Uma ngakuthanda Jesu, ku namhla. 
    Ekuphileni nakuko ukufa,uMsindisi wami ngi zomdumisa;Ngothi ecansini lami lokufa,Uma ngakuthanda Jesu, ku namhla. 
    Endlini zobukosi ngi jabule,Ngi hlal’ ezulwini ngi kudumisa;Ngi hlabelele ngi thwele umqhele,Uma ngakuthanda Jesu, ku namhla.

title: 63 Kuphela Ligazi
content:
# 63 Kuphela Ligazi

 Ngi ngagezwa ng’ubani? Ng’uJesu ngegazi lAkhe. Ngi ngahlanzeka njani? Muhlophe ngegazi lAkhe.    
 CHORUSLa y’igug’ igazi! Li yagezisisa;Kuphela igazi, Lona lodwa likaJesu! 
    Ngi funa ukugezwa:  Egazini lika Jesu; Ngi thol’ ukuxolelwa: Egazini lika Jesu. 
    Ngi ngavunywa ng’ubani?  Ng’uJesu ngegazi lAkhe;Ngi ngaphete lutho na? Yebo ngal’ igazi lAkhe! 
   Li miph’ ithemba lami? Egazini lika Jesu;Kuph’ ukulunga kwami? Egazini lika Jesu. 
    Ngi babaz’ ubani na? UJesu ngegazi lAkhe;Ngodums’ ubani na? UJesu ngegazi lAkhe.

title: 64 Tshela uJesu
content:
# 64 Tshela uJesu

 U duniwe, u dabukile na? Tshela uJesu, tshela uJesu.U nosizi olungapholi na? Tshela Yena uJesu.    
CHORUSTshela uJesu, tshela uJesu, NguYe uMhlobo wakho;Awunaye omunye umhlobo, Tshela uJesu wakho.    
Zi yathonta izinyembezi na? Tshela uJesu, tshela uJesu.U nezono kade zafihlwa na? Tshela Yena uJesu.    
U nosizi enhliziyweni na?  Tshela uJesu, tshela uJesu;Inhliziyo I phishekile na? Tshela Yena uJesu.    
U yesab’ ukufa kweliba na?  Tshela uJesu, tshela uJesu;U khalela uMbuso wAkhe na? Tshela Yena uJesu.

title: 65 Ku Mnandi Ukwethemba uJesu
content:
# 65 Ku Mnandi Ukwethemba uJesu

 Ku mnand’ ukwethemb’ uJesu, Nokukholw’ izwi lAkhe;Nokubamb’ isithembiso "I sho njalo iNkosi."    
CHORUSYen’ uJesu ngi yamthemba, Se ngi mhlolile mina; Jesu! Jesu! Gugu lami, Ngomsa ngi themba Wena.    
Wo! Ku mnandi ukuthemba Ukwethemba igazi;Ukulazi lelothemba Ku sisa k’uMsindisi.    
Ye, ku mnandi ukumthemba Ukushiya izono;Ukwethemba owalenga Ku senzela uxolo.    
Ngi funde ukukwethemba, Jesu, Msindisi wami;Ngi y’azi u nami Wena, Kuze kube nanini.

title: 66 Suku Oluhle!
content:
# 66 Suku Oluhle!

 Suk’ oluhle! LokukhethaiNkosi yam’ noMsindisi;Kuhle inhliziyo yami:Ukuyisho leyo ‘ndaba.    
CHORUS Yek’ usuk’ oluhle! A ngi hlamb’ izon’ uJesu;Wangifundis’ ukulinda;Ukuhlala ngi thandaza;Yek’ usuk’ oluhle! A ngi hlamb’ izon’ uJesu.    
Ku phelile, ku phelile,Ngi ngoweNkos’ I ngeyami;Yangihola mina moni,Ngathokoza ngi biziwe.    
Phumula ‘nhliziyo yami,Cabanga ngalezi zinto; U ngalahli usindisoEzinhluphekweni zami.

title: 67 Yana Ezioni
content:
# 67 Yana Ezioni

        Abez, abeNkosi, Abathand’ uMbuso,Dumisa ngengom’ emnandi;Dumisa ngengom’ emnandi;Hloniph’ ubukosi.Hloniph’ ubukosi.    
CHORUS Qhubekel’ eZion,Wo! Ngobuhle beZioni;Si qhubeka phezulu... Emzini ka Nkulunkulu.    
Ngeke ba hlabele, Abangehloniphe,Kodw’ abantwana beNkosi;Kodw’ abantwana beNkosi;Bo yohlabelela.Bo yohlabelela.    
iNtaba yeZion’, I thel’ okumnandi,Si ngakafik’ ezulwini;Si ngakafik’ ezulwini;S’nyathel’ igolide.S’nyathel’ igolide.    
Zandiswe ingoma, Inyembezi zome,Dumo ku Emanueli;Dumo ku Emanueli;Mholi w’ezulwini.Mholi, w’ezulwini.

title: 68 Hlengiwe
content:
# 68 Hlengiwe

 Mina se ngahlengwa ngegazi!Ngahlengwa nguYe uJesu; Ngahlengwa ngomusa omkhulu, Se ngi ngowAkhe phakade,    
CHORUS Hlengwe... Hlengwe... Hlengwe ngegazi leWundlu.Hlengwe... Hlengwe...Ngi ngumntwan’ Akhe pakade.    
NguJesu ngi hlengiwe mina,Ngi swel’ amazw’ok’ babaza; Ukukhanya kwAkhe ku kimi,Kohlala njalo na-nini.    
uMsindisi ngi zomkhumbula,Ngi cabange ngaYe njalo;Ngohlabelela ngi ngathuli,Ngi bong’ uthand’ olumnandi.    
Ngombona ebuhleni bAkhe,uJesu noMtheth’ omuhle;Owelusa inyawo zami,Ngocula nanxa kumnyama.    
Umqhele wam’ u ngi lindile,Ku lelokhaya phezulu;Masinya kanye nabangcwele,S’ohlala noJesu sonke.

title: 69 Phumula Ngas’eManzini Okuphila
content:
# 69 Phumula Ngas’eManzini Okuphila

 S’ophumula ngas’emanzini, Acwengekileyo;Khona uJesu u lindile Si yombona lapho.    
CHORUS S’ophumula ngas’ emanzi…ni...Si phumule ngas’ emanzi…ni...Phumula ngas’ emanzi…ni...Omthombo wokuphila!    
       Nxa si diniwe ukuhamba, Ku mnand’ ukuhlala;Duze namanzi okuphila, Emthonjen’ omusha.    
Ngako k’uJesu Krestu woza, U qiniswe, u me;Ng’Yen’ amanzi okuphila, Nath’ u ngabusoma.

title: 70 S’oma Kanjani Ekwahlulelweni?
content:
# 70 S’oma Kanjani Ekwahlulelweni?

     Nxa uJes’ ebutha izizwe Ukuma ngapambi kwAkhe;Si zobonakala kanjani: Ukamkel’ ukwahlulelwa.    
    Kumb’ uMsindisi u yakusho? "Khuhle ncek’ elungileyo;" Mhlaumbe ngokuthuthumela, Si zoxoshwa ngakuYena.    
 CHORUSSi zokuma kanjani thina le? Ngelanga leli elikhulu;Ekwahlulelweni kwabantu, Ngelanga lel’ elikhulu.    
   U yabathabela abAkhe Lab’ abahophau lwAkhe;U yabagqokisa ngobuhle, Sebe guqile ngakuYe.   
    Masibe ngabalindileyo Ngeziban’ ezikhanyayo; Nxa uMyeni esesibiza, Si lungele ukundiza.    
    Ngenhliziy’ ebhek’ ezulwini Nasekubekezeleni;Nxa ukuhamba ku phelile, Si zobon’ ubuso bAkhe.

title: 71 Ibizo Lami Libhaliwe Khona Na?
content:
# 71 Ibizo Lami Libhaliwe Khona Na?

 Nkosi ngidel’ imfuyo nayo igolide,Ngikhalel’ ukungema kwelisha ilizwe;Encwadini yoMbuso, khona ezulwini, Msindis’ othandekhayo, mangitshelwe nami.    
CHORUSKamb’ elam’ ibizo, libhaliwe yini?Kwenhl’ incwadi yoMbuso, likhona yini na?    
Nkosi izono zami, zinganges’hlabathi;Kodwa igazi lAkho, lanele kumoni.Ngob’ is’thembiso sAkho, sona sibhaliwe:"Ngogez’ izono zakho, bese zibamhlope."    
Umuzi okhanyayo, ozindlu zimhlophe,Unabangcwele bodwa, abangubo zinhle;Ngeke kwangena into ewungcolisayo,Zikhon’ izingelosi, eziwulindayo.

title: 72 Ku Qalile Ukwahlulela
content:
# 72 Ku Qalile Ukwahlulela

 Ku qalile uKwahlulwa phezulu, Ko phenyisiswa kunzulu;Kuhlolwe okubi nokuhle, iNkosi izokwahlula.    
CHORUSSi zokuma si thini na? Si zokuma si thini na?Si zokuma si swele Yena, Ozakusimela thina.    
Umsebenzi woqala kwabafayo, Ku landel’ abaphilayoKu zolahlwa abanecala. NoMenzi abamdela    
O, si zothini sekuhlolisiswa!  Konke okuyinkohlisoSekuvela, se ku si lahla, Si ngebe si sadlula.

title: 73 Nxa iNkosi Ingena
content:
# 73 Nxa iNkosi Ingena

 Se si menyelwe eMthimbeni, Sindawonye esithebeni;Kobanjani kuwe nakimi; iNkos’ i ngena.    
CHORUSNxa iNkosi ingena, Mfoweth’ u thini;Koba njani kuwe nami, iNkos’ i ngena.    
Awusek’ umqhele  wameva, Ngowobukhosi kuY’ ekhanda;Yokhazima ekufikeni, iNkos’ i ngena.    
Njengombani u khazimula, Into zonke zobasobala;Lapho soba nak’ ukwazama, iNkos’ i ngena.    
Yojabula ukusibona, Igqok’ ezimhlophe zoMthimba;Kazi si yophumelela na? iNkos’ i ngena.    
Si phe Nkosi umusa wAkho, Si size ngesihau sAkho;Size si ngabi nakwesala, iNkos’ i ngena.

title: 74 Si Thwele Izinyanda
content:
# 74 Si Thwele Izinyanda

 Si hlwanyela inhlanyelo yokulunga,Ekuseni nemini nantambama;‘Se si mele isikhathi sokuvumaSi zothokoza si thwel’ izinyanda.    
CHORUSPhindaSi thwel’ inyanda, si thwel’ inyanda,Si zothokoza, si thwel’ izinyanda.    
Si hlwanyela elangeni nemthunzini,A s’esabi inkungu yobusika;Si zowuqeda phambili umsebenzi,Si zothokoza si thwel’ izinyanda.    
Si hlwanyelela iNkosi ngenyembezi,Si nosizi izikhath’ eziningi;Sekuphelile ukukhala soMbona,Si zothokhoza si thwel’ izinyanda.

title: 75 Zwan’ Izwi loMalusi
content:
# 75 Zwan’ Izwi loMalusi

 Zwan’ ilizwi loMalusi Le ehlane elimnyama;Li biz’ izmvu zeNkosi Ezikude nesibaya.    
CHORUSZi ngeniseni-ke, Zi vela ezintabeni;Zi ngeniseni-ke, Zi letheni k’uJesu.    
Ng’ubani-ke, ozohamba Ayocinga abaduki;Ng’ubani ozobalanda Bez lapha ba ngabhubhi.    
Zwana ukukhala kwazo Ezintaben’ ezinkulu;UJes’ uMalusi wakho u thi: "Buyisa izimvu."

title: 76 Lamulela Abafayo
content:
# 76 Lamulela Abafayo

        Lamlel’ abafayo Nabadukile;U ba khiphe ezonweni zabo, Khalel’ abawile:Ba phakamise Ba tshele ngoJesu uMsindisi.    
CHORUSLamlel’ abafayo Nabadukile;uJes’ u nesisa Nosindiso.    
Nabadelelayo U balindile;Ukwamukela opendukayo, U zame ngamandlaUkubancenga: Ba zishiye izono ba Mthembe.    
Abazinhliziyo, Zoniwe kabi;U zozihlambulula ngothando, Batshele ngaloko,Bavuswe ngomsa Abaphukile u yobavusa    
Lamlel’ abafayo, Ku y’imfanelo;iNkosi yosiz’ im’zamo yakho, U z’u basondezeBez’ endleleni Ba tshele ngoJesu owafayo.

title: 77 Ngi Thanda Ukulanda Indaba
content:
# 77 Ngi Thanda Ukulanda Indaba

 I mnandi, O! i mnandi, Indaba yezulu,Nayo yothando lwAkhe,Ku mnandi ukuyisho;I nomusa nothando, Yona yeqiniso,I suthis’ ukufisa,Yodwa nje kuphela.    
CHORUSKu mnand’ ukuyilanda; Ngohuba naphezulu,NgoJesu nobukosi,Nothando nomusa.    
I mnandi O! i mnandi, Iyamangalisa,I dlula namaphupho,Indaba yothando;Ku mnand’ ukuyilanda,Yangisiza mina,Ngako ngi yayilanda,Indaba yothando.    
I mnandi O! i mnandi,Ngi yiphinda njalo,Nangokuphindwa kwayo,Bu yand’ ubumnandi;Ku mnand’ ukuxoxela,Abangayaziyo,Lendaba yensindiso, Ekuyo iM’bhalo.    
I mnandi O! i mnandi,Kakhulu kithina,Ngi yilambele nami,Ngenhliziyo yami,Ngohuba ezulwini,Yon’ ingoma entsha,Indaba yon’ endala,Indaba yakade.

title: 78 Cingani Abalahlekileyo
content:
# 78 Cingani Abalahlekileyo

 Cingani abalahlekileyo,Ba nxuseni ngowaYo umsa;Ba phen’ amazwi aphilisayo,Athi; Wozani kimi namhla.    
CHORUSHambani le! E... zintabeni zonke...Nibalethe... a... badukile bonke...m Emhlambi...ni wo... Mhlengi, Mhlengi wami... m Jesu li Wu...mndlu Wundlu lezoni…    
Cingani abalahlekileyo,Ba qhubeleni kuY’ uJesu,Ba donseni ngendlel’ ebuyayo,Yona eya k’uNkulunkulu.    
Lok’ uJesu u se ngi bizile,Ngi zolandela ‘mihla yonke;Ngi qaphel’ ofayo, nay’ owile,Ba qondiswe k’uJesu bonke.

title: 79 Ukubizwa Kwabavuni
content:
# 79 Ukubizwa Kwabavuni

 Amasimu a lindile, Amhlophe ngamabele;Ekude si wabonile, Ezigangen’ ezinhle.    
CHORUSNkosi yokuvuna yizwa, NguWe wedw’ ongasiza; Ba thume abokuvuna, Li ngakadlul’ ihlobo.    
Ba thumele ekuseni Nantambama ba ngemi;Noma se li shon’ ilanga, Mavavun’ izinyanda.    
Wen’ othunywayo iNkosi Vunisis’ amabele;Bhek’ ezulwin’ isiphelo, Wothol’ umvuz’ omkulu.

title: 80 Sebenza!
content:
# 80 Sebenza!

     Sebenzani zinceku zika Jehova,Ma si landel’ indlela yeNkosi yethu,Ngezwi lAkhe si yawathola amandla.Masenze ngamandla imsebenzi yethu. 
 CHORUSSebenzan’... kuthalan’... Sebenzan’... kuthalan’...Ni thembe...; ni linde.. Ize i buye iNkosi 
    Sebenzani, ni phe abalanmbileyo,Ba donselwe emthojeni wokuphila;Indimiso yethu i kus’ is’ phambano Si sho; "Ukuphila okunge nantengo" 
    Sebenzani-ke, u khona umsebenzi,Ngokub’ umbuso wobumnyam’ u zokuwa;Nebizo lika Jehova lokwaziwaNgokuthi; "Ukuphila okunge nantengo." 
    Sebenzani ize I fike iNkosi,Izingelosi zi zokuz’ ukuvuma;Si yakuhlala nabaqotho emzini;Si cule; "Ukuphil’ okunge nantengo."

title: 81 Qina, Bu Yeza Ubusuku
content:
# 81 Qina, Bu Yeza Ubusuku

     Qina ku yez’ ukuhlwa; Qin’ imin’ i khona.Namazol’ a sekhona; Imbal’ i hluma;Ku se khon’ ukukhanya, Qin’ imin’ i khona;Qina ku yez’ ukuhlwa, Kophela konke! 
    Qina ku yez’ ukuhlwa, Li zoshon’ ilanga.Sebenz’ imini yonke, U nga phumuli;Yenza ku gcwale konke, Ku nga phuthi lutho;Qina ku yez’ ukuhlwa, Kophela konke. 
    Qina ku yez’ ukuhlwa, A yez’ amathunzi.Laphay’ entshonalanga, se ku ntambama;Qina sekuzophela, Zama u kuthale;Ngoba ku yez’ ukuhlwa, Kophela konke.

title: 82 Ekuseni
content:
# 82 Ekuseni

     Nkosi, ekuseni yizwaOkwam’ ukuncenga;Ni zakukhuleka kuWe,Ngi khangela kuWe. 
    Ngi donse ngoMoya wAkho,Endleleni yAkho;Ukuhamba kwami konkeKu qondise kahle. 
    Abathanda wena JesuYe, bazokholiswa! uJehova wobahanqaNgesihlangu somsa.

title: 83 Li Busisiwe Igama LAkhe
content:
# 83 Li Busisiwe Igama LAkhe

 Ma si hube si babaze; Makabongwe uJehovaUdumo lweNkosi yami; Makabongwe uJehova.     
 CHORUSLi busisiwe, Li busisiwe Ibizo laYo iNkosi;Li bisisiwe, Libusisiwe Ibizo laYo iNkosi.     
uJesu u yathandeka; Makabongwe uJehova.Imnandi kumon’ ingoma; Makabongwe uJehova.     
U nqamul’ amandl’ esono; Makabongwe uJehova,Igazi lihlanz’ omubi; Makabongwe uJehova.

title: 84 Dumisani uNkulunkulu
content:
# 84 Dumisani uNkulunkulu

 Dumisan’ uNkulunkulu,Osiph’ iz’busiso zonke!Nani mabandl’ aphezulu,Dumisani Yena nonke.     
Si ngabantu beNkosi, beNkosi, beNkosi,Si ngabantu beNkosi, Si culel’ iNkosi.Jesu nguMongameli, Si lindele Msindisi,Sohlabela ngohambo, NguY’ uMhlabelisi.     
Wozani si y’ekhaya, Ekhaya, ekhaya,Wozani si y’ekhaya, khubo le phesheya.Wozani si y’ekhaya, Si bonane laphaya,Jesu si yahlabela, Seku duz’ ekhaya.     
Ngokuthaba sovuma, Sovuma, sovuma,Ngokuthaba sovuma, ‘Sihambi khuluma.Ba muhlophe nabansundu, Bonke be,nengoma; Behlabela noJesu, eJerusalema.

title: 85 Ngi Babaz’ Amandl’ eNkosi!
content:
# 85 Ngi Babaz’ Amandl’ eNkosi!

 Ngi babaz’ amandl’ eNkosi A dal’ izintaba;Nal’ ulwandle alweneka, Nesibhakabhaka;Ngi babaza leyongqondo, Nelanga yalenza,Nenyang’ ebus’ ebusuku, Yebo, nenkanyezi!     
Ngi babaz’ umusa waYo, O si pha ukudla;Ya dala ngelizwi laYo, Wonke amabandla;Si bon’ izimangaliso, Nhlangothini zonke,Njalo ku yamangalisa, OkweNkosi konke!     
Ngi babaza zon’ imbali, Utshani, nenkungu;Ku yafakaza ngoMenzi, Noba ku thule du!NgaYe ku yaphila naphi, Ku yondliwa kona.Si ngabalekela ngaphi?, Nalapho u khona!

title: 86 Dumisa uMbusi
content:
# 86 Dumisa uMbusi

     Dumis’ uMbusi, Yen’ oiNgcwele,Bonga ngothando lwak’olukhulu;Sihlangu sethu Mdala wezinsuku,Ohlala ebuhleni obunzulu. 
    Landa ngothando, hlabela ngomsa‘NgaYe ombethe, ukukhazimla.Indlela yAkhe I nokwesabeka;Qaphelisisa nxa li dum’ izulu. 
    Nguban’ ongasho ukondla kwAkhe?Ku khany’ obala, ku semoyeni,Ku yagelezela ezintabeni;Ku yaleth’ imvula emagangeni. 
    Si ngabantwana bothuli thina,KuWe si themba ngawo amandla;Umusa nothando lwAkho kithina,Sihlobo, Mvikeli wethu, Somandla.

title: 87 Baba Siza KuWe
content:
# 87 Baba Siza KuWe

     Baba siza kuWe Akakho omunye; U yinqaba yethu, Themba lethu.Umhlaba umnyama, nxa ungekho Wena; Yiba ng’uMduduzi, Baba wethu. 
 CHORUSBaba siza keWe, Si nga lahlwa Asinaw’ amandla, Nkosi si zwe 
    Si sindise thina Kuzo zonk’ izitha; Yiba nguMduduzi Endleleni.Thina si yesaba, Si qinise Baba; Ngengalo yamandla, Si sindise. 
    Si phe umsa wAkho, Bek’ upau lwAkho; Sus’ inyawo zethu Esonweni.Woza u si khipe Kuzo izinhlupho; Ze si finylele Ezulwini.

title: 88 U Nga Ngi Dluli
content:
# 88 U Nga Ngi Dluli

 U nga ni dluli MsindisiYizw’ amazwi am’;Laph’ abanye u babiza, Ma u ngi zwe nam’!     
 CHORUSNkosi! Nkosi!,Yizw’ amazwi am’Laph’ abanye u babizaMa u ngi zwe nam’!     
      Phambili kwes’hlalo somsa,Se ngi khona nam’;Ngi guqile ngi yakhala,Yizwa Nkosi yam’!     
      Ngokwethemba kwami kuWe,Woz’ u hlale nam’;Yelaph’ umoy’ ophukile,Ngi sindiswe nam’!     
      U nguMthombo wami Wena,Wokuphila kwam’;Ezulwini nasezweni, Yiko konke kwam’!

title: 89 Isikathi Esimnandi Sokukhuleka
content:
# 89 Isikathi Esimnandi Sokukhuleka

  Ku mnandi ukukhuleka Ku ngi nqanda osizini;Ku ngibikela kuBaba Konke ukuswela kwami;Ngezikhathi zenhlupheko Ngi vama ukupholiswa;Ngi phunyuk’ ekkulingweni Nges’ khathi sokukhuleka. 
  Ku mnandi ukukhuleka Ku zothwala izcelo;KuYe iqiniso lAkhe Li busisa olindayo;U thi mangi fune Wena Ngi likholwe izwi lAkho,KuWe ngi zoletha konke Nge linde ngokukhuleka. 
  Ku mnandi ukukhuleka Ingathi ngi ngaduduzwa;Ngize ngibone ikhaya Ngi phaphele khona kuYe.Kuthu ngumzimba omusha;  Ngenyuke ngi thol’ umvuzo.Ngi memeze, Ngi memeze; Sala kahle kukhuleka!

title: 90 Omunye Umsebenzi Wezinsuku Eziyisithupha
content:
# 90 Omunye Umsebenzi Wezinsuku Eziyisithupha

  Ku phelil’ ukusebenza,iSabatha li yaqala;Si zothaba, Moya wozaNgalol’ usuk’ oluNgcwele. 
  Zanini si bong’ iNkosi,Ngokuphumla kwethu sonke;Si zophiwa iz’busiso,Namhla ku nemihla yonke. 
 ‘Ngath’ imicabango yethu,I ngabong’ osithandayo;Size si thole kuKrestu,Lowo Moy’ oCwebileyo. 
 Ukuthul’ enhliziyweni,Kunethemba lephezulu.Elimiyo eBandleni;Kuphele zonke inhlungu.

title: 91 Lindani Ni Khuleke
content:
# 91 Lindani Ni Khuleke

  Lindani iNkosi, Iyabiza namhla;Lindani iNkosi, Lindani ngamandla.Qinani maKrestu; Isitha si nonyaLindani uMyeni, Nanxa elibala. 
 CHORUSMlindenini ni khuleke;Mlindenini ebusuku nasemini;Lindani nonke. 
 Xosha ubuthongo, susa ukusola.Ngowakho umvuzo, Phezulu wophumla;Linda u khuleke, uJesu walindaWaze wajuluka, Igazi laconsa. 
     Thembani kuJesu, Qaphelan’ isitha;Thathan’ izihlangu, Ni lind’ iNkos’ iza;Uma sekusile Ni ngabolibala;Ngales’ khath’ esihle, Linda mKrestu linda.

title: 92 U Ngakhohlwa iSabatha
content:
# 92 U Ngakhohlwa iSabatha

  Ni ngabokhohlwa iSabatha leNkosi;Yebo, lihle kunawo wonke amalanga.Li yasiphumuza emsebenzini yethu;Li silethel’ ukuphumula kwaphezulu. 
CHORUSLi thokozelele ilanga leSabatha,Li thokozelele ilanga leSabatha. 
 Li londoloze iSabatha MdumiseOwathi Yena, Ngi yindlela yokuphilaNxa si mlandela uMsindisi wethu laphaU zosipha amanzi okuphila Yena 
  Ngelanga eliNgcwele si zakumbonga;uJesu iSihlobo esithandekayo;NguMsindisi Yena onothando nomusa;Izithembiso zAkhe zi ukuthokoza.

title: 93 Usuku Lokuphumula Nolwenjabulo
content:
# 93 Usuku Lokuphumula Nolwenjabulo

  Usuku lokuphumla, nalo lwenjabulo,Lu susa izinhlungu, lu xosh’ inhlupheko.Ba ya dumisa ngalo nabasezulwini;Ba ya hlabela bathi, "Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Nkosi!" 
 iSabatha yinqaba yabahluphekile,Insimu egeleza amanzi amahle;Li njengomthomb’ othandwa yib’ abomileyo,iPhisg’ esibonela izwe elizayo. 
  Usuku olumnandi, khona ebantwini,Usuku ku catshangwe, ku bhekw’ ezulwini.Si thol’ umus’ omusha, ngalo lolusuku;Si zophumula ngalo, si fika phezulu.

title: 94 Ikhaya Lami LeSabatha
content:
# 94 Ikhaya Lami LeSabatha

   Isikolo seSabatha,Si thandeka kimi;Inhliziyo i qapheleUmhla weSabatha. 
 CHORUSSabatha ... elihle...,Sabatha...  elihle...Inhliziyo iqaphele,Umhla weSabatha 
  Lapha ngaqala, ngabonaIndlela yobomi;Lapha ngacinga okuhle,Ngazuza ikhaya. 
  Wayemi khona uJesu,Wangibiza Yena;Ukuba ngi nkhethe YenaNeSabatha lAkhe.

title: 95 Si Londiwe Esontweni Elidlule
content:
# 95 Si Londiwe Esontweni Elidlule

 Nkosi u si londile esontwen’ elidlule,Si cel’ izibusiso lapha endlini kuWe.Lalihle lelilanga!, Li khomba okuzayo.Lalihle lelilanga!, Li khomba okuzayo. 
 Nxa si cela umusa ngebizo loMsindisi;Veza ubuso bAkho, uze u si sindise;Siphe khona namhlanje, ukuphumula kwethu.Siphe khona namhlanje, ukuphumula kwethu. 
 Malandisw’ ivangeli kuzo zonke izoni;Si bone izithelo khona enhliziyweni.Ukuze iSabatha, li hlale li ngelethu.Size si finyelele ekubuseni kwethu.

title: 96 Thokozel’ Ilanga Loluphumula
content:
# 96 Thokozel’ Ilanga Loluphumula

 Si thokozel’ ilangaEsinikiw’ ezweni;Si yalibingelelaLi vela ezulwini.
Usuku loku phumulaIm’zuzu yal’imnandi;I pholis’ ukukhalaUz’ u qedw’ umsebenzi.
Ilang’ eliliguguLokuthobel’ inkonzo;Li vus’ is’phukuphukuLehlis’ izibusiso.

title: 97 Si Zwile
content:
# 97 Si Zwile 

        Si zwile into enhle, uJes’ uMsindisi;Ye! u yasisindisa, uJes’ uMsindisi,Yazais’ izizwe zonke, Ngaphesheya kolwandle;iNkos’ i yasithuma, NgoJes’ uMsindisi.
Dumisa, dumisani uJes’ uMsindisi;Zixoxele izoni, NgoJes’ uMsindisi,Hlabel’ ezinqhingini, Sabela nawe lwandle;Ngaleyondaba enhle, ke Jes’ uMsindisi.
 Hlaba kakhul’ umkhosi, ngoJes’ uMsindisi;Nokufa nangempilo, ka Jes’ uMsindisi, Wusho nasemnyameni, Nxa wondel’ isihawu;Wolinqoba ithuna, NgoJes’ uMsindisi.
Phonsa emoyen’ izwi, NgoJes’ uMsindisi;Thabani nonke zizwe, NgoJes’ uMsindisi,Memeza usindiso, ebintabeni zonke;Ingoma yokunqoba, Ka Jes’ uMsindisi.

title: 98 UMsindisi Nami
content:
# 98 UMsindisi Nami

     Ngi yamdinga uMsindisi, Ahambe nami njalo.Ma ngi muzwe nam’ eduze Angi gone ngengalo.
 CHORUSMphefumlo, u ngesabi, NoJes’ engendulelaNgi yohamba ngi ngasoli, Eduze ngomlandela
    Ngi yamdinga uMsindisi, Mina ngi ngenze lutho.Eduduza u sho izwi, Nobani ongelisho.
    Ngi yamdinga uMsindisi, Ekuhambeni kwami.Es’phephweni nelangeni Kuyo yonk’ impi yami.
    Ngi yamdinga, uMsindisi, Maka ngi hole Yena.Ngize ngi fik’ eJordani; Ngi welele phesheya.

title: 99 Isiphambano Esimangalisayo
content:
# 99 Isiphambano Esimangalisayo

 Ngi bhek’ esiphambanweniLapho kwafela iNkosi;Ku yize yonk’ imfuyo yam’Ngi nengwa ukuzidla kwam’.    
Si bona kuzo izandla,Nezinyawo amanxeba;Zabhotshozwa ngenxa yethuYeka uthand’ olungaka!    
Mina nga ngi lahlekile;Ngathol’ ukuthethelelwa.Yala, ngi ngazibabaziKodwa esiphambanweni.    
Ma ngi nawo wonk’ umhlaba;Kunga ngumnikel’ omncane.Ngenxa yothand’ olungaka!Ngomnik’ ukuphila kwami.

title: 100 Yeka Isihlobo Sethu uJesu!
content:
# 100 Yeka Isihlobo Sethu uJesu!

 Yek’ is’hlobo seth’ uJesu! Othwal’ izono zethu,Kuhl’ ukusa konke kuYe Ngako ukukhuleka.Si yalahla ukuthula, Ngokungamnaki kwethu;Ngoba a sikusanga-ke; Konke kuY’ uJehova.    
Si nenhlupo nezilingo, Kanye nenkathazo na?Si ngahlala ngesibindi; Konke si kuse kuYe.Sothola ngaph’ isihlobo Esinjengo Jesu na?U sithanda esizwela; Nxa si khuleka kuYe.    
Si yasindwa imithwalo, Sehlulwa zihlupho na?uJesu yisiphephelo, Nxa si khuleka kuYe.Nom’ iz’hlobo zi kudela; Khuleka eNkosini,Yokugon’ ikududuze Ezingalweni zaYo.

title: 101 U Yabiza uJesu
content:
# 101 U Yabiza uJesu

     uJesu u yakubizel’ ekhaya, U yabizwa, wona namhla.Kungani u ngasondeli kuYe U qhela, u zilahla. 
 CHORUSUyabizwa, UyabizwaUJesu uyakubiza wena namhlanje 
    uJes’ u yabiz’ odiniweyo, U yam’biza, u yam’biza;Leth’ umthwalo wakho u phumule, Yen’ akafulatheli. 
    uJes’ u lindile, woza manje: U lindile, u lindile.Woza u zolahl’ izono zonke Woza u ngalibali. 
    uJes’ u yanxusa, woza kuYe: Muzwe namhla, muzwe namhla.Abakholwayo ngebizo lAkhe, Bona ba zothokoza.

title: 102 Mvulele Angene
content:
# 102 Mvulele Angene

     Ku kon’ umhamb’ emnyango; Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)Kade selok’ ekhona, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)Mvulel’ angaze make, Vulela oiNgcwele‘Jes’ uMntwana weNkosi, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)
    Vul’ inhliziyo yakho, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)Ma wephuz’ uzomuka, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)Vulela isihlobo, solwel’ uMoya wakhoU yoba nawe njalo, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)
    Yizwa ma esancenga, Mvulele(Vulel’ uJesu)Manje mukhethe Yena, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)U semi ngas’ emnyango, Wobuyis’ injabuloWomudumisa Yena, Mvulele(Vulel’ uJesu)
    Yamkel’ Owaphezulu, Mvulele(Vulel’ uJesu)Wokwenzela idili, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)Wothi, uthethelelwe, Ku citwe okwomhlabaWokuyis’ ezulwini, Mvulele (Vulel’ uJesu)

title: 103 Zalwani Futhi
content:
# 103 Zalwani Futhi

     Okukhany’ umbusi ebusukuWeza ngensindiso, wabuz’ uJesuNgokusobala waphendula wathi"Nga u zalwa futhi!" (Futhi)
 CHORUS"Nga u zalwa futhi!" (Futhi) "Nga u zalwa futhi!" (Futhi)Ngeqinis’ iqiniso, ngi thi kuwe "Nga u zalwa futhi!" (Futhi)
    Nina ‘bantu, qaphelani izwi;Liqotho lashiwo yiNkosi ni zveUmlayezo kini u veze into -"Nga ni zalwa futhi!" (Futhi)
    Nin’ enizongen’ ebukhosini,Ni hube ingoma esigodlweni;Ni zuze ukuphila kwaphakade;"Nga ni zalwa futhi!" (Futhi)

title: 104 Woza Mkhululi Omkhulu Woza
content:
# 104 Woza Mkhululi Omkhulu Woza

     Ngi zwe, Nkosi, ubenomsa kimi Za Mkhululi woza;uMoya wami u fisa Wena Za Mkhululi Woza.
CHORUSNgizulile kud’ ezintabeni; Zulile kude nekhaya.Ma ngi thathwe ngi lethw’ es’ bayeni Za Mkhululi Woza.
    Asikho isiphephelo sami Za Mkhululi; Ngi bheke ngi thole ukukhanya Za Mkhululi Woza.
    Indlela yam’ i yangikhataza Za Mkhululi, Woza;Amehlo’ ami a bheke uthando Za Mkhululi, Woza.
    U ngalahl’ ukuzisola kwami Za Mkhululi, Woza;Lalela ukukhuleka kwami Za Mkhululi, Woza.

title: 105 Onako Ukukhulula
content:
# 105 Onako Ukukhulula

     Memezela ngamandl’ okukhulula Ukukhulula abahloniphayo;Emlilweni wokulahlwa kwezoni uJesu u zokhulula ozayo.
 CHORUSU nokukhulula U nensindiso;Uma, mufowethu, U mkholw’ uJesu.
    A ngakhulula u qinisile na? A khona amandla a ngangisiza?Ngi tshele u Krestu owabethelwa A ngangikhulula kuSathani na?
    A ngakhulula! Mana isibindi U ngesabi, bambelela kuJesu;U ngesabi, bambelela kuJesu Khaul’ ukungabaza, yimi kuYe.

title: 106 Yakhela Edwaleni
content:
# 106 Yakhela Edwaleni

     Si bokwakh’ eDwaleni lethu, Lona laphakad’ uJesu;Khona si yokuma kulona, Si ngaw’ ekulingweni.
 CHORUSSi zokwakhela, (Si zokwakhel’ eDwaleni Lelo)Sakh’ eDwaleni (Sakh’ e Dwalen’ eliqinileyo)Sakh’ eDwalen’ eliqinileyo, uKrestu onamandla.
    Kukhon’ abak’ es’ hlabathini: Ngabakhela emfuyweni.Ba qaphel’ udumo lomhlaba Nokwakhela kokubi.
    O! Dwala eliqinileyo, Masakhele phezu kwAkho.Wena Themb’ elingapheliyo, Li Themba loSindiso.

title: 107 Ngi Tshele Indaba ka Jesu
content:
# 107 Ngi Tshele Indaba ka Jesu

     Ngi tshel’ indaba ka Yesu, Yilob’ enhliziyweni;Ngi tshel’ indab’ eligugu Ehlamusa kamnandi.Iculo lezingelozi  Mhlan’ ezalwa uJesu,Dumo ngakweliPhezulu Nokuthul’ emhlabeni.
 CHORUSNgi tshel’ indaba ka Jesu Yilob’ enhliziyweni;Ngi tshel’ indaba eligugu Ehlamusa kamnandi.
    Wazil’ eyedwa ehlane Yish’ ubunzima bAkhe;Elingwa ngezono zethu Wanqob’ ekugcineni.Yisho umsebenzi wAkhe  Yish’ ubunzima bAkhe,Wadelwa wezw’ ubuhlungu  Engenakhay’ empofu.
    Yisho nges’ phambano sAkhe  Nomunyu wobuhlungu;Yisho nangethuna lAkhe Yisho ngovuko lwAkhe.Ngi thintwa yisis’ es’khulu Sicacile kakhulu,Yi phinde kimi lendaba Yokungihlawulela.

title: 108 Ngothando, Ngessa U Yabiza
content:
# 108 Ngothando, Ngessa U Yabiza

     uJes’ onguMalusi, U yakubizela;Phakath’ esibayeni, Ku khona indawo.Woza ku senamhlanje,Khona u semusha.
 CHORUSNgothand’ uJesu u yasibiza:"Mhambike, Mhambike, woza kimi."U yangibekezelela Wena,Jesu, Malusi wami.
    uJes’ onguMalusi, Wakufela wena;U yakubiza manje; "Mhambi woza kimi"Ngaphandle ku yingozi, Woza, uyabizwa,Ngena esibayeni, Sona seqiniso.
    Ngena u ngalibali, Ku khon’ izimpisi;Ezinokulimaza, Ezidukileyo.uJes’ onguMalusi, U yakubizakeNgena esibayeni, Sona seqiniso.

title: 109 Walinganiswa, Walula
content:
# 109 Walinganiswa, Walula

     uMahluli wosihlola, Lok’ okusifaneleSofana yini negoli Kumbe si ngamanyela?
 CHORUSSolinganiswa yiNkosi, U lula wena;Solinganiswa noMthetho, Noma u nzima.
    Sozwa amazw’ amahle na?  Nceku ekholekile!Noma koba ukulahlwa  Mona wena u lula.
    Si ngezw’ uMoy’ encenga na?  Si senethuba lomsaKumbe sephuze ku valwe  Si lotshwe, Ni lahliwe.

title: 110 Ba Busisiwe Abenzayo
content:
# 110 Ba Busisiwe Abenzayo

     Yizwa amazwi oMsindisi, A ngamazwi okuphila.Zwana u khumbule u Jesu wathi:  "Ba busisiwe abenzayo!"
 CHORUSBa busisiwe abenz’ imyalo, Busisiwe, busisiwe!Ba busisiwe abenz’ imyalo, Busisiwe, busisiwe!
    Ku yize konk’ ukuzwa kwethu:  Im’yalo nezithembiso.Uma si ngakugcini konke loku, "Ba busisiwe abenzayo!"
    Ba zongena eMzini bona, Ba thukululw’ ekoneni;Ba hlanjululwe, ba nodumo bona, Ba dle iz’ thelo zokuphila.

title: 111 Qha Namunye
content:
# 111 Qha Namunye

   A sinasihlobo njengoJeso Nasinye asikho!Kakh’ ongasusa izifozonke Namunye kakho qha!  
 CHORUS:U yazaz’ izinhluph’ uJesu, Wosihol‘imihla yonkeA sinasihlobo njengoJesu, Nasinye asikho!  
  Kakh’ ophakamileyo njengaYe, Namunye kakho qha!A khak’ othobekile njengaYe, Namunye kakho qha!  
  A sikhw’ is’khathi engekho Yena, Nasinye asikho:Nobusuku uthando lu ngekho, Nabunye abukho  
  Nake namfumana enidela? Nakanye, qhabo qha!Nesoni a ngasamukelanga Nasinye, asikho!  
  A sikhw’ isipho njengoMsindisi Nasinye asikho!Wonqaba u ngay’ ezulwini na? Qhabo qha! Qhabo qha!

title: 112 Ukuphila Ekubhekeni
content:
# 112 Ukuphila Ekubhekeni

 Isiphambano si nokuphila uJesu wathi, "Ngi bheke"Imfuyo nelizwe ku yize, Phambili ngi zobona okuhle.  
CHORUS:Ku khona ukuphila, Ekubhekheni kodwa.Ukuphila okuhle Khona eKhalivari  
Ngi sandu ukubona uJesu, Wang’ momothekela nami,Lapha ngi bona izilingo, Isiphambano si ngamandl’ami  
Ngi zobheka zonke izinsuku Ngi themba isithembiso;Othemb’ amandla aphezulu A ngezawisa ngumlingi yena

title: 113 Ebiza!
content:
# 113 Ebiza!

 uJesu u si bizela ekhaya U biza wena nami,U yalinda inhliziyo mvulele, U linda mina nami  
CHORUS:Buy’ ekhaya, Wena odiniweyo U yakuncengisis’uJesu ethi O, moni buy’ ekhaya!  
Ni ngali ukunxusa kwoMsindisi Unxusa nina nami,I sekhona indawo, ni ngaphuzi U yancenga ngomusa  
Wozani isikhathi si yadlula Nemizuzu kaloku,Ithunzi lokufa kwethu li yeza Yamkeleni uJesu.  
Cabangani ngomusa ka Jehova Othembisile bonkeNoko sonile wosithethelela Si thethelelwe konke.

title: 114 Vulelwe Mina Isango
content:
# 114 Vulelwe Mina Isango

      Isango ngenxa yam’li mi Ngi savulelwe nami;Ku bonakala isisa Nothando loMsindisi     
CHORUS:Yeka umusa ongaka! Ngi savulelwe intuba?Mina...Mina...Ngi shiyelwe intuba?     
     Isango li savulelwe Bonk’ abazosindiswa.Izicebi nezicaka Nabezizweni bonke.   
    Phambili makuqhubekwe Isango li vuliwe,Yamukel’ umusa wAkhe U fumane umqhele.   
    Yebo, phesheya kwomfula Is’phambano sothulwaNgi thwale wona umqhele Ezulwini ngi buse.

title: 115 Inyanga Enkulu
content:
# 115 Inyanga Enkulu

  Inyanga enkul’ iyeza Onesisa uJesu.U khulum’ indleb’ ivuswe, Imlalele uJesu.    
 CHORUS:Iphimbo elimnandi, Li sho kahle ulimi!Yaze yamnand’ingoma, Jesu!, yebo, Jesu!    
Zonk’ izono zi xolelwe Zwan’ izwi lika Jesu.Phezulu mawenyukele Thwel’ umqhele noJesu.    
Udumo kuYo Imvana Se ngi yamkhol’ uJesu,Ngi thanda lona igama Igama lika Jesu.    
   Akukh’ onga xosh’ uvalo Ngaphandle kwAkh’ uJesu,May’ u yadel’ umphefumlo U thembela kuJesu.   
   Nxase fika naw’ umqhele Umqhele wobukhosi,Si yakuhlala ngakuYe Si xoxe ngosindiso.

title: 116 Akukho Lutho Luka Jesu
content:
# 116 Akukho Lutho Luka Jesu

 U gcwele inhlupheko, Kanandawo uJesu? U thunjiwe ng’umhlaba Kanandawo uJesu?Nangu u mi emnyango Yiloku unqonqotha!Yizwa u yakuncenga U nendaw’ uJesu na?
    U cita isikhathi, Wenzela uJesu na?U yaqeda amandla, Wenzela uJesu na?Awuling’ukunqoba, Nokusindis’ abantu;Nokubuyis’ umduki Kambe wenzel’ uJesu?
U fun’ imfuyo yezve K’unathuba ngoJesu?U zihlalele kahle K’unathuba ngoJesu?U zama ukuhlala Nobucebi bomhlaba,U thokoza ngeze nje A wunak’ uJesu na?
U thwele amahlamvu Ka naz’thelo ngoJesu?Cha, nas’thung’ esandleni K’unas’thelo ngoJesu?Wena u nako konke Kwokwenelis’ uJesu;Kepha wojabha nako Msuku efik’ uJesu?

title: 117 Ngi Yeza Nkosi
content:
# 117 Ngi Yeza Nkosi

     Ngi zwa izwi lAkho ‘Nkosi Li ngibizaNgize ngi hlamb’ egazini LoMsindisi wami. 
 CHORUSNgi yeza, Nkosi Ngi yeza kuWeMa ngi gezwe ngi bemhle Egazini lAkho 
    Ngi swele amandla Wen’ u naw’ impelaEyam’ insila I hlanzwe Ngize ngi bemhlophe 
    Ngi bizwa nguJesu Ngothand’ olukhuluNgethembe ekuthuleni KuWe ezulwini 
        Dumo kuligazi! Hlonipha lomusaDumo kuY’ iNkos’ uKrestu! U ngamandla ethu

title: 118 UJesu Wahlawula Konke
content:
# 118 UJesu Wahlawula Konke

        uMsindisi u the, Aw’ u naw’ amandlaLinda u khuleke Letha kimi konke    
CHORUSJesu, Mhlauli Ngi phiwe nguWeIzono zi susiwe, Zenziwa zamhlophe    
Nkosi, ngi bonile AwAkho amandlaAguqul’isoni Nenhliziyo embi    
Angi nakulunga Okwomusa wAkhoNgogeza izono Ngegazi leWundlu    
   Phambili kweNkosi Ngi zozincengelaNgi kubeke konke Enyaweni zAkhe

title: 119 Iza Elihlanzayo
content:
# 119 Iza Elihlanzayo

        Ngi bona iza libomvu Umthomb’ oshonayoWon’ u ngamandla kaJesu Yena owophayo    
CHORUSuMfula ngi yowubona, Low’ ongihlanzisisayoSe ngi cwilil’ egazini, Bong’ iNkosi ehlanzayo    
       Ngi thol’ ukuphil’ okusha Khona egaziniIzono zonke zi yafa Lapho eMfuleni    
Ngi vuka ng’enziwa musha Ngobhaqa lweZuluNgi nenhliziy’ emhlophe qhwa! EnaYe uKrestu    
      Isimanga esikhulu Lelo ‘gazi lodwaLika Jesu, Jesu Krestu Lasicithekela

title: 120 Ngi Yakholwa
content:
# 120 Ngi Yakholwa

 Baba, ngi ziletha kuWe U ng’uMsizi WenaNxa ngi zisitha ngakuWe Ngi ngaya ngaphi na?    
CHORUSNamhlanjena ngi yakholwa, uJes’ u ngi feleWachitha igazi lAkhe, Ukungikhulula    
Ngi yakholw’ eNdodaneni Engiph’ amandl’ aYoKonke ukweswela kwami Ku gcwaliswa yiYo    
Mqalisi wokukholwa kwam’ Ngi vusa amehloMa ng’amukel’ isipho sam’ Ngi philiswe ngaso

title: 121 Ngocula Ngothando
content:
# 121 Ngocula Ngothando 

        Ngocula ngaY’ uJesu Ngothando wangithandaWashiya lon’ izulu Wafa eKalvari   
 CHORUSNgocula ngaY’ uJesu, Ngi cule ngi mukhetheWafa ngi ze ngi phile, Ngocula ngob’eng’thanda   
Phambi ko-ba ngi khale uJesu wang’ khalelaPhambi ko-bang’ thandaze uJesu wang’ nxusela   
       Lunzul’ uthando lwAkhe Umhlaba u ngel’ qondeNezono zam’ ezimbi Zenziwe zabamhlophe   
      Akukho kim’ okuhle, uJesu wangithandaJehova ngamukele Ngi size ngi ku thande

title: 122 Eduze Futhi Eduze
content:
# 122 Eduze Futhi Eduze

        Eduz’ eduze Nkosi, kuWe Ngidonsele Jes’ othandekayoNgigon’ u ngisondeze kuWe Ngicashise, Nqaba yokuphumlaNgicashise, Nqaba yokuphumla    
Eduz’ eduze anginanto Engumnikelo kuJes’ iNkosiNans’ inhliziy’ ephendukayo Ma ngi gezwe egazini lAkhoMa ngi gezwe egazini lAkho    
Eduz’ eduze Jesu ngithathe Ngi del’ isono nobubi basoUkuzigabisa kususwe Ngi ph’uJesu obethelw’ emthini    
       Eduz’ eduze ngi saphila Liz’ ithemba lami lime kuWeEmnyaken’ engenakuphela Ng’sondel’ eduze Msindisi wamiNg’sondel’ eduze Msindisi wami

title: 123 Ibizo Elingcwele
content:
# 123 Ibizo Elingcwele 

     Ibiz’ elithandekayo Ngoba li dlul’ amanyeLanikezwa nguY’ uBaba eNdodaneni yAkhe.    
 CHORUSLona li yiNgcwele, Li yiNgcwele, NgcweleLavela kuBaba, leza laphaLeza ngengelosi, Lona ebusukuIbizo leNkos’ uJesu.    
    Li letha okuhle kimi Yiloba ‘ngoma yami;Ngi vuma ibizo lAkhe Ngize ngi libabaze.    
    Ngi hlokomisa indaba Yothando nokuhlengwa,Lona ngizolidumisa Ibizo lika Jesu.

title: 124 Hai Mina! Kepha ng’uKrestu
content:
# 124 Hai Mina! Kepha ng’uKrestu

 Akungabi yimi, kodwa ng’uKrestu Ozobonwa, aziwe, akhonzwe;Athandwe kuyo yonke im’cabangoOzohlonshwa, aphakanyiswe.
       Akungabi yimi, kodwa ng’uKrestuOzothokozisa osizini;Owesula inyembezi zabantuOthulisa konke ukwesaba.
uKrestu, kuphela uJesu KrestuAkufanel’ ukuzibabaza;uKrestu kuphela uJesu KrestuNgi ngazibonakalisi mina.
Akungabi yimi, kodwa ng’uKrestuOgcwalisa ukweswela kwami;uKrestu kuphela uJesu Krestu Namhlanje kuze kube nanini.

title: 125 Ukukhanya Enhliziyweni
content:
# 125 Ukukhanya Enhliziyweni

     Ku khon’ ilang’ entabeni, Ku khon’ ilang’ olwandle,Ukukhanya ku yahlala, Emangweni omuhle.Ukukhanya ku gcwalisa Umxhwele wenhliziyo;U lapho, Wena Msindisi Nangokukhanya kwAkho.    
 CHORUSO! kukhanya kwelang’ okuhle, Kukhanya enhlalweni;uJes’ u khipha usizi, Kwakhany’ enhliziyweni.    
   Ngi lahla usizi lwami Njengengubo endala;U ngembese ngokuthaba Wangipha ukubonga.Le ekhaya lobukhosi, Owang’ zuzela lona;Inhliziyo iyavuma, Nawo umoya wami.    
    uMsindisi wangithenga Se ngi ngo wAkhe mina.Ma si khanye isibane Si khanyele iNkosi;Le ekhaya lobukhosi Owang’ zuzela lona;Inhliziyo iyavuma, Nawo umoya wami.

title: 126 Seloko Ngahlengwa
content:
# 126 Seloko Ngahlengwa 

     Ngi nengom’ engiy’ thandayo; Seloko ngahlengwa.YeNkos’ eyangihlengayo; Seloko ngahlengwa.    
 CHORUSSeloko ngahlengwa, Seloko ngahlengwa,Ngi dumisa iNkosi, Seloko ngahlengwa,Ngi dumis’ uMsindisi wami.    
    Ngi noKrest’ obongekayo; Seloko ngahlengwa.Ngi fun’ eyAkhe intando; Seloko ngahlengwa.    
    ‘Ngi nofakaz’ okhanyayo; Seloko ngahlengwa.Oxosh’ umnyama novalo; Seloko ngahlengwa.    
    Ngi lungiselwa ikhaya; Seloko ngahlengwaPhakade lapho ngohlala; Seloko ngahlengwa

title: 127 Futhi, Kimi I Nothando
content:
# 127 Futhi, Kimi I Nothando

     iNkos’ i bon’ im’zwililiNayo i yizwele;Lapha i yithanda yona,I nothando kimi.    
 CHORUSFuthi kimi i nothandoNgi yaz’ i nothando;Ngo’ba i yathanda konke-I nothando kimi    
    I yaphendula imbhali;Zi khahleke kahle;Uma i zithanda zona,I nothando kimi.    
    iNkosi yenza inyoni,Nakho okukhona.I ngeze yakhohlwa yiko:I yathanda konke.

title: 128 Isikhathi Esibusisekile Somkhuleko
content:
# 128 Isikhathi Esibusisekile Somkhuleko

    Is’khathi somkhuleko, Sithob’ inhliziyo.Sisondela kuJesu, uMhlobe wethu;Siza sikholwa kuYe, oSihlangu sethu.Sithobo sokhathele!, Yeka ubumnandi!    
 CHORUSIs’khath’ esihle, Yek’ ubumnandi!Sithobo sokhathele!, Yeka ubumnandi!    
    Is’khathi somkhuleko, Nx’ uJes’ esondela.Ngesisa es’thambile, ukuzw’ abAkhe,Konke bangakubeki enyaweni zAkhe.Sithobo sokhathele!, Yeka ubumnandi!    
    Is’khathi somkhuleko, Nxa abalingwayo.Beletha kuJesu lonk’ usizi lwabo;Ngenhliziyw’ enesisa, u sus’ imithwalo.Sithobo sokhathele!, Yeka ubumnandi!    
    Ebumnandini lobu, Sithemba kuJesu.Sothol’ iz’ busiso esizidingayo;Ngokuthemb’ okukhulu singnaki lutho.Sithobo sokhathele!, Yeka ubumnandi!

title: 129 Jesu, Sibusise
content:
# 129 Jesu, Sibusise

 Jesu Wena wathi, "Nxa ku butheneAbabili nabathathu ngi khona";Si yakholw’ izwi lAkho, soguqileJesu, woza u si busise thina.
CHORUSJesu, woza u si busise sonke;Jesu, si busise u beseduze.
Jesu, u bu khona ngez’ khathi zonke,Kodwa si yakuthanda kwokuphela;Woza O! ‘Msindis’ obusisiweyoSi zwe, u s’amkele, nxa si khuleka.
Jesu, sisahlabelela sisizeUbe khon’ ekukhulekeni kwethu;Ukuz’ ithemba lethu libe kuWeI kany’ ibe mhlope indlela yethu.

title: 130 Ngi Donsel’ Eduze
content:
# 130 Ngi Donsel’ Eduze 

     Ngi ngowAkho, Nkosi ngi zwil’ izwi, Langitshela ngothando;Ngi fis’ ukuqin’ ekukholweni, Ngi donselwe eduze.    
 CHORUSNgi donseke eduze, Nkosi Lapho wafela khona;Ngi donse ‘duze ‘duze, Nkosi yam; KuWe owang’ophela.    
    Ngi zinikela ngokusha kuWe, Ngamandla amakhulu;Umoya wami u qonda kuWe, U fihleke kuJesu.    
    O! ukubamnandi kwesikhathi, Ngi phambili kwes’hlaloNxa ngiguqa ngi khuleka, Nkosi, Ngi khuluma noMhlobo.    
    Ku nothando olungaqondwayo, Ngi ngakayi phesheya;Ku nokuthokoz’ engingakwazi Ngi ngakafiki khona.

title: 131 Ngi Fuze uJesu
content:
# 131 Ngi Fuze uJesu 

        Ma ngi fuze uJesu, Yona iNkosi yami,Vuma uMsindisi wam’, Eze ahlale kimi;Ma ngi fuze uJesu, Kulo lel’ izwe pansi,Ngi swele okoMoya; Hlala nami, Msindisi.    
Nxa kukhala inyoni, Ayinake ngomusa,Ebon’ ezinye ziwa; Ngeqiniso wongizwa;Welus’ indhlela yami, Aze aze ayiqondise,Ngi thanda ngi be ngcwele; Hlala nami Msindisi.    
Ma ngi fuze uJesu, Ngi phila nsuku zonke.Ngi thanda ukuphumla, Endawen’ ethulile;Ngibe ngozelwe busha, Ngentando yAkh’ uJesuAngibe nokukholwa; Hlala nami, Msindisi.

title: 132 Eduze Nesiphambano
content:
# 132 Eduze Nesiphambano

 Eduze nes’phambano, Ku noMthomb’ omuhle; Amanzi okwelapha, Evela kuJesu.    
CHORUSEsiphambanweni, Ngodumisa mina.Lapho umoya wami Wophumula khona.    
Eduze nes’phambano, Umsa wangithola;Lapho ngakhanyiselwa, Intando ka Jesu.    
       Eduze nes’phambano, Ngi hlale neWundlu;Ngi size ‘nsuku zonke, Ngi landel’ ithunzi.    
Eduze nes’phambano, Ngothemba ngi linde;Ukuze ngi yofika, Phesheya komfula.

title: 133 Ukuhamba noNkulunkulu
content:
# 133 Ukuhamba noNkulunkulu

 O! vuma ngi hambe, Nkosi: NjengoEnok’ wayehamba;Ngi thathe ngesandla sAkho U khulume mnandi nami;Noma ngi ngabon’ indlela Kodwa ngi zohamba naWe.    
Anginako ukuhamba, Kudum’ izulu, nes’phepho.Uhlupho lu yangithiya, Izitha zi yangilinga; Kuzo lezi ‘zinhlupheko: ‘Nkosi, vuma ng’hambe naWe.    
Nxa u thath’ isandla sami, Ngi zohamba ngokwethaba.Ngesibindi endleleni, Ngi zothwal’ isisphambano;Ngize ngi bon’ amasango; O! ‘Nkosi, mang’ hambe naWe.

title: 134 Uthando Olumangalisayo Luka Jesu
content:
# 134 Uthando Olumangalisayo Luka Jesu

 Endaweni ephakeme, Umoya wami wobongaNguban’ ongasho kwenele; Ngalo uthando luka Jesu?    
CHORUS Loluthando, luyinqaba, Lona oluka Jesu;Luyamangalisa, lona, Uthando luka Jesu.    
Lunokuthul’ ebusuku, Nokukhany’ ebumnyameni.Lungumuthi kubuhlungu, Lona uthando luka Jesu.    
Yithemba lentethelelo, Luyinsika nxa ngi wayo;Nxa ngi fa noma ngi phila Yilo uthando luka Jesu.

title: 135 Ngi Kutanda Ngcono Nkosi
content:
# 135 Ngi Kutanda Ngcono Nkosi

        Ngi kuthanda ngcono, Nkosi, Kunomhlaba wonke;Loku ungiph’ ukuthula Kungechithwe lutho.   
 CHORUS Akukashiwo kwenele, Ngothand’ olunjeya!Akukashiwo kwenele, Ngegazi leliya!   
       Ngiyazi useduzane Kunawo lomhlaba.Kuhl’ ukucabanga, naWe, Kunay’iph’ ingoma.   
Wen’ ungijabulisise Ma ngi thab’ impela.Ngaphandle kothando lwAkho Mina ngi yadana.   
Msindisi wam’ oligugu, Ng’oba njani kuWe!Uma lendlela iyinhle; Nxa ngi hamba naWe!

title: 136 Ngi Khumbula iKhalvari
content:
# 136 Ngi Khumbula iKhalvari

        Laph’ esho khona ngokuya Ngi fund’ ukumthemba njalo;Ngi  khumbula ku ngenxa yam’ Ukuze af’ eKhalvari.   
CHORUSuJesu nguMholi wami, Wo ngi hola yonk’ indlela;Ng’ uMholi wami impela Ngi khumbula eKhalvari.   
       Ngi thand’ umthetho ka Jesu Ngi holwa yisandla sAkhe;I mnand’ intando yAkhe kim’ I cwebiswe yi Khalvari.   
       Ngi ya phambili nges’bindi uKrest’ u seduze kwami;Ngi themb’ uJesu ngombona, Isihlobo seKhalvari.

title: 137 Ngi Phe uJesu
content:
# 137 Ngi Phe uJesu

       Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Ubuhle balo yize;Uthando lweNkosi lumi, Yilo njalo phakade.   
 CHORUSYek’ ukudepha komusa, Nobubanzi bothando!Yek’ ubuhle bokuhlengwa, ‘Sfungo saphakade.   
       Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Isiduduzo sami;Ngalusiwe nguMsindisi Ngi yohuba kukubi.   
       Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Ngi mbon’ emomotheka;Khuthi ohambweni lwami Ngi qinise kukhanya.   
       Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Ng’thembel’ es’phambanweni;Ngize ngi bone obala Si bhekana noJesu.

title: 138 Ukuzehlukanisela
content:
# 138 Ukuzehlukanisela

 Thath’ ukuphila kwamiKulungiselw’ okwAkho;Thatha izandla zamiZenze intando yAkho.   
CHORUSNgihlanz’ egazini leWundlu (kweleNdlu)Ngihlanzisiswe eMthonjeni (eMthonjeni)Nkosi, ngamkele,Konke kube kuWeKuze kube phakade.   
Thata inyawo zamiZi gijimel’ okwAkho;Thath’ enginak’ okwamiNgi ngagodli nalutho.   
       Thatha umlomo wamiU gcwale amazw’ Akho;Thath’ enginak’ okwamiNgi ngagodli nalutho.   
       Thath’ imzuzwana yamiMa yi dumise njalo;Thatha ingqondo yamiI qondise okwAkho.   
Thatha intando yamiYona ibe nge yAkho;Thath’ inhliziyo yamiIbe ‘siHlalo sAkho.   
       Thatha umxhwele wamiNanku umcebo wawo;Thath’ ubumina bamiNanini bungo bAkho.

title: 139 Se Ngi Fumene uMhlobo
content:
# 139 Se Ngi Fumene uMhlobo

        Se ngi fumene uMhlobo, Wang’ thanda ngi ngamazi;Ngadonswa ngalo uthando, Nje wangibopha kuYe;Kuyo inhliziyo yami: Les’bopho si qinile.Jesu, ngi ngowAkho mina Kuze kube nanini.   
      Se ngi fumene uMhlobo, Wopha wangisindisa;Kungasikuphila kodwa, Kepha waz’dela Yena.Konke enginako mina Ngi kuphathel’ uMniki;Inhliziyo nenhlalo yam’ OkwAkhe naphakade.   
       Se ngi fumene uMhlobo, Onk’ amandla waphiwa;Uma engelinda mina Ngendlela yaphezulu;Ku yakhanya udumo le: Olungiqinisayo;A ngi linde ngi sebenze Phambilii ngophumula.   
       Se ngi fumene uMhlobo, Onomusa nothando;U yongiqondisa mina Ngi yofik’ ezulwini; Ku wena ongithandayo Ngi yawathol’ amandlaSi ngahlukaniswa ‘kufa! Qha ngi ngowAkho mina

title: 140 Izwi Lika Jesu
content:
# 140 Izwi Lika Jesu

 Ngezwa izwi lika Jesu; Li thi, "Woza phumla.Nxa u khathele U lale: es’fubeni sami."Ngeza kuYe uMsindisi, Ngi khathele kabi,Ngafuman’ ukuphumula. Wa ngi thokhozisa.      
   Ngezwa izwi lika Jesu; Li thi, "Bheka wenaWena owomel’ amanzi; Khothama u nathe."Ngeza kuJesu, Ngaphuza amanz’ okuphila.Wenela umoya wami; Wa vuka ngaphila.      
    Ngezwa izwi lika Jesu: Li thi, "Bheka kimiBheka kimi, sekuyasa, Kuzo khanya kuwe."Ngabheka kuYe Ngabona kona ukukhanya;Ngahamba ngok’ ukukhanya; Nga qeda uhambo.

title: 141 OwAkho Impela
content:
# 141 OwAkho Impela

 Ngi fisa ukuba ngowAkho, O Msindisi wami;Ngi fundise intando yAkho, Ngi size, Nkosi.     
 CHORUSNgi ngowAkho Nkosi,Ngi ngowAkho impelaNgi yafunga Nkosi,Ngi ngowAkho impela    
      Imfuyo yomhlaba i yini, Nkosi nxa u ngekho;Ngi yakudela konke mina Ngi zuz’ okwAkho.    
    Ngi lahla okomhlaba konke Buy’ eduze, Nkosi;KuWe nganele ngako konke  Msindisi wami.

title: 142 Yeka Ubumnandi!
content:
# 142 Yeka Ubumnandi!

     Yek’ ubumnandi bosuku!Luhle kuzo zonke;Si lahl’ im’camango yezwe;Si camang’izulu.
    O! mahl’ amazw’ okuthula,Kowamukelayo;A nosizi lwenguquko;Esisa ekhaya.
    Nanxa si xosha ukona;Amandla engekho,Lo obona inhliziyo;Yena wosisiza.

title: 143 Nkosi Busisa Ukuphuma Kwethu
content:
# 143 Nkosi Busisa Ukuphuma Kwethu

 Nkosi busis’ ukuphuma;Thabis’ umoya wethu:Si phe sonk’ uthando lwAkho;Ngomusa si yonqobaSi ph’ amandla, u sivuse;Nxa si hamba ehlane!    
Si kubonga, si dumisa;Ngelizwi leVangeli.Izithelo zosindiso;Zi bonakale kithi.Si kholele, njalo, njalo;Si neqiniso lAkho.    
Nxa insuku zethu zanda;‘Ngathi kunga ezAkho.Si kuthale mihla yonke;Si gijime, si ngemi;Si ncome udumo lwAkho,Izulu li vuleke.

title: 144 Emhlabeni Olidundu
content:
# 144 Emhlabeni Olidundu

 Ngi qond’ indlel’ enyukayo Ngi khwela zonk’ izinsuku.Ngi nguye okhulekayo; Nkosi, ngi mise phezulu.    
 CHORUSNkosi, ngi simamiseke Emhlabeni olidundu,Endaweni ephakheme Nkosi, ngi mise phezulu.    
A ngi thandi ukuhlala Lapho kunenkan’ enkulu.Kumb’ abanye, ba ngahlala, Mina ngi thanda phezulu.    
Ngiph’ inhlalw’ ehlanzekile uSathan’ u yangigwaza;Kodw’ inkolo yam’ I zwile; Nkosi, Ngi mise phezulu.    
Ngi zokhwel’ esiqongweni Ngi bone ukukhazimla;Ngi finyel’ ezulwini Nkosi, ngi mise phezulu.

title: 145 Ungazenz’ Izaba
content:
# 145 Ungazenz’ Izaba

 Ungazenz’ izaba, ku khon’ umsebenzi, Lungela ukwenza iNkos’ ekushoyo;Ukunxusa kwaYo, ku qondiswe kuwe, Yamkel’ uze wenze umsebenzi waYo.    
CHORUSWozake (namhla) uz’ u ngalanduli, Wozake (namhla) lungel’ umsebenzi;Uz’ u ngalanduli, Khothiw’ ezulwini: "Wal’ intando Yami; Waliw’ ezulwini!"    
Ungazenz’ izaba, namhla u yabizwa; Kade u ngavumi, pangis’ u lalele;Ku vuthw’ amasimu, akukho muvumi, Ma u thobe wena, wenzele iNkosi.    
Ungazenz’ izaba, balekel’ ingozi, Ncuthando loniwe, lu muka phakade;Uma u sancengwa, u tshelwa ngezulu, UJes’ esancenga: "Woz’ u thethelelwe!"

title: 146 Ukuphila Kwakho Kimi
content:
# 146 Ukuphila Kwakho Kimi

 Phila phakathi kwami, O! Jesu Nkosi yam’Ma ngizw’ ukusho kwAkho Ngokuxakeka kwam’,Phila phakathi kwami, Kuzo zonk’ izinto.Kube ‘bukosi bAkho ‘Ngi hlale ngi nento.    
Umzimba u nikelwe Ungabi nasonoMakuthi se kuvezwa OwAkho uMbuso!Nomhlaba wonk’ u thule Umzimb’ u guqulweKuhle njengo wAkho nje, ’Ze u nga phendulwa.    
Izinto zawo njalo Zi thobele WenaZi vume imithwalo Eshiwo nguWena,Zi suke zi phaphame - Noba, kubi kuhle!Zonke ma zi gijime Imihla ngemihla.    
Ma zi chume zi zothe - Zizwe izwi lAkho.Zi hlala zi lindele: Nxa uzifunayo.Phila phakathi kwami, O! Jesu Nkosi yam’Kube bukosi bAkho Nas’ ekufeni kwam’.

title: 147 Ngi Sondeze KuWe Eduze
content:
# 147 Ngi Sondeze KuWe Eduze

 Baba ngi sondeze eduze Ngifun’ u ngi gone.Ngi singath’ engalweni zAkho Ngi fun’ ukuphumla.    
CHORUSNgi sondeze ngothando, Ngi donsele phezuluNgisondeze, Ngidonse ngi ze kuWe    
Msindisi ngi sondeze kuWe Ngi ngadedi kuWe;Ngothab’ ezingalweni zAkho, Ngithi se kwanele.    
Ngi sondeze ngoMoya wAkho Ngi fanane naWe;Ng’vuse, ng’lungise, ngi hlanzeke; Ngi ze ngi bemsulwa.

title: 148 Nakuphi NoJesu
content:
# 148 Nakuphi NoJesu 

     Nakuphi noJesu ngi ngahamba nje Noma ku kuphi kulomhlaba wonke;Ngaphandle kwAkhe a ngi nakuthaba Laph’ uJesu ekhona a ngesabi.
 CHORUSNakuphi noJesu ngi ngahamba nje.Nakuphi ukwesaba a ngi kwazi
    Nxa ngi kuphi noJesu a ngi ngedwa Nxa ngi delwa ngabany’ u khona Yena;Noma ezongiholela ehlane, Nxa uJesu ekhona ku lungile.
    Nxa ngi kuphi noJesu ngi ngalala Nxa ithunzi lokufa li sondela;Noko ngi yobuya ngi vuke mina Ngi y’ezulwini ekhaya kuJesu.

title: 149 Hamba Ekukhanyeni
content:
# 149 Hamba Ekukhanyeni

 Hamb’ ek’khanyeni kweNkosi Ku zokuqondisa;uMoy’ Ovel’ ezulwini Wochith’ ubumnyama.    
CHORUS(Kathathu)  Ha . . . mba nok’khanya . . .(Thath’ ukukhany’ ukukhanya kweNkosi)(Bonke)  Hamb’ ek’khanyeni kweNkosi.    
Thath’ ubhaqa lweVangeli Lwelizwi leNkosi.Lukhanyo lwas’ ebusheni Kwabathemb’ iNkosi.
