Phath’ ubhaqa kumk’ ithunzi Nxa u sendleleni;Loxoshel’ ithunzi kude Izi fik’ iNkosi!    
Hamb’ ek’khanyeni wofunda Ngothando lweNkosiNobuhle bobudlelwana Bosis’ ezulwini.

title: 150 Baphi Abavuni Na?
content:
# 150 Baphi Abavuni Na?

     Baph’ abavuni a bazobutha  Inyand’ ezivel’ emasimini?Thathan’ amasikel’ eqiniso, Sebenzan’ u z’ uphel’ umsebenzi.
 CHORUSBaph’ abavuni? Uph’ ozayo? Ba zosiz’ ukuleth’ ukudl’ ekhaya;Uph’ ozosiza ukubutha Inyand’ ezivel’ ensimini?
    Hamban’ emendweni, ni bafune; A ngakhon’ amabel’ okhuleni.Ni fun’ emendweni nemenweni,  Ni buthel’ ekhaya ezulwini.
    Amasim’ a vuthiwe kashana, Izwe se li lindel’ ukuvunwa;Abavuni bancane kakhulu! Uma kwephuzwa ku ngonakala.
    Lethani bantu, amasikeka; Ni buthele ndawony’ amabele,Ni sebenz’ iz’ i fike iNkosi; Nothaba naYo ngabalahleki.

title: 151 Zoba Khona Inkanyezi Na?
content:
# 151 Zoba Khona Inkanyezi Na? 

  Ngi yacabanga namhla ngezwe elihle, Engiya kulo ezulwini;   Ngomsa woMsindisi ngom’ eduze kwAkhe, Woba nenkanyez’ umqhele na?    
CHORUSWoba nenkanyezi umqhele wami na?  Ekufiken ezulwini Ngi vuka nababusiswa ngi yekhaya  Woba nenkanyezi umqhele?    
  Ngamandl’ eNkosi ngo ‘ebenza ng’khuthele, Ma ngi linde, ngi zuz’ abantu Ngize ngithol’ inkanyezi ngalolosuku, Mhla edunyiswayo uJesu    
 Koba mnandi njani nxa ngi mbona Yena? Ngi beke kuYe amagugu  Kongithokozisa ngobuhl’ emzini, Ngi phiw’ inkanyezi ng’uKrestu

title: 152  Khuluma Kimi
content:
# 152  Khuluma Kimi 

 Khuluma kimi Jesu, Yisho ngezw’ elihle Nyenyeza ngokomusa, Awusele wedwa  Vul’ inhliziy’ ikuzwe, I lalele izwi  Yenz’ umoy’ u kubonge, KuWe ngi thabele
CHORUSKhuluma u nyenyeze ilizwi lothando  Njalo woba ngumnqobi, u yokhululeka Nkosi khuluma njalo, ngezwi lokuthemba Ma ngo zwe okushoyo, Awusele wedwa
 Khuluma kithi njalo, Si bonis’ indlela Si gcwalis’ intokozo, Si fund’ umkhuleko Kuthi ngokuzidela, Sibe yib’ abAkho Sheshis’ umbus’ ozayo, Si wuthokozele
 Khuluma njengendulo, lapho bazi Wena  Ngaz’ umsebenzi wami, Ngenz’ umthetho  wAkho; Ngenze ngi kudumise, Ngi sh’udumo lwAkho; Ngi vume ukuthunywa, Ngi hloniphe Wena

title: 153 Okwanamhla Nje
content:
# 153 Okwanamhla Nje 

 Nkosi, angi thandezeli kwangomuso Ma ngi ngawi esonweni okwanamhla Ma ngi ngasho lizwi ngi ngacabanganga Bek’ uphawu ez’ndlebeni okwanamhla    
  Ngo sebenza ngi khuthale, ngi thandaze Ngi zoba mnene, ngi thobe okwanamhla  Ngiph’ amandla, ngi sheshe ukuhlonipha  Ngi vum’ ukuzinikela okwanamhla    
 Uma kungathi ngi fe khona namhlanje Ma ngi ncike kuzo iz’thembiso namhla Ngak’ okwangomso a ngi kukhulekeli Ngi gcine, ngeluse, ngi bambe kwanamhla.Amen

title: 154 Mlindi, Ngitshele
content:
# 154 Mlindi, Ngitshele 

     Mlindi ngitshele ngokusa, Ngobuhle beZioni  Na ngeziboniso zAkhe,uMyeni ‘se sondele!Mhambi, Ye! suka  Qaphela Ku yasa ukukhanya Yembatha ingubo yakho Se kuzokusa, vuka!
     Mlindi, bona imisebe, Ikhanya endleleni  Iz’boniso wonk’ umhlaba Zi sh’ ilang’ elizayo  Nxa kukhala icilongo,Li vus’ abasolwandle Abangcwel’ abafileyo Ba gqokisw’ ukungafi!
     Ukukhanya ku yakhwela,  Umnyaka weSabatha; Si yamemeza ngamazwi, Umbuso useduze; Mhambi, Ye! Ngi bona ngale Ubuhle beKhenani; Nomuzi nobuhle bawo! Nokuphakama kwawo
      We’mlindi, uMnini-muzi NguMbusi was’eZioni;  Ehlel’ es’hlalweni sAkhe, U busa yonk’ imoya; Emagqumen’ akhanyayo  Anemiseve emihle; Nemithob’ empompozayo  Nembal’ enhl’ osebeni!
     Mlindi izwe li seduze Nez’ thelo azipheli Ngale O, ku yathabisa!NeMbali yas’ Edeni; Lalela ba yahlabela, Ku yeza emoyeni Nez’ gidi ziyahlabela Masinya soba nazo

title: 155  Ngoya Lapho Uthi Mangiye Khona
content:
# 155  Ngoya Lapho Uthi Mangiye Khona 

 Kungebe phezulu kwentaba Nom’ olwandl’ ol’ gubhayo Kungebe phambili empini iNkosi i yongi dinga Ngezw’ elincane ngi bizelwe Nalapho ngi ngaziyo Ngathi, Nkosi ngi bambe ngesandla Ngoya lapho u sho khona    
CHORUS:Ngoya lapho u sho khona Nkosi Entabeni nasolwandle  Ngosho lok’ okuthandayo Nkosi  Ngiyoba izinto zonke    
Kumbe, nank’ amazwi ka Jesu Ath’ a ngi washo namhla  Ngabe ku khon’ osekhoneni  Umduki ofunwayo O, Nkosi, uma u ngi hola Nom’ indlela imnyama  Ngosho ngi thi ku lungile konke Ngokusho okuthandayo    
Ku khon’ eny’ indawo epansi Emfundeni zomhlaba Lapho ngi ngasebenza khona Ngenzel’ ongifeleyo  Ngethembele konke kuYena  Ngi yaz’ u yangithanda  Ngolalela ngenhliziyo yonke  Ngibe nje okuthandayo

title: 156 Amazwi Okuthukuthela U NgawaVumeli!
content:
# 156 Amazwi Okuthukuthela U NgawaVumeli! 

     Amazwi’ amab’ u ngawasho  A phunyuk’ olimini Inhliziyo i’ Wabambe Engakonakalisi 
 CHORUSManithandane, U sh’ uMsindisi Bantwana nenz’ umnyalo weNkosi Manithandane, U sh’ uMsindisi Bantwana nenz’ umnyal’ omhle
    Uthando lu hlanzekile Nobuhlobo bu ngcwele Bu ngachithwa ngetwanyana Ku Chithwane konwanwe
     Amazwi entukuthelo  A shiwo kalulana  Onakalisa intw’ enhle Ngezwana lok’cunula

title: 157 Isikathi Sokuvuna
content:
# 157 Isikathi Sokuvuna 

     Lowo ohamba ekhaya Efaza inhlwanyelo  Angalali, enothando  U yothola umusa
 CHORUSQaphelake wena mlimi!, Amabel’ a semahle Ku sondela ukuvama, Amasim’ a vuthiwe
     A yehliswa amazoloLi khanyiswe nelanga Izithelo si zophiwa   Ngamandla aphezulu
      Wen’ u ngethuki wesabe Hlwanyela u ngadinwa Nanxa ku nzima qinisa U zobutha ngesihle

title: 158 Shesha Suku Olumnandi
content:
# 158 Shesha Suku Olumnandi 

     Ukuvunwa kwomhlaba ku sondele iNkosi i biza abavuni baYo  Kude neduz’ amabel’ a vithiwe A vuthiwe a lindel’ isibuya
 CHORUSSondez’ usuku, Thuth’ izinyanda Sondez’ usuku ekhaya
    Ukusa okungenantsizi lezo  Ku yasondela imnyak’ i qhubeka  Amabele a hatshulwe isono   Mawabuthwe kungakabi busika
    Ku mnandi ukusebenza ngothando Umful’ ongashi womthombo wezulu  Si menywa, si qutshwa yilo uthando Lon’ oluthel’ izithelo kakhulu

title: 159  Ngi Kudinga Kangaka
content:
# 159  Ngi Kudinga Kangaka 

     Nkos’ enhle ngi yakudinga Ngi mubi a ngi boni Ngibamb’ isandl’ u ngi hole Amandla kuW’ a khona
 CHORUSNgezikhathi zonke, O, Nkosi ngi yakudinga Ngezikathi zonke,O, Msindisi ngi gcine
   O, ngembese ngobunene  Eyam’ ingubo yimbi Ngi fundise ngi zibone  Ku nokufun’ amandla
   Ngi phephile nxa ngeluswa Ngokuz’themba ngi yawa  Ngi bambe ngi ngadukiswa Wena kuphila kwami
    Noma yin’ evela ngomso Ubuhle nenyembezi Umoya wami u kuWe Wena u yawuphasa

title: 160 Gcinelwe uJesu
content:
# 160 Gcinelwe uJesu 

 O, ngi gcinelw’ uJesu!,Ng’phase ngamandl’ Akhe Akukho bubi bezwe Nxa ng’landel’ uJesu    
CHORUSO, ‘ngi gcinelw’ uJesu!, Nkosi ngi yaguqa A ng’fisi, lutho! lutho! lutho! Wen, u yiko Konke    
 O, ngi gcinelw’ uJesu!, Ng’enze akushoyo YeNkosi inhliziyo I thabe kakhulu    
 O, ngi gcinelw’ uJesu!, Ngomoya ng’thobeke Ngehlukane nelizwe Ngi mnene ngobuntu    
 O, ngi gcinelw’ uJesu!, Ngi ngowAkh’ impela   Ngi be ngowAkhe njalo  Yen’ uJesu wethu

title: 161  Mina neNkosi Yami
content:
# 161  Mina neNkosi Yami

 Ngi nomhlob’ oligugu Ngi mthanda kakhulu  U nothand’ oluhle kimi U yang’thokozisa A ngi ngehlukane naYe Ngi mthand’ eseduze Sesohlala ndawonye Mina naYe   
 Ngi khathele, ng’diniwe  Yen’ u yangizwela Nxa eth’ a ngeyame kuWe Ngokusizwa nguYe U ngi hol’ ekukhanyeni Ngendlel’ ekhanyayo Sesohamba ndawonye Mina naYe   
Ngi ntshel’ insizi zamiNokuthaba kwami Ngi mtshel’ injabulo yami Nokung’ casulayo Asho engingakwenzayo Nokuzama kwami Si khulume ndaWonye Mina naYe   
Waz’ ukuthi ngondele Ukuleth’ omunye Ngako u thi, Shumayela izwi losindiso U th’ a ngi lande ngothando  Eza kufa ngalo Si sebenza ndawonye Mina naYe

title: 162 Yonke Indlela
content:
# 162 Yonke Indlela 

       uJesu u ya ngi hola  A ngi celi okunye Ngi nga sola umsa wAkhe Yena onguMholi na? Ngi nokuthul’ okwezulu, Nxa ngakhile naYeke  Ngo’ba ngi yazi ukuthi: U yeza konke kakhe.   
       Yonk’ indlel’ u yankihola Indlel’ i lula ngaYe U yangipha ukunqoba A ngi fuze ngesinkwa Nxa ngi dinwe ukuhamba Nomoya sewomile Ngi yabona ngaphambili Lomthombo wosindiso.   
       Yonk’ indlel’ u yangihola O! yek’ uthando lwAkhe Ngi yathenjiswa okuhle Endlini ka Baba le Nxa ngi thol’ impilo entsha Ngi phaphel’ ezulwini Ngi yocula njalo njalo, UJesu wongihola

title: 163 Ngi Lapha Ngi Thume
content:
# 163 Ngi Lapha Ngi Thume

        Yizwa uJesu ebiza Nguban’ ozosebenza? Amasimu a vuthiwe Nguban’ othwal’ iz’thungu? iNkosi i yamemeza Nank’ umvuzo wesihle  Uphi ozokusho athi, Ngi la Nkosi ngi thume?   
       Um’ u ngewele ulwandle U y’ekubahedeni O yobafica eduze Ba hlalelene nawe Nob’ u ngesiy’ ingelosi Nob’ u ngase Paule Woland’ uthando lweNkosi Uthi, Yafela bonke   
       Uma u ngebe uMlindi Odongeni lweZion U sho indlela yezulu Yomusa kubo bonke Ngom’thandazo nokuphana Wenz’ intando yeNkosi U kholeke njengo Aron Ephasa umprofethi   
       Nxa im’pefumlo i’ bhubha iNkosi i kubiza  Yek’ izaba zobuvila Uthi, ngi ngenze lutho Yenz’ umsebenzi u vume U jabulele wona  Ibiza shesh’ u sabele  Ngi lapha Nkosi, ng’thume!

title: 164 Ezinyaweni Zika Jesu
content:
# 164 Ezinyaweni Zika Jesu 

 Ez’nyaweni zika Jesu Ngi zw’ amazwi amahle Indaw’ enhle eligugu Ngiy’ thand’ insuku zonke Ez’nyaweni ngi qaphele Konke osekudlule Ngob’ uthando lwAkh’ oluhle  Lwazuz’ inhliziyo yam’   
Ngi ngabusiswa ngaphi na? Kuphel’ ezinyaweni Kona ngi lahla izono Ngi thol’ ukuphumula Ez’nyaweni zika Jesu  Ngi zuz’ intethelelo Ngamukele umsa wAkhe Ngi thabe nsuku zonke   
U ngi busise, Msindisi Ngi lind’ ezinyaweni Ngi bheke mina ngothando Na ngomusa omkhulu Ngi phe ingqondo kaJesu Ngize ngi fane naYe Kuze kube bufakazi Bokuthi, Ngi noJesu

title: 165 Ngi Yakuthanda
content:
# 165 Ngi Yakuthanda 

        Ngi yakuthanda Wena, Nkosi yami Ngi yakuthanda we, Msindisi wami Ngi yakuthanda, U yazike, Wena Kodw’ izenzo zi zobonakaliswa   
Ngi yathaba, Ngi yathaba kakhulu!Ukuthaba kwami okungapheli  Ngi lindel’ imfuyo yami khonale Kanye noJesu nabangcwele bAkhe   
Jesu, kanye naWe ngi busisiwe Ukuphumula kwami makwandise Lu yingoma yami uthando lwAkho Ngi yajabuliswa isisa sAkho   
Ng’ubani onje ngoMsindisi wami? U moyizela engithanda nami Ngi zomdumisa ngezingom’ ezinhle Nemifula yomusa i ngehlele

title: 166 Dwala Laphakade
content:
# 166 Dwala Laphakade 

 Wahleshulelwa mina, Dwala eliphakade!  Ma ngi zifihle kuWe,Ngi gezwe egazini Ngelashwe sonk’ isono,Ngi sinde engozini   
Ngi ngesebenze lutho,Lokukujabulisa  Noma se ngi shiseka, Ngi khala, ngi ngathuli! Kungehlawule ‘sono  NguWe osindisayo   
A ngi kaphithi lutho, Ngi guq’ es’phambanweni;Ngi nqunu, ma ngembeswe,  Ngi bheke umsa wAkho; Ngi sondel’ emthonjeni, Msindisi ma ngi hlanzwe   
Nanxa se ngi layela, Se ngi cimeza ngi fa  Se ngi shon’ emnyameni, Ngi lindel’ ukwahlulwa; Dwal’ eladatshulwayo,    Ma ngi zifihle kuWe

title: 167 Isisekelo Esiqinileyo
content:
# 167 Isisekelo Esiqinileyo 

 Isisekel’ esibekwe yiNkosi  Samiswa ukusiqinisa thina  U ngeb’ usash’ okunye ku naloko Okushiwo iBhaibhele lAkhe.Okushiwo iBhaibhele lAkhe   
Noma ngi kubizela emanzini U ngesabi ngi zoba nawe khona Ngi zophendul’ izinhlupheko zakho Ngi zenze zibe iz’busiso kuwe.Ngi zenze zibe iz’busiso kuwe.   
 Noma ngi dabula enhluphekweni Umsa wakho wanele kim’ impela Naphakathi kwelangabi lomlilo Mina ngi zokuvikela u ngashi.Mina ngi zokuvikela u ngashi.   
 Lowo owenyama kuYe uJesu   Akasoze a phontwe ezitheni Noma uSathani ezama njani   Lowo u zosinda kuY’ uSomandla.Lowo u zosinda kuY’ uSomandla.

title: 168 UJehova, Ng’uMelusi Wami
content:
# 168 UJehova, Ng’uMelusi Wami

        uJehova u ng’uMelusi wami Emadlelweni’ amahle ngi yondliwa U yangiholela ngasemanzini  Nomphefumulo wami u buyiswe   
       Ngi holwa endleleni yokulunga Nanxa ngi hambayo esigodini A ngi yikwesab’ ithunzi lokufa Ngokuba, Wena Jehova, u nami   
       Wena wendlala esam’ isithebe Emehlweni azo zonke izitha   Ikhanda lami u ligcobisile  Yaze indebe yami yachichima   
       Impel’ inhlanhla i yangilandela Ngazoke zonke izinsuku zami  Ngi yakuhlal’ endlini ka Jehova Kuze kube sekupheleni kwami

title: 169 Ndlalifa yoMbuso
content:
# 169 Ndlalifa yoMbuso 

 Ndlalifa yombuso u ngabolala U lalelan’ eduze nekhaya?  Vuka phaphama, hloma izikhali Khalipha i’skhathi si yadlula   
Izizwe zomhlaba zi yahlokoma Zi yathuthumela ngokwesaba  Lalela! amasond’ a ya gedleza Ndlalifake, u ngabolibala   
U ngalandeli izinto zomhlaba Injabulo yazo I yadlula  Dela inkanuko nemfuyo lapha Ndlalif’ u bofulahela konke   
 Phakamis’ ikhanda, qondis’ iliso  Qaphel’ umbuso ka Jes’ ozayoBhek’ u seduze nank’ u sufikile Ndlalifa thokoz’ u hlabelele

title: 170 UMenzi noMbusi Wami
content:
# 170 UMenzi noMbusi Wami

 Menzi, Mbusi wami  Ngi ya phila ngaWe  Ukupha kwAkho ngumthombo Wez’ busiso zami Ukupha kwAkho ngumthombo Wez’ busiso zami   
Mina s’dalwa sAkho  Ngi yaphila ngaWe   Nkos’ izibusiso zAkho  Zi dlul’ ukubonga Nkos’ izibusiso zAkho  Zi dlul’ ukubonga   
Nkosi ngi ngenzani? Konke ku ngokwAkho Uthando lwAkho mal’ bongwe O, kuncan’ okwami!Uthando lwAkho mal’ bongwe O, kuncan’ okwami!   
       Vus’ umoya wami Ngmandla omusa   Izwi nesifiso sami Izwi nesifiso sami  Makube okwAkho Makube okwAkho

title: 171 Bunjani Ubusuku Na?
content:
# 171 Bunjani Ubusuku Na?

    Mlindi, odongen’ lweZion’ Si tshele ngobusuku   Ikhwezi se li vele na? Kunjani ukusa na?   Nxa u beka Se kukhon’ im’sebe na?   Nxa u beka Se kukhon’ im’sebe na?       
   Si tshele ngeziboniso Ezidlula sihamba   Li sondel’ izibuko na? Si ngalibon’ izwe na?   Ngeqiniso! U sondel’ umbuso na?   Ngeqiniso! U sondel’ umbuso na?       
   Se kuyabheja, kuyasa Masihlabe umkhosi   Si bon’ ikhwezi li phuma Phezulu li manyaza   Yenamani! I sondel’ inkululo    Yenamani! I sondel’ inkululo       
    Si wufumen’ umqondiso Izwe se lis’ eduze   Si phalalela phambili Masinya si zowela    Amaphimbo Athi Wena u ngcwele     Amaphimbo Athi Wena u ngcwele

title: 172 Koze Kube Nini?
content:
# 172 Koze Kube Nini?

     Nkosi, se koba nini, U ngafikile na?    Inhliziy’ ikhathele, Ngokwephuza kwAkho;    Soba nin’ isikhathi, Esihle kakhulu,    Ukukhazimla kwAkho, Ku qhamke kwabAkho.       
   Ku nini Nkosi yomsa, U phune ekhaya?   Sewulibele kade, Bambalw’ ebalindi,   Nkos’ izinceku zAkho, Zi cwil’ ebubini.   Yingcosan’ elungile, Ekujabulele.       
   O vus’ abaleleyo, Tum’ izwi ba vuke.   Abangcwele maba thi, \"uJesu’ u sondele.\"   Mazivuth’ izibani, Zi boshw’ izinkalo.   Bonke ba lingisele, Injabul’ enkulu!

title: 173 O, Ngenkolo!
content:
# 173 O, Ngenkolo!

    Ngi fun’ inkol’ engesabi   Nom’ i sezitheni.   Engesabi ubunzima:   Benswelo nosizi.       
    Engebubule i sole,   Noma i sishaywa;   Ngesikhathi sobuhlungu,   Yencik’ eNkosini.       
   Inkolo ekhazimlayo   Zi vukil’ iz’phepho;   Engozini i ngesabi,   I ngathandabuzi.       
   I mel’ ukunyonkolozwa;   Enganak’ i hlekwa.   I ngek’ i ngwinywe lulwandle   Nobuqili bonke.       
   Nkosi  ngi ph’ inkol’ enjalo;   Noma ku ngehlani.   Ngozwa lapha ubumnandi,   Bekhay’ ezulwini.

title: 174 Yeka Kuthokozisa!
content:
# 174 Yeka Kuthokozisa!

    Li yathokozis’ ithemba;   Nxa si sebenza la. Li si ph’ amandla endlela Ohambwen’ losizi. Li si ph’ amandla endlela Ohambwen’ losizi. 
   Lis’ khombis’ ek’phumuleni;   La ku bus’ uJesu. Lapho sobon’ izihlobo, Si ngehlukaniswa. Lapho sobon’ izihlobo, Si ngehlukaniswa. 
   Izwe elingenasono;   Iziling’ azikho. Lapho kojatshulwa njalo,Kungekho s’cunulo. Lapho kojatshulwa njalo,Kungekho s’cunulo. 
   Kulelozwe akukhalwa;   Akukho nakufa. Kwabayongen’ ezulwini Ba njengez ‘ngelosi. Kwabayongen’ ezulwini Ba njengez ‘ngelosi. 
   Shesha s’khathi u ze, u ze!   ‘Nkosi shesha u ze! Si fis’ uk’kubon’ u njalo, Emzin’ wenjabulo. Si fis’ uk’kubon’ u njalo, Emzin’ wenjabulo.

title: 175 Msindisi, Nje NgoMalusi
content:
# 175 Msindisi, Nje NgoMalusi

    Msindisi, nje ngomalusi, Si hole ngomsa wAkho,   Ehlungwini lAkho sondle; U sakhele is’baya,   Jes ‘oweth’ obusisiwe! Was’ thenga si ngabAkho;   Jes ‘oweth’ obusisiwe! Was’ thenga si ngabAkho.      
   Si ngabAkh’ u bosilinda, Mqondisi wezindlela;   Si vikele esonweni, Si bone si ngaduki.   Jes ‘oweth’ obusisiwe! Yizwa O, Nkosi yethu,   Jes ‘oweth’ obusisiwe! Yizwa O, Nkosi yethu.      
   Wathembis’ ukusithola, Thina zoni nxa si nje;   U nomusa wokusipha Si gezwe si bemhlophe;   Jes ‘oweth’ obusisiwe! Si zobuyela kuWe,   Jes ‘oweth’ obusisiwe! Si zobuyela kuWe.

title: 176 Ithemba Elibusisiwe
content:
# 176 Ithemba Elibusisiwe

    Kunethemb’ elihle;   Li yigugu lona.   Kalinaki namibhinqo,   Injabulo yezwe.      
   Kukhon’ inkanyezi   Esus’ ubumnyama;   U thumele imisebe,   Yokwahlul’ ithuna.      
   Nal’ izwi lothabo,   Li yophakamisa,   Li chith’ ukwesaba konke,   Li hlebez’ uthando.      
   Izwi leKhalvari   Li thi, "U xolelwe!"   Bese ku vel’ ukukhanya,   Nethemba lezulu.

title: 177 Akukho Ubusuku Le!
content:
# 177 Akukho Ubusuku Le!

    Ezwen’ elingashazwa: Emzin’ okhanyayo;   Awusoze wa guga, Ubusuk’ abukho.      
 CHORUS     Ku yosulw’ inyembezi, Nokufa nezinsini,    Ayibalwa imnyaka ubusuk’ abukho.      
   Amasang’ aligugu; Emzin’ okhanyayo;   Im’gwaqo yigolide, Ubusuk’ abukho.      
   Amasang’ angevalwe: Emzin’ okhanyayo;   Nempilo a yipheli, Ubusuk’ abukho.      
   Ka ba dingi nenyanga: Emzin’ okhanyayo;   IWundlu li yilanga, Ubusuk’ abukho.

title: 178 U Yabuya uKrestu
content:
# 178 U Yabuya uKrestu

    Kungaba sekuseni ku phum’ ilanga Nxa ukukhanya ku dabul’ ubumnyama   Laph’ uJesu efika nob’khosi bAkhe: Ukwamukel’ abAkhe      
 CHORUS O, Nkosi koba nini na? Si sho ngenjabulo.U sefikile uKrestu, Aleluya! Amen! Aleluya! Amen!      
   Kungaba semini, kumbe kuhwalala; Kungaba mhlaumbe phakathi komnyama.   Ku vel’ ukukhanya kwenkazimbo yAkhe: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.      
   Laph’ amabandl’ ehlayo ethi: "Hosana!" Nabangcwele nezingelosi zi khona.   Yena, umkhumbi wesisa u mzungeze: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.      
   Yek’ injabulo s’enyuka si ngafanga! Akukho, sililo, kudana nakufa.   Emafwini obukhosi si hlwithelwe: uJes’ ethath’ abAkhe.

title: 179 Bheka uMyeni!
content:
# 179 Bheka uMyeni!

    U mlungele uMyeni na? Nxa eza! Nxa eza!   U mlungele uMyeni na? Nxa eza! Nxa eza!   Bheka u yeza! Bheka u yeza! Gqok’ u lindele, uMyen’ u yeza!      
 CHORUS  Bheka uMyeni u yeza, u yeza Bheka uMyeni u yeza, u yeza Bheka u yeza, Bheka u yeza Gqok’ u lindele uMyen’, u yeza      
   Mazivuthe izibani, Nxa sza! Nxa eza!   Mazivuthe izibani, Nxa sza! Nxa eza!   U za masinya, U za masinya O, mphefumlo, lindel’ uMyen’ eza!      
   Somhlangabeza si sonke, Nxa eza! Nxa eza!   Somhlangabeza si sonke, Nxa eza! Nxa eza!   U za ngempela, U za ngempela Somhlangabeza uMyeni eza!      
   Sohlabel’ uAleluya, Nxa eza! Nxa eza!   Sohlabel’ uAleluya, Nxa eza! Nxa eza!   Nangu u yeza! Nangu u yeza Cul’ uAleluya, uMyen’ eza!

title: 180 A si Wazi Umzuzu
content:
# 180 A si Wazi Umzuzu 

    Mhl’ ebuy’ uJesu, umzuzu awaziwa   Imiqondiso, i bika Yen’ u yeza    Laph’ esebuya, s’ojabula kakhulu!   A si waz’ umzuzu      
CHORUS U yeza a si linde, si lunge U yeza aleluya! Aleluya! U za ngobukhosi buka Yise ngamafu A si lwaz’ usuku      
   Ba nokukhanya abafun’ usindiso    Ba neqiniso abalambulelwayo   Iz’nduleliso zi yasho u zakuza   A si waz’ umzuzu      
   Ma si qaphele, si linde, si khuleke   Si zosebenza ize iNkos’ I fike   Si jabulele si bheke lolosuku!   A si waz’ umzuzu

title: 181 Ekulindeni Nasekuqapheleni
content:
# 181 Ekulindeni Nasekuqapheleni

 Is’khathi a saziwa sona, Ayobuya ngaso lapha;Kumbe kuyakuba ‘ntambama, Kumb’ ebusuku impela:Kumb’ ekuthatheni kokusa, Mani qaphele, ni lunge;Zi ngabocima izibani, Ma si mlinde, si mqaphele.      
CHORUSLinda qaphela, Linda qaphela,Linda qaphela, Si qaphela Wena Nkosi.      
Ngomsa wAkhe ngi yakhumbula, Intengo a s’thenge ngaYo.Wa shiy’ izindlu zobukhosi, Weza lapha emhlabeni;Ngi yazi kuhle eNkosini, Uma thina esifele,Izosifumanisa sonke Si lindele, si qaphele.      
O! Jesu Wena, Mhlengi wami, U yalaz’ ithemba lami;Eliyakubona ngamehlo, Nxa se ngi kuzw’ u ‘thi, Woza.Abanye, bona ba ngesaba Nxa u qhamuka, Mahluli,Qa, mina ngi thol’ isihlobo Ngi zolinda, ngi qaphele.

title: 182 Ukusa Okubhejayo
content:
# 182 Ukusa Okubhejayo 

 Ukusa ku yeza masinyane, uJes’ u yeza;Ukuba athabathe abAkhe, A bas’ ekhaya.     
CHORUSSi bona ukusa okubhejayo, Bu yadlul’ ubusuku,O! imisebe ebonakalayo, I vus’ iz’thuku.      
Se li zakuyiswa ivangeli, Ezizwen’ zonke;Kasoze o libale uMyeni Yi sh’ icilongo!      
Zi yakumphelekezela, Zonke Izingelosi,uJesu nxa ezothath’ abAkhe Kophel, usizi.      
Abakithi abakade bafa ba yakubonwa,Inyembezi zokulilelana zi yakwesulwa.

title: 183 Bambelela Ngize Ngi Buye
content:
# 183 Bambelela Ngize Ngi Buye

     Sihl’ is’thembiso, kwabakholwayo,    Masinya ngi yeza ngithath’ abAmi,    Bamba ngi yeza, yinkul’ ingozi;    U ngalali njengabanye, lindela!      
CHORUSBamba ngi yeza, sihl’ isithembiso,Umbus’ u buyile, Wowunikwa,Woz’ u jabule, hlal’ embusweni,Im’qhel’ i lindile, bamba ngi yeza.      
Solindela zi vuth’ izibani;Kwabany’ u fika njengesel’ eb’suku,U sesondele, a saz’ usukuNjengokuhluma, ku khomba ihlobo.      
Ithemba lethu la khel’ ezwini,Ukuqhamuka okuhle kweNkosi,Kwedlula zonke izithembiso:Bamba ngi yeza, qina ngize ng’fike.

title: 184 Thabani iNkosi Iyeza
content:
# 184 Thabani iNkosi Iyeza

 Thabani iNkos’ iyeza, Yamkeleni nonke!Yilungiselen’ indawo,Ni bonge uMbumbi, Ni bonge uMbumbi.Ni boni bonge uMbumbi.      
Thabani iza kubusa! Dumisani Yena,Nxa amasimu namatshe,Ebonga iNkosi, Ebonga iNkosi.Ebo-ebonga iNkosi.      
U zobusa uJehova! Dumisani Yena,Ngobukhosi bokulunga,Kwaziswe uthando, Kwaziswe uthandoKwazi- kwaziswe uthando.

title: 185 Ukuba Khona
content:
# 185 Ukuba Khona

 Si yokhuluma ngekhaya, Nelizw’ elivundileyo,Ilizwe lakhona lihle, Nokuhlala khona kuhle!Si khuluma ngezindlela; Nangendong’ ezikhanyayo,Li yamangalisa lona Kunjan’ ukuhlala khona.      
Si yasho akuko sono, Nosizi nokuhlupheka;Laph’ izilingo azikho, Kunjan’ ukuhlala khona!Si yakhuluma ngothando, Nezingub’ ezambathwayo.Ibandla loqobo lile, O kuhl’ ukuhlala khona!.      
Ngi lungile lapha mina; Ngize ngi ye ezulwini,Masinyane ngi zokuzwa, Ubumnandi bakhona le.Si zohamb’ emasimini, Ngobukhosi obukhulu,Izingelosi za khona, Kanye noJesu ngokwAkhe.

title: 186 Nkosi, Si Hlangene
content:
# 186 Nkosi, Si Hlangene

 Nkosi, si hlangene,Kuyo indlu yAkho;Woza naWe sesi ngeneEbusweni bAkho.      
Inhliziyo yethuIyakugulela;Nawo umphefum’lo wethu,U yakukhalela.      
Ukunxusa kwaAkho,Baba, ma si kuzwe;Nxa kuphenywa izwi lAkhoNaWe ma si kuzwe.      
Ma u si lungiseThina bantu bAkho;Nxa si bhubha, si buyeleOthulini lwAkho.

title: 187 Yokwehlukana Ingoma Yethu
content:
# 187 Yokwehlukana Ingoma Yethu

 Msindisi, futhi si hlabelela,Ingoma yethu yokwehlukana;Si bheke ukubusiswa nguWe,Izwi lokuthula ma si phiwe      
Size si goduke nokuthula;Nanxa si vuka, nanxa si lala;Lind’ im’lomo nenhliziyo zethu,Nxa se si zophuma kuyo lendlu      
Si ph’ukuthula ekuphileni,U si duduze ekukhaleni,Lapho o thi kithi, ku phelile!    Nkosi, si bize size si phum’le

title: 188 Wafa Ngenxa Yami
content:
# 188 Wafa Ngenxa Yami

 Ngi ngomkhulu umoni, uJesu wangifela,Waf’ ukuba ngi phile, Waf’ ukuba ngi ngafi.Njengegatsh’ evinini, Se ngi ngoWakhe nami.      
Lud’ uthando lweNkosi, Phezulu, lu phakeme;Lu yadlula ulwandle, Lu yahlala anini;Lwangizuza ngi sona, Ngangingamdingi Yena      
Nakhona ngi ng’umoni, Ukrestu yiko konke;Ukwazi kahle konke, Ukuhlupheka kwami;Ngi zophephela kuYe, Emhlabeni ozayo

title: 189 Akukho Muzi Omileyo Lapha
content:
# 189 Akukho Muzi Omileyo Lapha

 Asakhil’ impela lapha,Si ngabahamb’ emhlabeni;Umoya weth’ u thokozaSi cabang’ umuz’ ozayo    Si cabang’ umuz’ ozayo.      
Asakhil’ impela lapha’Si fun’ umuz’ osithele;iZion’ iNkos’ ikuwo,I khanya kube phakade,I khanya kube phakade.      
Indaw’ enhle yokuthula,Yokuphumuz’ abahambi;Engazathi ngi ngaphapha,Ngi phumule khona mina,Ngi phumule khona mina      
Thula moya wami, thula!iNkosi i yakusisho;Son’ is’khathi sokuhamba;Ma ngi zame lapha minaMa ngi zame lapha mina

title: 190 Ibizo Eliyigugu
content:
# 190 Ibizo Eliyigugu

 Thath’ ibizo lika Jesu, We mntwana, wezinhlungu,Yebo li yathokozisa, Ngako Yamkela lona     
 CHORUS     Ibizo, O, luhle!    Gugu lasezulwini    Ibizo, O, lihle!    Injabul’ emhlabeni      
 Thath’ ibizo lika Jesu, Li yasithokozisa, Nxa u hanqwa izilingo Themba ku lelibizo     
 O, ibizo lika Jesu! Li yasithokozisa, Nxa esesamkela thina Si mhlabelele Yena     
 Si guqa ngebizo lAkhe, Si we phambili kwAkhe, Ey’ iNkosi enomqhele, S’omdumisa phakade

title: 191 Isithembiso Esiqinileyo
content:
# 191 Isithembiso Esiqinileyo

 Ngeqinis’ uJesu ngowami, Yeka ubumnandi baphezuluManje ngi y’indlalifa nami; Egezw’ egazini leWundlu.     
 CHORUSNgi yathokoza ngalengoma; Ngi yadumisa uMsindisi,Kim’ u ligugu yonk’ imihla Ngi dumis’ owam’ uMsindisi.     
Ku phelele ukuthokoza, Ngi yabona okuthabisayo,Ingelosi zi ngi lethela, Ukunyenyezake kothando.     
Konke kimi ukuphumula, Ngi kuMsindisi ngi yathokoza:Ngi mi ngi bheke phezulu le! Ngi gcwele okwAkh’ ukulunga.

title: 192 Dumisa iBizo LAkhe
content:
# 192 Dumisa iBizo LAkhe

     Esiphambanweni laphaya, uMsindisi wachith’ igazi    Nami khona ngagezisiswa Dumisa Yena    
 CHORUS    Dumisa Yena, Dumis’ ibizo   Lapho kwahlanjwa inhliziyo, Dumisa Yena    
    Si khulu sona isimanga! Ngi sindisiwe ezonweni;    Ku mnand’ uJes’ u hlala nami Dumisa Yena.    
    Emthonjen’ ophilis’ izoni Ngi thabile se ngi ngenile;    uJesu u se ngi hlambile Dumisa Yena.    
    Woza kuloMthombo omnandi, Khuwo u ziphonse namhlanje;    U hlanjisiwe, u phelele Dumisa Yena

title: 193 Indlela yAkhe Nawe
content:
# 193 Indlela yAkhe Nawe

 U thand’ ukuphil’ uJesu u msulwa na? U ngahamba naYe engcingweni na?Kamb’ u ngamnika yonk’ imthwalo athwale na? Vumel’ intando yAkhe.
CHORUSAmandl’ Akhe angakuphendula, Igazi lAkhe li ngak’ khululaUthando lwAkhe lu gcwale kuwe; U thand’ u vumel’ intando yAkhe.
U vum’ akukhulule, wenz’ aku shoyo na? U thand’ ukuthul’ u dele konke na?U fun’ akusindise ungab’ u sawa na? Vumel’ intando yAkhe.
U thand’ ukuphumul’ embusweni wAkhe na? Wazini akusiza ngayo wena? U ngamsebenzela ngako konk’ onako na? Vumel’ intando yAkhe.

title: 194 Uthando Ekhaya
content:
# 194 Uthando Ekhaya

     Kuhl’ endaweni zonke, ngothandw’ ekhaya,    Kuhle umsindo wonke, ngothandw’ ekhaya,    Ukuthula nenala, kuchume yonk’ indawo,    Is’khathi asizwakali, kukuhl’ ekhaya.    
 CHORUS    Uthando ekhaya, Is’khathi asizwakali, Ngothandw’ ekhaya    
    Ku jatshul’ efukwini, ngothandw’ ekhaya,    Kakukho sicanulo, ngothandw’ ekhaya,    Indlel’ ihlotshisiwe, yonk’ indawo i yihle,    Konke ku jabulise, ngothandw’ ekhaya.    
    Phezulu ku yathatshwa; Ngothandw’ ekhaya;    Umhlab’ u gcwel’ ubuhle, Ngothandw’ ekhaya.    Imfundlan’ ihlokoma,Izulu li cwathile.     iNkos’ i yathokoza, iNkos’ i yathokoza.    
    Jesu ng’enze owAkho, ngothandw’ ekhaya    Ngi zidele njengaWe, ngothandw’ ekhaya    Ngophepha engozini, Ngi ngakhathazwa bubi    Ngi busisiwe nguWe, Ngothandw’ ekhaya

title: 195 O, Yeka Umlilo Lowo!
content:
# 195 O, Yeka Umlilo Lowo!

 Ngi yafuna lowo mlilo,Wabangcwele basendulo;Wabaqondis’ ezulwini,Benesibind’ engozini.
U phi Nkosi lowo MoyaOphawul’ uAbrahama;Owathambis’ uPaule,Wazuz’ amandla ezulu.
Amandl’ abe kuElijah,A saphela yini namhla?;A khazimlis’ uMosisi,uJobe wabekezela.,
Nkosi, khumbula endulo,Pind’ u thele umsa wAkho;Nxa si zibhekise kuWe,Thel’ uMoya wAkh’ oNgcwele.

title: 196 A Khon’ Amandl’ eGazini
content:
# 196 A Khon’ Amandl’ eGazini

     U fis’ ukwethulwa isono na? A khon’ amandla egazini;    U fis’ ukunqoba okubi na? A khon’ amandl’ egazini.
 CHORUS   A khona mandla egazini, LeWundlu leWundlu   A khona mandla egazini, Gazin’ elihle leWundlu
    U fis’ ukudela ulaka na? A khon’ amandla egazini;    Woza u zohlanzwa kulo wena A khon’ amandl’ egazini.
    U yafisa ukuba mhlophe qhwa! A khon’ amandla egazini;     Woza u zohlanzwa kulo wena A khon’ amandl’ egazini.
      U ngesebenzele iNkosi na? A khon’ amandla egazini;      U fisa ukuyidumisa na? A khon’ amandl’ egazini.

title: 197 Akukho Sigodi Esimnyama
content:
# 197 Akukho Sigodi Esimnyama

     Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza;    Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza;    Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza;    Nxa ezothath’ abAkhe.
 CHORUS    Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe,     Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe,    Akukh’ okositha nx’ uJes’ eza    Ebayisa ekhaya
    Kungebekho ‘nsizi nxa’ uJes’ eza;    Kungebekho ‘nsizi nxa’ uJes’ eza;    Kungebekho ‘nsizi nxa’ uJes’ eza;    Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe.
    Akuy’ ukulilwa nx’ uJes’ eza;    Akuy’ ukulilwa nx’ uJes’ eza;    Akuy’ ukulilwa nx’ uJes’ eza;    Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe.
    Kohlatshelwa mnandi nx’ uJes’ eza;    Kohlatshelwa mnandi nx’ uJes’ eza;    Kohlatshelwa mnandi nx’ uJes’ eza;    Nxa ezo thath’ abAkhe.

title: 198 Isihlobo Esihle NguJesu
content:
# 198 Isihlobo Esihle NguJesu

        O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu Nxa u hanqiwe izinsizi.       Woqinis’ inhliziyo, Asuse lonk’ uvalo.       O, isihlob’  esihl’ uJesu!
 CHORUS    Isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu, Esihl’ insuku ngensuku    Nxa u wa wokusiza, Nxa u khala wokuzwa,    O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!
   Yek’ isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu, U za kimi a ngi duduze.   Ngencikile kuYena, Ngi ngehlelwe nayini.   O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!
       Nxa ngedlul’ ethunzin’ losizi, Amanz’ eJordan’ egubhuza;       Ngi ngeshaywe luvalo, uJesu u nosizo.       O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!
    Nxa si fik’ ezulwin’ ekhaya, Nezingcwele sibendawonye;    Sohlabelel’ ogwin, Si bonge si ngaphezi.    O, isihlob’ esihl’ uJesu!

title: 199 Makubongwe uNkulunkulu
content:
# 199 Makubongwe uNkulunkulu

 Makubongw’ iNkosi ngekwenzileyo,Yathand’ ilizwe yasiph’ uJesu;Wadel’ ukuphila ngezono zethu,Wavula isango si ngene ngalo.    
 CHORUS Bongani iNkosi, mawuzwe umhlaba,Bongani iNkosi, yenamani ‘bantu,Wozani kuYise ngay’ iNdodana;Nimnike udumo ngakwenzileyo.    
Yek’ inkululo ithengwe ngegazi!Sithembiso seNkosi kokholwayo;Isoni esibi esikholwayoMasinya si yaxolelwa nguJesu.    
Kukhul’ akwenzile wakufundisa;Inkul’ intokozo ngay’ iNdodana,Koba kuhle kuphakame, kumsulwa;Lapho si bona senyuka noJesu.

title: 200 Ngcwele!, Ngcwele!, Ngcwele
content:
# 200 Ngcwele!, Ngcwele!, Ngcwele

     Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Nkosi Somandla!S’odumisa Wena ngovivi lokusa;Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Wena u nomusa,U yabusa njalo, Wena Nkosi.
    Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! U yadunyiswa,Izingelozi zi guqa kuWe, wedwa;Izigidi zi ya Zi khuleka kuWe,Ongepheliswe nanini nguWe.
    Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Wen’ osithiweNoko iso lomuntu, li ngekubone;Kakh’ omunye ogcwele Ngaphandle kwAkho,U phelele, u namandla onke!

title: 201 Zangethusa Inhlonze Zika Jehova
content:
# 201 Zangethusa Inhlonze Zika Jehova

     Zangethus’ inhlonze zika Jehova,    Nxa izono zami zingicwilisa,    Ngamemez’ iNkosi ngis’ odakeni,    Ngesisa yangibeka ekoneni
 CHORUS     Yang’ khip’ odaken’ ol’bishayo,     Yangiqinisa eDwaleni,     Yafak’ ingoma kimi namhla,     Yokuvula Haleluya! 
     Yangigodl’ eDwaleni eduze kwaYo,     Ngasimama lapho ngisemi njalo,     Noma kunjani ngingephinde ngiwe,     Ngomusa wayo ngizuze umqhele! 
     Yangiph’ ingoma entsha yokudumisa,     Ubusuku nemini ngoyivula,     Kuchichim’ inhliziyo ngenjabulo,     Ngibon’ uMhlengi wami njalo njalo. 
     Sengobabaza engikwenzelweyo,     Baze bonke bakubone ngamehlo,     Kwandisw’ insindis’ eduze nakude     Bathembele kuNkulunkulu bonke. 
 Chorus     Wang’ khip’ odaken’ ol’bishayo     Wangiqinisa eDwaleni     Wafak’ ingoma kimi namhla     Wokuvula Haleluya!

title: 202 Qhuba Mina
content:
# 202 Qhuba Mina

  Nkosi Jesu ngiqhube Phakathi kwamalingo, Aduma yonk’ indawo Wena Dwala ngifihle, Is’qondiso esAkho Nkosi Jesu, ngiqhube.     
 Njengengan’ ithuliswa Ungathulis’ ulwandle. Amanz’ ayalalela Uma uthi, Thulani! Wena, Mbusi wolwandle Nkosi Jesu, ngiqhube     
 Nxa ngondela ogwini Namaza egubhuza, Esitha ukuphumula Nxa ngincik’ es’fubeni Mangizwe uthi kimi, Ungesabi qhubeka

title: 203 O, Masisakaze!
content:
# 203 O, Masisakaze!

  O, masisakaze Indaba ezinhle, Ebantwinibonke, Endaweni zonke, Ulim’ lwamaKrestu Malusho kakhulu.     
ChorusNang’ uMthokozisi, Nang’ uMthokozisi,Yena ufikile Ephum’ ezulwini,KuBaba iNkosi O, makusakazwe, Laku khon’abantu, Nang’ uMthokozisi!    
Budlul’ ubusuku, Nans’ imin’ enkulu, Sathul’ isililo,Nolak’ olulwayo,Phezu kwamagquma, Liyadlul’ ilanga    
Bheka nans’ iNkosi, Ipheth’ insindiso, Yomunt’ othunjiwe,Ukuz’ akhululwe EbumnyamenileKuvulwe kahlehle!    
Ye’ alunqamuki Uthando lweNkosi, Mabatshelwe ngalo Abangaqondiyo, Ngomsa mina ‘soni Ngofana neNkosi    
Hlabe lunkenteze es’bhakabhakeniAbangcwel’ ezulwini Baphendule phansiHlabela ngothando, Olungephele qha!

title: 204 Buya, Mzuli Buya
content:
# 204 Buya, Mzuli Buya

 Ezwen’ lezihambi, laph’ uyekhona, Yizwa izwi lithi, Ndodana yam’    
ChorusBuya mzuli buya, buyel’ ekhaya, U lahlekile kude, Woz’ ekhaya    
Ezwen’ lendlala, Uphel’ amandla, Woz’ uzojabula, Ndodana yam’    
Shiya izinhlanya, Suk’ osizini, Ugul’ emoyeni, Ndodana yam’    
Umnyang’ uvuliwe, U se ngowanmi, Ngi sa ku bhekile, Ndodana yam’    
U zulele kude, Woqhubeka na? Ngi ku thethelele, Ndodana yam’    
Woza ekudleni, Aukhohliwe Woza enaleni, Ndodana yam’    
Au nazihlobo, Au nakhaya, Ngi kuthanda njalo, Ndodana yam’

title: 205 Esanyenyeza UJesu
content:
# 205 Esanyenyeza UJesu

 UJesu enyenyeza, Woza moni! Nxa si kukhulekela, Woza moni! Ku yilithub’ elihle, Woza moni! Ku yisikhathi manje, Woza moni!    
Unomthwalo onzima?, Woza moni! U yakukuphumuza, Woza moni!UJesu kakhohlisi, Woza moni!U ya kunik’ ubomi, Woza moni!    
O, yizwa esancenga, Woza moni!U yakukubusisa, Woza moni!Kuwe u yanyenyeza, Woza moni!Nxa si kukhulekela, Woza moni!

title: 206 Wenzeni Na?
content:
# 206 Wenzeni Na?

 Nganikela ukuphila kwami ngawe,Ukuze u be ngohlengiweyo wena,Nganikela ukuphila, Wa ngi nikani na?Nganikela ukuphila, Wa ngi nikani na?    
Indlu ka Baba ekhanyayo kakhulu,Ngayishiya, ngeza ngaba nesizungu ,Ngakushiya, ngakushiya konke ngenxa yakho,Wena, washiyani ngenxa yomsebenzi wami?    
Ngahlupheka oku ngalinganiswayo;Ukukhulula wena ekubhubheni, Ngakushiya, ngakushiya konke ngenxa yakho,Wathwalani wena ngenxa yomsebenzi wami?

title: 207 Ngabon’ Othile Emthini
content:
# 207 Ngabon’ Othile Emthini

  Ngabon’ Othile emthini Loph’ igazi kuYe, Amehl’ Akh’ ez’nyembezeni Ngam’ eduze kwAkhe.    
Wangikukisisa njalo Ngofa ngingakholwa,Ngathola enye ingqondo Kungekh’ engakuzwa.    
Impela waz’del owathi Konke ng’kuxolele!Bangezwa bonke ngegazi Liyahlaulela.    
Ukufa kubek’ obala Ububi besono;Imfihlakalo yesisa Yenz’ intethelelo.

title: 208 Nyathela Ngokhuthamba
content:
# 208 Nyathela Ngokhuthamba

 Thulani, thulani ku yanyenyezwa.Thulani, yizwani Nazise izwi.    
 Chorus Nyathel’ u nyonyoba, INkos’ i lapha, Nyathel’ u nyonyoba, I khona lapha.     
 Thulani, thulani, Lendaw’ ingcwele, Lomusa ilizwi, Se li thunyiwe.     
  Thulani, thulani Si sh’ umthandazo,   Si zwa ngeEdeni, Ngawo lomzuzu.     
Thulani, thulani Mukhulu musa,Thulani, thulani Si lind’ iNkosi

title: 209 O, Ngibe Ne Nkosi
content:
# 209 O, Ngibe Ne Nkosi 

  O, ngibe neNkos’ eduze Insika enkulu,  Ubhaq’ ol’khanyisa kude Indlela yeWundlu     
 Buya Jub’ el’Ngcwele, buya S’thunywa esimnandi, Ngizond’ ongakuthandiyo Kwaku xosha kimi.     
 Ngangi nokuthula ngaWe Ngisakukhumbula, Kusavuka njalo ngaWe Umoya Wok’thula.    
 Usithandwa esikhulu Noba sinjani nje! Sihle sivela phezulu Ngiyas’khonza sinje.

title: 210 Yena UKrestu Usihlengile!
content:
# 210 Yena UKrestu Usihlengile!

   Yen’ uKrestu usihlengile,  UMsindis’ osimanga Sihlengiwe, kuhlauliwe      
 Chorus  UMsindis’ osimamga!, UMsindis’ osimamga!  Ong’ uJesu wami UMsindis’ osimanga!, YiNkosi yami!      
  Ungihlanze egazini,  UMsindis’ osimanga Ung’buyisel’ eNkosini.      
  Usus’ inhliziyo embi,  UMsindis’ osimanga! Manj’ ubusa ngaphakathi      
  Ungaphal’ imini yonke,   UMsidis’ osimanga! Ngikholele ‘nsuku zonke.      
  Ungiph’ amandl’ okunqoba,   UMsindis’ osimanga! Ngiphumelele ngilingwa      
Sengimph’ inhliziyo yami,UMsindis’ osimanga! Izwe alihambi nami.

title: 211 Zi Yeza Izibusiso
content:
# 211 Zi Yeza Izibusiso

  Zi yeza izibusiso Yiso isithembiso, Ku ya kuvela umusa Nothando KuMsindisi.     
 Chorus  Izibusiso, Izibusiso zethu,  U yasiwela umusa, Si cela iz’busiso     
 Ziyeza izibusiso, Sothol’ imvuselelo, Phezu kwentaba Ni yezwa Izulu se liyana     
 Zi yeza izibusiso Mazize kithi, Nkosi Gcwalisa izethembiso Nkosi, u si qinise     
  Zi yeza izibusiso Size si vum’ izono,  Ku hle zi ze khona lapha Si hlanze Jesu namhla.

title: 212 Khufika Kimi Ubumnandi
content:
# 212 Khufika Kimi Ubumnandi 

    Kufika kim’ ubumnandi Bok’hlabelela ngiphinde,    Ngicule futhi nafuthi Ngesiph’ esihle seNkosi     
 Chorus   Ukuthula, Ukuthula, Isipho esimnandi,   O, kumangalisay’ ukuthula,  Sipho sothando se Nkosi     
  NgoKrestu ukuthula kwavela Ngokufa ngahlawulelwa,   Asikh’is’sekelo, Esidlula lesisipho.     
  UJesu sengiMbek’ umqhele Yagcwala eyam’inhliziyo  Zibusisa zakhe zodwa Ngazuza ukuthula.     
  KuJesu nginokuthula Nxa nginaye kuhl’ impela  Akuveli luth’olunye Ngaphandle kokuthula.

title: 213 Ingoma Yami
content:
# 213 Ingoma Yami

  Jesu Msindisi wami U yingoma yami  U nguMsindisu wami Osizini lwami     
 Chorus  Jesu Msindisi wami, ngohlabela ngawe Asikho isihlolo, Esifana nawe     
 Nguwe ithemba lami Yonk’ imnyaka yami Nakuwo amathunzi U yingoma yam’     
 Jesu ‘liThemba lami Ungu Mholi wami Uyisithandwa sami Lapha emhlabeni     
 U nge yam’ injabulo Ezweni lesono Ngothaba ngawe njalo Ezulwini lakho

title: 214 Kamb’ UJesu Uyanaka Na?
content:
# 214 Kamb’ UJesu Uyanaka Na?

   Kamb’ uJesu ‘nak’ inhliziyo,  Ijabule icula, Imthwal’ inzima,   Elethusizi, Kwenzi indlel’ ekathazayo.     
 Chorus   Uyanaka Ngi yamazi U yangidabukela;  Nxa ngiphel’ amandla   Nxa ngingalali, Uyang’ nak’ uJesu     
  Kamb’ uJes’ unak’ indlela yam?  Ngi novalo ngenqena, Kumnyam’ emini,   Sekuhwakele, Kamb’ usondel’ eduze kwam’?     
  Kamb’ uJes’ unak’ imizamo  Yokulwa nez’ lingo zam?  Ebuhlungwini, Ngingaphumuli Nenyembezi emehlweni?     
  Kamb’ uJes’ unaka nxa ngithi,   Sala sihlobo, ngifa, Ngidabukile,  Uthin’ uJesu Kamb’ uyanginaka yini?

title: 215 Linda U Ngasoli
content:
# 215 Linda U Ngasoli

  Ikhay’ elethembekayo Lapho ku ngekh’ inkathazo Ikhay’ elibusisiwe Sohlala si phunyuziwe     
 Chorus  Wena Linda, u bekezele Wena Lind’ ungaze wasola  Linda Linda, Linda, u ngasoli     
 Nxa u sindwa imithwalo Oyinikiwe ng’uThixo Ikhaya u lizondelele Linda u zubekezele     
 Nxa u sindwa imithwalo Kumbula kuye ekhanda, Nxa i nosiz’ inhliziyo Yena wayenalo njalo.     
 Noma ku nzima qhubeka U ngakhohlwa kukhuleka Ku seduze ukuphumla Linda u ngaze wasola.

title: 216 Wedwa?
content:
# 216 Wedwa?

  Wedwa? Angingedwa um’ uJes’ ekhona, Ngijatshuliswa nguYe, ngiyazi ukhona Zungu? Qha! uJes’ ukhon’ isihlobo sami,  Kaguquki kuze kube sekupheleni     
 Chorus Qha! Angingedwa, Qha! Angingedwa, Khasoze angishiye ngedwa  Soze ngasala ngedwa, sala ngedwa     
 Ngiwe? Ngingewe ngis’ es’fubeni sAkhe, Ngenelisiwe ukuphumula phakade Lutho?  Ngeyame kakhulu nginge lutho  Yona ingalo kaJesu kim’ inosizo     
 Yini? Ngilindele ngob’ uthi, ngenzani?  Ngimangale iNkosi ilibele ngani? Mnandi!  Kumnandi okungena kushiwo  Isisekelo seNkos’ esinenjabulo

title: 217 Yebo, Msindisi Wangithanda, Bo’
content:
# 217 Yebo, Msindisi Wangithanda, Bo’

  Yebo, Msindisi wangithanda bo?  Nkosi manginga kuncishi lutho, Ngothando umoya wami uzothoba, Ushesh’ ukuthetha into yAkho.     
  Uyang’ shwelezel’ esihlalweni,  Ngehluleka ngibhek’ ezulwini,   Ngisize Jesu, ngithwale is’phambano,  Bese ngithandazel’ into yAkho     
  Ngiph’ inhliziyo efana naWe  Kuze ‘nsuku zonke ngibe naWe   Ngiqal’ umusebenzi, ngenz’ isenzo somsa   Ngibuyis’ omunye, into yAkho     
 Konke enginako isipho nje!  Ngentokozo kungo kw’Akho konke, Kuth’ uma ngibona Yena ngeneliswe. Njalo-na-njalo ngiy’ into yAkho

title: 218 Sinye Isisekelo
content:
# 218 Sinye Isisekelo

  Sinye isisekelo seBandla nguJesu, Isidalwa esisha ngamanzi, nangezwi,  Walenza umakoti wAkhe oligugu  Lathengwa ngegazi, walifela lingafi     
 Labakhethw’ emhlabeni wonke, kodwa linye, Umgomo walo, yiny’ iNkosi, kuny’ uk’ kholwa Liny’ igam’ el’ingcwele, kuny’ ukudl’ okungcwele; Kukhon’ ithemba linye nokubekezela     
  Liyahlekwa, liyacindizelwa kakhulu;  Yisith’ esus’ uJesu lapho limi khona,  Abangcwele bahamba bebheke phezulu,  Masinya ukukhala kuzonyamalala     
 Enkathazweni nasekulingweni kwalo, Lilinde ngokuthula umvuz’ ongapheli;  Kuthi ekugcineni lithol’ isi’busiso  Ibandl’ el’vele lidumisa lingayeki!

title: 219 Ngi Hole O, Jehova!
content:
# 219 Ngi Hole O, Jehova!

   Ngihole Wena Jehova Ngi ngumhambi,   Nkosi yam’ U namandla, angi nawo Ngiya wacela kuWe  O, Msindisi! NguWe oSihlangu sam’     
    Lowo Mtombo wosindiso Owavulwa ngenxa yam’    Ma uvele umpompoze Uzigez’ izono zam’    O, Msindisi! NguWe oLusizo lwam’     
    Ngifikile eJordani Susa ukwesaba kwam’    U zungi phelekezele Yiba ungu Msizi wam,    O, Msindisi! NguWe oliThemba lam’

title: 220 Lakith’ Izwe
content:
# 220 Lakith’ Izwe

    Lakith’ izw’ ekhaya, Zwe lenkululeko!   Le akumnyam’ ekhaya, Alisibekeli    Ngifis’ ekhaya kithi, Iy’khal’ inhliziyo    Abukho ub’hlung’ ekhaya, Lapho ngiya khona.     
  Eyam’ iNkos’ ekhaya, Nezidalw’ ezinhle!  Asikh’ ison’ ekhaya, Akhuko ‘isilingo!  Kuhutshw’ ingoma ekhaya, Ikhal’ endlebeni;  Uma ngicabang’ ekhaya, Inyembezi zehle;  Uma ngicabang’ ekhaya, Inyembezi zehle.     
 Abakhiley’ ekhaya, Bang’qhwebela kubo,  La lungekho usizi, Olungen’ ekhaya, O, ngezwe lakith’ el’hle!, O ngokuphumula! Krestu sibuyis’ ekhaya, Ngothand’ ol’hlengayo.

title: 221 Nxa Likhala Ijuva
content:
# 221 Nxa Likhala Ijuva

  Nxa likhala ijuba ke Lenza kube kuhle kimi, Bese ngicabang’ iNkosi Ngi khumbule eGalile.    
ChrousO! Galile elimnandi, Lapha kwakuthand’ uJesu,O! Galile ‘lihuhlaza, woz’ uhlabelele kimi!    
Lapha ku geleza ‘manzi Laph’ inyoni zi yabonga Zi dumisa ngalilanga Ngodumo lwase Galile.    
Nxa ngi bala kwakhona le NgaYe owa hamb’ olwandhle,Ngi kufisa kodwa kandwa kanye Ukumlandel’ eGalile.

title: 222 Ez’ngalweni Z’ka Jesu Mina Ngiphephile
content:
# 222 Ez’ngalweni Z’ka Jesu Mina Ngiphephile

 E’ngalweni zika Jesu, Mina ngiphephile,Lapha ngothando lwAkhe Wophuml’ umoya wami,Zwan’ izwi lez’ngelosi Liza ngengoma kimi! Phakathi kwobukhosi Phesheya kolwandle.    
 Chorus Engalweni zika Jesu, Es’fubeni sAkhe, Lapha ngothando lwAkhe Wophuml’ umoya wam.     
 E’ngalweni zika Jesu Ngisind’ ekwoneni, Nakuzo izilingo Singeng’ limaz’ isono, Ngikhululw’ ebubini Nasekwesabeni. Izilingo zimbalwa Kanye nenyembezi!     
 Jesu iNqaba yami Jesu wangifela; Edwaleni ngoqina Themba laphakade Linde ngibekezele Kudlul’ ubusuku,  Ngize ngibon’ ukusa ‘Gwini lwegolide.

title: 223 Ngiyamuzwa Umsindisi
content:
# 223 Ngiyamuzwa Umsindisi

  Ngi yamuzwa uMsindisi Engibiza ngoMlandela; Endlebeni ath’ amazwi Nsuku zonke, ungilandele.     
ChorusNgi zothath’ isiphambano uMsindisi ngi Mlandele; Laph’ engiholela khona Ngi be naYe yonke indlela.     
    Noma indlela imnyama Nezinyawo zi khathele,     Inhliziyo iyakhanya Nxa ngi Mlandela yonk’indlela.     
UJesu engendulele Izulu li yakhazimla,Ngi nikwe amandl’ amanye Nxa ngi Mlandela yonk’ indlela    
Ngi hole esigodini U ngi phakele ukudla;Nkosi, nginced’ ebubini Nxa ngi landela yonk’ indlela.    
 Z’u ngi thwale ngenhliziyo U nami owAkho umsa; Z’u ngi gone ngezingalo Nxa ngi landela yonk’ indlela

title: 224 Khanyisani Izibani
content:
# 224 Khanyisani Izibani

  U yakhany’ umsa ka Baba U vel’ endlini yAkhe, Kodzwa thina u si phile Si khanye phansi lapha.    
ChorusKhanyisani izibani Ku bonwe ngaphesheya!Kumbe u yashon’ omunye,U ngamsindisa yena.    
Ngenxa yesono ku mnyama S’chlelwe ‘zinhlupheko,Kad’ elindele amehlo Ukubon’ ukukhanya.    
Lungis’ is’bani, mfowethu Ye, omunye u khonaOzamayo ukungena Emthimbeni we Wundlu.

title: 225 Yima Nje Ngeqhawe
content:
# 225 Yima Nje Ngeqhawe

      uMsindis’ uthi, Wena mKrestu vuka!     Nesihlangu, nenkemba esandleni,     Ukulwa nomling’ u boya nges’ bindi,     Yima njenge qhawe, qaphel’ isitha.
 Chorus    Yima, yima, njenge qhawe,     Yima, u si qaphele isitha
    Loko okuy’ ingozi ku qaphele;    U ngahlehli nok’ ihawu lingekho,    Uma u zozehlul’ izitha zakho,    Yima njenge qhawe, u ziqaphele.
    Yilwel’ indaba yeNkosi ngamandla;    U lwe kuze kube sekupheleni,    Yilandele noma ikusa ngaphi,    U lwe njenge qhawe qaphel’ isitha.
    Qhubeka, iNkosi yakho ikhona;    Ikunika umusa nesibindi,    Lunje ngomfula uthando lweNkosi,    Ngako, yima uqaphele isitha.

title: 226 Cisho Ngivume
content:
# 226 Cisho Ngivume 

     Ngi cisho ukuba l’kholwa,    Ngi cisho uKrestu ngi Mkholwe,    Noko uthi ombi, Namhla, moya hamba,    Ngelinye ilanga, ngokubiza.
    U yacisho ukuphenduka,    U cish’ ukuvum’ inguquko,    Ng’oba usancengwa, Futhi usanxuswa,    Ng’uJesu noMoya, Moni buya.
    Cish’ ukuvuma kudlulile,    Cish’ ukuvuma s’u silele,    U ngebeleselwe, Nxa se ulahliwe,    Isililo sizwe, Ngi lahliwe.

title: 227 Esiphambanweni
content:
# 227 Esiphambanweni

     UMsindisi wangophela, Yaf’ iNkosi yami;    Wazidela, wangifela, Ngi sindiswe nami.
 Chorus    Esiphambanweni, ngabon’ ukukhanya,    Umthwalo wehliziyo wacasha (wacasha)    Kwaku lapho ngakholwa ngabona ,    Manje ngi yathaba impela!
    Ngenxa yem’sebenzi yami, Yek’ uthando lomsa!    Walenga Yena emthini, Ku yamangalisa!
    Usizi kaluhlawuli Elami icala;    ’Nkosi, nguWe inhlawulo ‘Ngi yazinikela!

title: 228 Dumis’ Undumise Umkhululi Wethu
content:
# 228 Dumis’ Undumise Umkhululi Wethu

     Dumis’ uMdumise uMkhululi wethu!    Huba O, mhlaba! Umemezele;     NiMbabaze ‘zingelosi, Ubayethe!     Onegam’ elingcwele kakhulu,     Uyelusa uJesu ‘zimvu zAkhe.    Uyazi gona ilanga lonke
 Chorus    Dumisa uMdumise ubuhle bAkhe,    Dumisa ngehubo lenjabulo!
    Dumis’ uMdumise uMkhululi wethu;    Wafela wahluphekel’ izono!    IDwala lethu, iThemba, neNsindiso!     Babaza uMbabaze kakhulu,    Dumis’uJes’ othwal’ izono zethu    Uthand’ olupulile namandla
    Dumis’ uMdumise uMkhululi wethu!    Amasang’ ezulu ahlokome;    UJesu uyabusa phakade,    Mthwesen’ umqhele eyiNkosi yezulu     Uyez’ uKrestu unqobe umhlaba.    Ubukhosi namandla kukuYe

title: 229 Ngubani Ongas’ Enkosini?
content:
# 229 Ngubani Ongas’ Enkosini?

     Nguban’ ozokhetha iNkosi? Indlela zimbili Khethake!!       
 Chorus    Khetha namhla!     Phakathi kokuhle nokubi,    Khetha namhla! Phakathi kokuhle nokubi.       
    Izinkulungwane Zi khethe Ukuma nokubi, U thini?.      
    Woza u zokum’ eNkosini Eny’ indlel’ ayikho Eqotho.

title: 230 Ngi Y’Indlela
content:
# 230 Ngi Y’Indlela

  Njengemv’ ezul’entabeni Iduke nezinye; Ngi ngathol’ indlela njani Ebuyel’ ekhaya?     
 Chorus Ngiy’ iNdlela, ‘Qiniso nok’Phila, Ku ngeze muntu kuBaba phandle kwami, Ngiy’ iNdlela, ‘Qiniso nok’Phila, Ku ngeze muntu kuBaba phandle kwami.     
 Insizi zingididile Sengi fun’iNkosi; Abanye bathi, Lenale! Iqiniso liphi?    
 Krest’ ukuPhila neNdlela Ngi ngeze ngamshiya; Wongiqondisa kuBaba Ngi hlale ekhaya.

title: 231 Vumel’ UJesu Enhliziyweni Yakho
content:
# 231 Vumel’ UJesu Enhliziyweni Yakho

  Nxa udinwe umthwalo wesono, Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni;  Um’uthand’ ukuqal’ Inhlal’ entsha, Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni    
 Chorus  Ku dlul’ ukungabaza, Manje mus’ ukumnqaba  Manje vula umnyango,  Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni    
 Um’ ukhalela ukuba msulwa; Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni, Iseduz’ imthombo yokuhlanzwa,  Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni    
Uma kunohluph’ ongelu xoshe,Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni,Nxa kunes’khala es’ngegcwaliswe;Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni    
Nxa iz’hlobo zi ngasathembeki;Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni,Bona ukuth’ uJesu unjani,Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni.    
Nxa wohlabelela nabangcwele Vumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni, Uma wongen’ ezinduni zok’phumlaVumel’ uJes’ enhliz’yweni.    
 Chorus     Ak’ sekh’ ukungabaza,   Manje angisamlahli Manje ngivul’ umnyango,    Ngena Jes’ enhliziyweni

title: 232 Ngeze Ngakushiya
content:
# 232 Ngeze Ngakushiya 

 A ngi ngeze ngakushiya;A ngi yi kukudela,Ngi zakukuhola wena ,Ngohlala ngi kugcina,U ngemqenike okubi ,Ngi hloniph’ ungesabi    
Nxa u sekuhluphekeni ,Hlal’ ekukhulekeni ,Mina ngi zokududuza ,Ngi zokukhanyisela,Ezilingweni ngendlela,Ngi zokukhanyisela    
Nxa kuwe ku kuhle konkeU hanqwe kukhanye nge! U hlalake wenamile,U nento zi lungileNgi zakuba nawe MinaNgi kwendulele wena    
Lapha u senhluphekweni,Khon’ ezinkathazweni,Uma wen’ u qinisela ,Ngi zokulondoloza,Uthando lwami lu nawe, Phezulu oqondiswe

title: 233 Ngi Tshel’ Indab’ Endala-ndala
content:
# 233 Ngi Tshel’ Indab’ Endala-ndala

 Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala Yokwanga phezulu Ka Jesu nobukhosi Ka Jesu nothando,Ngi tshel’ indaba kahle Njengasenganeni Ngokuba ngikhathele Ngi ngongcolileyo    
CHORUSNgi tshel’ indab’ endala; Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala, Ka Jesu nothando    
Ngi tshel’ indab’ unense Ibe ngaphakathi,Leyo eyokuhlenga Yelapha isonoYiphinda-phinde njalo Ngi shesha ngikholwe ,Njengamazol’ okusa Amuka emini.    
Ngi tshel’ indaba leyo Uma wethusiwe; Inkazimlo yomhlaba Inzima kakhulu.Laph’ ubuhle bomhlaba Bu qhamuka kimi,Ngi tshel’ indab’ endala Yempilo ngoJesu.

title: 234 UJesu Ukukhanya
content:
# 234 UJesu Ukukhanya

  Zi yacul’ ingelosi Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe, NgoMntwana ozelweyo Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.    
CHORUSSi nokukhanya kon’ okuhle, Woza laph’ umsa okhazimlayo;Njalo sizungezwe ukukhanya, Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.    
 Thabani nonke zizwe Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe  Hubani namabandla Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.    
 Makudunyiswe Yena Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe,  INkosi yaphakade Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.    
Bayethe! k’uY’uMtwana Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe;    Bayethe! Sokulunga Jes’ ukukhanya kwezwe.

title: 235 Futhi Labuya Ilanga
content:
# 235 Futhi Labuya Ilanga 

 Labuya ilanga elingcwele uJehova waphumula ngalo,Walibusisa khona kuqala Ngako wathi libe sikhumbuzo    
Lel’ ilanga ke, si liqaphele Intando yAkhe ibe ngeyethu,Nxa sifundile ukuMlalela Uyokuzwa ukukhonza kwethu    
Nkosi yamazwe onke lalela Yizwa izwi labantwana bAkho, Iz’thembiso zAkho zikhumbule Uthele kubona umsa wAkho    
Bab’ osezulwini, Themba lethu Umyalo wAkho sihlangu njalo,U ng’ uMlindi neSinini sethu Udumo ngolwAkho njalo njalo

title: 236 Vuka Moy’ Uhlabelele
content:
# 236 Vuka Moy’ Uhlabelele 

  Vuka, moya wam’ uthobe Udumis’ uMhlengi wakho, Uthi mangi hlabelele O, yek’ isisa sesihle!    
 Chorus  U nesisa, u nesisa, O yek’ isisa sesihle!    
 Wa ngi bona ngonakele Wang’thanda nanxa kunjalo, Wang’ sindisa ngi dukile Yek’ ubukhulu besisa    
 Chorus U nesisa, u nesisa Yek’ ubukhulu besisa!    
Noba izitha zandile Noba umhlab’ ulwa nami,U yahol’ umoya wami Yek’ amandl’ esisa sAkhe!    
 Chorus U nesisa, u nesisa Yek’ amandl’ esisa sAkhe!   
 Izinhlupo zi njengefu, Seziduma njengezulu, Njalo um’ eduze kwami Yek’ ubuhle bomsa wAkhe!   
 Chorus  U nesisa, u nesisa Yek’ ubuhle bomsa wAkhe

title: 237 Sukumelan’ UJesu
content:
# 237 Sukumelan’ UJesu

 Sukumelan’ uJesu Mabuth’ es’phambano;Misan’ umthetho wAkhe Mani ngawu lahli,Ninqobe nokunqoba Imp’ iholwa nguYe;Size sichithw’ isitha uJesu abuse.    
Sukumelan’ uJesu Lalelani izwi;Yiyanini empini Ngal’usuk’ oluhle,Madoda, mukhonzeni Phakathi kwezitha;Niqine engozini Lwanini ngamandla.    
Sukumelan’ uJesu Thembelani kuYe;Nowa nxa nizethemba Ningazisho neze!Hlomani ngeVangeli Nikhuleke njalo;       Nxa nibizwa kukubi Ningaphuthi lapho.    
Sukumelan’ uJesu Impi izophela;Namhla kunga dum’ impi Ngomso ukunqoba,Nobani onqobayo Wothweswa umqhele;Yena kanye noJesu Wobusa phakade.

title: 238 Ngobani Labo?
content:
# 238 Ngobani Labo?

 Ngoban’ abadlul’ amagagasi, Phesheya kwama ngcwaba bathi, thu!NgoJesu bedumisa, Behlanziwe liWundlu.    
CHORUSBengena phakath’ eJerusalem’ eNtsha! Behlanziwe leWundlu.(’Gazini leWundlu)Bengena phakath’ eJerusalem’ eNtsha! Behlanziwe liWundlu.    
Yibo labo ebusheni babo  Bahlakani pha ba kheth’ uJesu;Benela ngaYe labo Behlanziwe liWundlu    
Yibo abathwal’ inhlungu laba Bazuza ukuphumla k’uJesu;Begcwele ukuthula Behlanziwe liWundlu    
Yibo abaphathekayo kabi Bema emlilweni obuhlunguUJes’ uthi, "Nyukani!" Nihlanziwe liWundlu.    
Baphephel’ ogwin’ olukhanyayo Sekudlule ukufa nenhlungu;Bathaba njalo-njalo Behlanziwe liWundlu.

title: 239 Ukhathele Na?
content:
# 239 Ukhathele Na?

 Ukhathele unosizi, Udangele Na?Woza kiMi, ush’ uJesu, "Phumula!"    
Amanxeb’ angi donsela eNkosini na?Enyaweni kuz’ izandla, Akhona.    
Inomqhele, kamb’ iNkosi Ewukhombayo?Yebo, ngowamev’ osizi OkuYo!    
Nxa ngimfuna ngimlandela Ngozuzani na?Izinsizi nobunzima, Konkana    
Nxa ngibambelela kuYo, Ngotholani na?Wophumula ngaphesheya kweJordan    
Nxa ngimnxusa ngize kuYe, Wothula yini?Angenqabe ‘ze kudlule Izulu    
Nxa ngizama, ngi Mlandele Ngobusiswa na?Bathi, Yebo! Abangcwele Laphaya, Amen

title: 240 Emnyango
content:
# 240 Emnyango

 Bhek’ uMsindisi emnyango; Selok’ enqonqotha njalo.Kade asilinda Yena, Mvulel’ inhliziyo wena.    
Uthi zithengele kuYe, Ube nokulunga kwAkhe.Agcotshw’ amehlo abone; Usus’ ukungcola kuwe.    
Izwi lob’fakazi lizwe; Uthi mawuzikhethele.Uno kona, usivivi; Khuthazela uphenduke.    
UJesu usezoqeda Ukusincengela thina,Masinyane onensila, Uzohlala enensila    
UJesu umi ngaphandle; Unceng’ inhliziyo kahle.Uthi muvulel’ angene, Unga mbambezeli Yena.    
Yebo, ngenisa umhambi, Phambi kwAkhe wophumulaUjabule ni ndawonye; Wodla nawe, nawe naYe

title: 241 Izwe Lasebheula
content:
# 241 Izwe Lasebheula

 Ngafik’ ezweni lenala; Imfuyo ngeyani yonke.Lapha ku kukhaya okuhle, Nobusuku budlulile.   
CHORUSIlizwe laseKhenani Ngiya kuma eNtabeni,Ngithalaze ngaphesheya lapho kun’elam’ ikhaya;Ngiya bona lon’ izulu, Isigodlo sakoMkhulu   
Umsindis’ uhamba nani, Kamnandi siyakhuluma.Ungidonsela phezulu, Kuwo umngcele wezulu.   
Iphung’ elimnandi lona, Livela ezihlahleniImbali kazibuni le! Kukhon’ amaz’ okuphila!   
Ziyafika kimi lapha, Ingoma zezulu lapho.Ingelosi sihlabela Ingoma zokusindiswa.

title: 242 Si Busisiwe Isibopho
content:
# 242 Si Busisiwe Isibopho

        Intamb’ ebophela, Inhliziyo zethu;       Kulo uthando lwezulu, Sibusiso sethu.   
       Phambili kwes’hlalo, Sizo zincengela;       Ukwesaba nokulila, Kwethu ku yophela.   
       Inhlupheko zethu, Nayo imithwalo;       Noku khalelana kwethu, Konke ku ndawonye   
       Nxase sehlukana, Kubanga usizi;       Kodwa siyethemba sizo, Hlangana phambili.

title: 243 Vuka, Moya Wami Vuka!
content:
# 243 Vuka, Moya Wami Vuka!

 Vuka moya vuka! Thintit’ ukwesala.Umhlatshel’ ob’hlungu, Uvezelwe mina.Es’hlalwen’ uJes’ ung’mele;Es’hlalwen’ uJes’ ung’mele;Ngilotshiw’ esandlen’ sAkhe.   
Uhlel’ ezulwini, Ukunginxusela.Ngothand’ ol’hlengayo, Negaz’ el’ncengayo.Igazi lAkhe las’thenga;Igazi lAkhe las’thenga;Lifafaz’ is’hlalo somsa.   
Mahlan’ amanxeba, Ahlatshw’ eKhalvari.Ahlal’ ekhuleka, Ayang’ khulumela.Athi mxolele, mxolele;Athi mxolele, mxolele;Angafi ophendukayo.   
Uyis’umzw’ encenga Ogcotshiwe wAkhe.Angefulathele iNdodana yAkhe.NoMoya uyamuzwela;NoMoya uyamuzwela;Uthi, ngizelwe yiNkosi.

title: 244 Woza Kumsindisi
content:
# 244 Woza Kumsindisi

 ‘Za kuJesu, ‘Za kuJesu, ‘Za kuJesu manje;Manje, Wena kuYe, Woza kuYe manje.   
Wosindiswa, Wosindiswa, Wosindiswa manje;Manje, Wosindiswa, Woza kuYe manje.   
Unamandla, Unamandla, Unamandla, manje;Manje, Unamandla, Woza kuYe manje.   
Cela kuYe, Cela kuYe, Cela kuYe, manje;Manje, Ulindele, Woza kuYe manje.   
Ulindele, Ulindele, Ulindele manje;Manje, Ulindele, Woza kuYe manje.   
Themba kuYe, Themba kuYe, Themba kuYe, manje;Manje, Themba kuYe, Woza kuYe, manje.   
Wobusiswa, Wobusiswa,Wobusiswa manje;Manje, Wobusiswa, Woza kuYe manje.

title: 245 Alikho Elinye Ibizo
content:
# 245 Alikho Elinye Ibizo

 Sine bizo likaJesu  Elithandeka kithi;Phezulu bathemba lona  Nathi sithemba lona.   
CHORUSBizw’ elihle, Alikho ibizw’ elinje.Bizw’ elihle, Alikho ibizw’ elinje.   
Alikho ibizw’ elihle Elithob’ inhliziyo;Ngaphandle kwelika Jesu Nom’ enamil’ umuntu.   
Ngiyathemba ngizombona, Nxa ezothath’ abAkhe.Ngiyathemba ngizombona Ngithabe emoyeni.   
Nxa evuma Ngisebenze Ensimini yeNkosi;Kuhle kuphela uJesu Abusise okwami.   
Nxa evuma nima ngife, Kuhle ngifele kuYe;Kuhle kuphela uJesu Abe lithemba lami.

title: 246 Phons’ Izwana NgoJesu
content:
# 246 Phons’ Izwana NgoJesu

 Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-uMhlobo impela.Vus’ inhliziyo zethu, Ngekwenzele kona.   
CHORUSPhons’ izwana ngoJesu, Ngendlela losisiza;Izwana nje ngoJesu, NgaYe ufakaze.   
Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Lok’us’xolelwe.Zama ngowAkhe umsa Ufik’ ekhaya le!   
Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Njalo wena usho;Ngiyamthand’ uMsindisi, Owangifelayo.   
Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Kusekhon’ ithuba;Ngokuthula uthi, du! Uyavuna ombi.   
Phons’ izwana ngoJesu-Ithemba nxa lifa;Sukuma kubunhlungu Umethembe Yena.

title: 247 Shay’ Insimbi Namuhla Injabulo
content:
# 247 Shay’ Insimbi Namuhla Injabulo

 Shay’ insimbi! Namhla injabulo.Ngomuntu obuy’ enkangala,Nang’ uyis’ emhlangabeza ngendlela,Was’ emanga, okhatheleyo.   
CHORUSNgcwele! Ngcwele! Kush’ iz’ngelosi:Ngcwele! Ngcwele! Kusho ugubhu.Yimpi enjengo lwandle lugubhuza,Lwandis ingoma eligugu.   
Shay’ insimbi! Namhla yinjabulo.Ngoba umzuli ubuyile;Inhliziyo ison’ isishiyile,Ingumntwana ozelweyo.   
Shay’ insimbi! Mema idili namhlaNgokunqoba ziyacul’ iz’ingelosi;Xox’ indab’ emnandi njenge zinyosiNgob’ umuntu uzelwe busha.

title: 248 Yini Ngabathathekile
content:
# 248 Yini Ngabathathekile

 Yini ngabathathekile? Pambili beqhubekelaBahlangana nsuku zonke Benyakaza bethandazaNgamazwi kuya menyezwa;  Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa;  Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!   
Nguban’ uJesu? Ngani na? Kangak’ anyakazis’ umzi?‘Sihambel’ esinamandla  Ukwenz’ intando ngeningiNgamazwi kuya menyezwa Nangu uJesu edlula Bo! Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!   
Jesu! NguYe okukanye Wezw’ ubuhlungu ngabantu Wathwal’ in’thwalo yabanye Wakhulula nezithulu Kwethab’ impumputhe zizwa  Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!Ngamazwi kuya menyezwa Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!   
Namhla indawo ngendawo  Sihamb’ enyaweni zAkhe NaY’ ukwe yeth’ im’nyango Uyangena azithobe Pho! Singe memeze sithi Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!Pho! Singe memeze sithi Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!   
Ehhe sondelani nonke Nixolelwe naphunyuzwa KuY’ uBaba nidelile Buyani namkele umsaZimpofana nans’inqaba Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!Nin’ enilingwayo, Nangu! Nangu uJesu edlula Bo!   
Kodwa uma niMenqaba Ninyundel’ uthando lwAkheEk’pheleni wonishiya En’del’ izwi lAkhe manje Nephuzile! Manidele! Ujesu udludile manje Nephuzile! Manidele! Ujesu udludile manje

title: 249 Zazi Ngamashum’ Alithoba Nethoba
content:
# 249 Zazi Ngamashum’ Alithoba Nethoba

 Zazi ngamashum’ ayithoba Nethob’ esibayeniKodw’ enye isemagqumeniNgapandle kwesibayaKuse phakathi kwezintabaYayehlukene noMalusiYayehlukene noMalusi   
Nkosi, unamashumi angaka  Awanele yini?E, waphendula uMalusi:"Yedukil’ enye imvu;Noma indlela inamevaNgizoyifuna imvu yamiNgizoyifuna imvu yami"   
Kakho kubahlengwa Owaqonda kunzima kangaka!Laph’ inkosi yedlula khonaIngaka tholi imvuPhel’ imvu yayigula ifaPhel’ imvu yayigula ifa   
Nkosi, ophelan’ amathons’ Egazi enyus’ intaba?Ophela lowo owaduka Yen’ engaka buyiswaNgani izandla zalinyazwa?Zalinyazelw’ izono zethuZalinyazelw’ izono zethu   
Zonk’ intaba zaquma ngento Kwath’ ekuphakameniKwenyuk’ izwi laya ezulwiniLathi, "bongani imvuSelitholakele iguguBongan’ iNkosi ngento yAyo!"

title: 250 Balekel’ Is’lingo
content:
# 250 Balekel’ Is’lingo

 Balekel’ isilingo, unyamalale;Kunqoba kosiza uzuz’ omunye.Zam’ uye phambili, yeka ulunya.Hlal’ ubhek’ uJesu, woku phephisa!   
CHORUS Hlala ucel’ uJesu,Akugcine ngamandla.Yen’ uyelekelela;Woku phephisa.   
Shiy’ ukonakala, lahl’ ukwethuka;Ungaphaphi ngeze kukaJehova.Cabang’ ukhuthale, yiba nomusa.Hlal’ ubhek’ uJesu, wokuphephisa!   
Yena onqobile, uzakuvuzwaSonqoba ngenkolo, noma sisawauMsindisi wethu wosiph’ amandla,Hlal’ ubhek’ uJesu, wokuphephisa!

title: 251 Soze Ngasindiswa Ngokukhala
content:
# 251 Soze Ngasindiswa Ngokukhala 

   Soze ngasindiswa, Ngokukhal’ iz’nyembezi   Kunge luqed’ uvalo, Kungesuse isono   ‘Kukhal’ akusizi    
 CHORUS  Wangifela uJesu!, Emthini wahlupheka   Ngase ngikhululeka, Ng’sindiswe ngoJesu!    
 Ngeke ngisindiswe Nayi senzo esihle  Imicabang’ emihle, Phinde ingenze musha  Umsebenzi yize    
Khona ukulinda, Akulutho, ngizofaNgiw’ umsa endlebeni, Mangilinda, ngizofa Ngoba akusizi    
Ngenkolo kuKrestu ngizosindiswa kuYe Ngithemb’ isenzo sAkhe, Mangiy’ ezingalweni; Ngisinde ngenkolo

title: 252 Woza Moni Onezono
content:
# 252 Woza Moni Onezono

   Woza moni onezono    INkosi inesisa   Ngempela yokuphumuza   Nxa ushi’ izono    
CHORUS Themb’ uJesu, themb’ uJesu,  UboMthemba nje!  Wosindiswa, wosindiswa  Khona, namhlanje!    
UJesu wachith’ igazi  ‘Waletha iz’busiso Manje cwila kuzamcolo  Uhlanzwe yigazi    
NguY’ uJesu oyindlela Ey’ ekuphumleni  Uyokukhiph’ ebubini Uma uMlandela    
Woza kwes’mhlop’ isixulu Uy’ ebungcweleni Uhlal’ ekujabuleni Zonke izinsuku

title: 253 Nangu uMalusi Umile
content:
# 253 Nangu uMalusi Umile

   Nang’ uMalusi umile   Ethathekisile    Uyamemeza izimvu   Az’ gone zonke-du!    
Uth’ azize kuYe manje Kafuni zesabe  Lok’ ibusisa ezinje INkosi yez’ngcwele    
 S’bek’ izimvu kuz’ izandla  Nkosi unamandla  Loku nathi singabAkho   Nans’ inzalo yAkho

title: 254 Dumis’ uJehova
content:
# 254 Dumis’ uJehova

   Dumis’ uJehova Khon’ emagumbini   Vuk’ ubonge! Nas’ emukhathini   Zez’ uthando lwAkhe;  Nesis’ esikhona Ngokwenziwe    
Beth’ impalampala, Kwandiswe ngeqolo Ngangodumo! Makulethw’ imtshingo Kuhutshw’ injabulo, Phakamis’ iphimbo Ngak’ okwAkhe    
Lapho ubabaza Thint’ intambo lezi Kube mnandi! Yen’ uyashisiya Wonke angaphezi, Esh’ ub’khulu bAkhe EMdumisa

title: 255  Ngikudingile, Jesu
content:
# 255  Ngikudingile, Jesu 

  Ngikudingile Jesu   Loku ngingo mpofu   Nging’ umuntu’ ozulayo  Angi nay’ imfuyo  Ngidinga Wena Jesu   Ngibambe umgudu   Welus’ inyawo zami   Nayo inhliziyo   
 Ngidinga Yen’ uJesu  Njalo anginake  Ngize ngilwe nes’lingo  Engelekelela  Ngiding’ uMoy’ oNgcwele  Nami ngibe naYe   Ngifundiswe ngoJesu  Onge yam’ indlela    
 O Jesu, oligugu!   Ngoza nini kuWe  Ngihlotshiswe ngobuhle  Ngibe nobukhosi  Kuthi naba sindiswa   Njalo ngeneliswe  Ngicule ngingaphezi   Ngibusa neNkosi, Amen!

title: 256  O, Jehova Waphakade
content:
# 256  O, Jehova Waphakade 

  O, Jehova waphakade!  Themba elimile  Kuko konke Nqaba yethu  Ulikhaya lethu    
 Phansi kwesihlalo sAkho  Kukhon’ is’phephelo   Kothokoza izingcwele  Nathi sivikelwe    
 Zingaka dalwa izintaba  Ungekho nomhlaba  Phakade ung’ uNkulunkulu  Wena wedw’ umkhulu    
 Inkulungwane zem’nyaka   KuWe liny’ ilanga   Zona z’phelela ezeni   Wen’ ukhona nini

title: 257  Qinisiwe Njengedwala
content:
# 257  Qinisiwe Njengedwala

  Qinisiwe njenge dwala  Mile njenge ntaba   Unjalo umnt’ othembayo  I Nkosi ephilayo    
 Intaba ziyehluleka  Khona endawen’ enhle  Nezandl’ ezinok’thandeka  Kuy’ indaw’ engcwele    
 Lunga Nkosi kwabamhlophe  Bebamb’ iqiniso  Ngayo inhliziyo enhle  Bengoni umthetho

title: 258 Yinye Inkolo Nomthetho
content:
# 258 Yinye Inkolo Nomthetho

  Yinye inkolo noMthetho  Hhay’ iz’nkolo eziningi  Inkol’ eme kuyi njongo  Emthethweni ingasuki    
 O, Nkosi, sithethelele  Siwonil’ uMthetho wAkho  Wona muhle uphelele  Kepha siwonil’ unjalo    
 Thethelel’ inkohlakalo  Usus’ amabal’ amabi  Sisize sibamb’ uMthetho  Ngay’ iNdodana singoni

title: 259 Siyakuhlangana Yini
content:
# 259 Siyakuhlangana Yini

 Siyakuhlangana yini? Lapho kungathi cwaka? Lapho kukhanya nanini  Kakh’ onokuhlupheka    
CHORUS Sohlangana yini? Phesheya kwawo umfula? Sowu wel’umfula yini? Sibe la kuthi cwaka?    
Sobonan’ ezibukweni?  Sekuphelil’ uhambo? Sikhany’ ekuphumuleni? Kul’izulu nesango?    
Sohlangan’ emzini lena? Laku khon’ im’bhoshongo Nezindonga ziyakhanya?  Sazakhelwa ngob’ nono    
Sohlangana noMsindisi Ezolanda abAkhe  Nomusa wAkhe siwazi Size sibuse naYe    
CHORUS Siya kuhlangana; Siya kuwu wela umfula Siya kuwu wela umfula. Sibe la kuthi cwaka?

title: 260  Ngiyadlula Es’godini
content:
# 260  Ngiyadlula Es’godini 

  Ngiyadlul’ es’godini  Okuthiwa sisodwa  Kimina yiso isigodi  Sika Bhewula  Kodwa ngifumana kukhon’  Imbali ngendlela  UMsindisi useduze kwami  Yonk’ indlela    
CHORUSSigodi sase Bhewula, uligugu kimi  goba ngibona khashana izwe elilodwa    
Akuna thunzi elenza Mnyama endleleni Ngob’ imisebe yobukhos’ Iyayi khanyisa Kusahutshwa kamnandi  Ezulwini laphaya Kuqhamuk’ iphimb’  Es’godini ingethabise    
 Ngihamba ngithokozel’  Ukukhanya komuzi   Nsuku zonke ngijabule  Kukhanye kakhulu  S’god’ esihle sas’ Edeni  Umnandi emini  Enhliziyweni yokhathele  Ngamanz’ apholile

title: 261 S’godin’ Esihle sas’Edeni
content:
# 261 S’godin’ Esihle sas’Edeni

  S’god’ esihle sas’ Edeni  Umnandi emini  Enhliziyweni yokhathele  Ngamanz’ apholile     
 CHORUS S’god’ esihle sas’Edeni, Khaya labamhlophe  Kaningi emagagasini, Ngiphupha ngok’phumula     
 Enhliziyweni yokhalayo  Yimin’ ekhanyayo  Ineculo lengelosi  Liza nobukhosi     
 Nal’ ikhaya loMsindisi  Nabo abegazi  Kuphakamela phezulu   Ingoma enzulu

title: 262 Ngenze Njani ngoKrestu
content:
# 262 Ngenze Njani ngoKrestu

  Ngizothini ngoJesu?  Ophambi kwami  Wembeth’ ingub’ ebomvu, Unamev’ ekhanda     
CHORUS  Manje yiw’ umbuzo, I yin’ impendulo?  Ngizobethela uJesu, Ngiyek’ uBaraba!     
 Ngokhulula umphangi,  Umunt’ ozidlayo!  Nokuba uMsindisi?  Yi’muph’ odelwayo?     
 Lombuz’ uyesabeka,  Ngonquma njani na?  Umsa usangi linda,  Usa thuthumela     
 Ngizo nquma kanjani?,  Noma ngithand’ izwe;  Ngibethele uJesu,  Kusind’ uBaraba?     
 Akuka khethwa soni;  Nxa kubuzwa kanje!   Nawe mKrestu omiyo, Kuwo amalingo     
CHORUS  Manje yiw’ umbuzo, I yin’ impendulo?  Ngizobethel’ uBaraba, Ngikhulul’ uJesu

title: 263 Zwan’ Amazw’ Es’bhalo
content:
# 263 Zwan’ Amazw’ Es’bhalo

  Zwan’ amazwi eS’bhalo kwas’ endulo  Ngenisani konke okweshumi  Nivuseleke-ngcwele nanini  Nithembe son’ is’busiso     
CHORUS Ngenisani konke okweshumi  Ithi iNkosi Ningihlole   Nginehlisele is’busiso   Kuswelek’ indawo yok’samukela     
 Kambe nifun’ amandl’ oMoy’ ongcwele?  Ngenisani konke okweshumi  Nihlale nizwana naYe kamnandi  An’busise ngokungcwele     
 Kuvimbeni phakathi kweni naYe?  Ngenisani konke okweshumi  Nikulethe njengo kushiw’ izwi   Wonibusisa kwenele     
 Phakamisa iNkosi ngenhliziyo  Nje ngokub’ uletha okweshumi   Ubambelele esithembisweni  Senhliziy’ ethambileyo     
 Hlabelela kwenyukele phezulu  Sewulethe konk’ okweshumi  Sithi, Haleluya, sis’ enkonzweni  Sine s’busis’ esikhulu

title: 264 Ukuphumla Kuka Jehova
content:
# 264 Ukuphumla Kuka Jehova

  Olungcwele uSuku   Luka Jehova wethu  Eligcin’ is’khombisa  Lwabusiswa yiNkosi     
 CHORUS Lwamkele-ke, Lwamkele-ke  Siya kuthokozela, KweNkosi ukuphumla     
 Umsebenzi waqedwa  Lwase luqalwa lodwa  Walubusis’ impela   Ngaloko siya phumla     
 Lwaphendulwa ngabantu  Ngokuphumla ngeSonto  Hlola uMbhalo wAkhe   Awubatsheli loko     
 Abaningi ba ngathi  I Sonto lihle futhi   Keph’ incwadi yeNkosi  Yon’ iyabaphikisa     
 Ngahlola, ngalibona  Lempela iSabatha  Ngaphangis’ ukwamkela  Iqiniso nendlela

title: 265 Thul’ Uthi Du!
content:
# 265 Thul’ Uthi Du!

  Thul’ uthi du!, Ezweni lomona   Kube khona uJesu kuwena     
 Thul’ uthi du!, Umsebenz’ omkhulu  Ukwena kahle intando kaJesu     
 Thul’ uthi du! Usizi lukhulu  Kuyen’ uJesu sino kuthula     
 Thul’ uthi du!, Iz’hlobo zikude  Sigcinwe nguJesu siphephile     
 Thul’ uthi du!, Kusasa asazi  Kuphela nguJesu oyiNkosi     
 Thul’ uthi du!, Amathunz’ okufa  NgoJes’ anqotshwe, sinelifa     
 Sekwenele komhlaba kwendlule   Ezulwini konke kuphelele

title: 266 Ngokulandela Jesu
content:
# 266 Ngokulandela Jesu  

   Ngokulandela Jesu   Ngizwa usangibiza   Ngokwethemba ngiyeza   Ngiy’ ekhaya ‘khulu     
 CHORUS  Ngokulandela   Ngokulandela   Ngokulandela    Noba ungisaphi     
  Amehlo angaduka   Nenyawo zishelele   Ngingahle ngikhathale   Wena unamandla     
  Usizi luyisitha    Izono zivimbile    Is’bindi siqinile   Ngilandela Wena

title: 267 Masibuth’ Okhanyayo
content:
# 267 Masibuth’ Okhanyayo

   Masibuth’ okukhanyayo   Okusi zungezile     Sigcin’ ok’qhakazileyo   Siwa lahle ameva   Sithol’ okududuzayo   Is’busiso sanamhla   Isandla esisusayo   Singa shiyi ameva     
 CHORUS  Sitshel’ imbewu yomusa   Sitshel’ imbewu yomusa   Sitshel’ imbewu yomusa   Soyivuna ngomusa     
  Asiyazisi ingoma    Ingakacul’ inyoni    Asinakekel’ umbala     Zize zimuk’ izimbali   Asikhathalel’ ihlobo    Ngisho naka ncanyana    Engath’ alina njabulo    Yokwehlis’ umoyana     
  Uma singazwel’ ingane    Icindezelw’ emnyango   Ukuthi ingephunyule    Singabi namcabango   Lengane ingasibuka   Ibhekisis’ ubuso   Budatshulwe kubambeka   Njengo kuba kunjalo     
  O izandl’ ezibandayo   Zisi khumbuza njani   Amazwi asheshisayo    Asakazw’ endleleni   Yebo ziyasikhumbuza    Zibambeke buhlungu     Singawatshali ameva    Sovun’ is’vunguvungu

title: 268 Nkos’ Is’phepho  Sivukhile
content:
# 268 Nkos’ Is’phepho  Sivukhile

   Nkos’ is’phepho sivukile    Namaza aphakeme   Isibhakabhaka simnyama   No sizo lube kude   Kawukhathali sifa na?    Nak’ usalele nje!   Lapho imzuzu yonk’ ifinyela   Nethuma lisolwandle     
 CHORUS  Umoya namaza kong’lalela, Thula nya   Kuko lulwandle ol’gubhayo   ‘Muntu namadimoni nani enye   Akukho mandlambi angagwinya   U Mnini lwandle kanya nomhlaba    Konke kolalel’ eNg’kushoyo   Thula nya! Thula nya!   Kahle kulalel’ eNg’kushoyo kuthule nya!     
  Nkosi, ngingodabukile   Ngileth’ usizi lwami   Inhliziyo yam’ inomunyu   O, siza Nkosi yami   Ububi beson’ ob’khulu   Bung’ cwilisa phansi   O, Nkosi ngizofa kabuhlungu   Sheshis’ ungisindise     
  Nkosi alusek’ uvalo   Umoya uthulile    Nelanga livel’ emanzini   Kwezulu ngik’tholile   Ungalibali Mkhululi   Futhi ungishiye    Ngenjabulo ng’welele phesheya   Kulonga izibuko

title: 269 NguJesu Umsindisi Wam’ Osimanga
content:
# 269 NguJesu Umsindisi Wam’ Osimanga

   Ngu Jes’uMsindisi wam’ osimanga   Usimangaliso kimi    Ufihl’ umoya wami kulo iwa   Ngibone okuhl’ ok’ningi     
 CHORUS  Ufihl’ umphefumlo wam’ edwaleni  Elisith’ izw’ elomile; Ufihl’ ukuphila kwam’  othandweni; Ngembozwe ngesandla,  Ngembozwe ngesandla sAkhe     
  NguJes’ uMsindisi wam’ osimanga   Ususa okusindayo   Angiphakamise nginga sunduswa   Angiphe amandl’ amiyo     
  Imzuzu-nge-mzuzu ayibusise   Igcwaliswe ngoba Yena   Ngenjabulo nobukhosi ngimculele   U Mkhululi wam’ onjena     
  Sengembathiswe ubucwazicwazi   Ngomhlangabeza kulifu    Ngosindiso nothando ngiMdumise   Nazo iz’gidi phezulu

title: 270 Oweth’ Umkhululi Esefa
content:
# 270 Oweth’ Umkhululi Esefa

   Oweth’ oMkhulu esefa, Wasivalelisa  Wasishiyela uMholi, Abe kithi     
  Uza kusiph’ isithunzi, Abe nguMduduzi  Um’ethol’ othobileyo Novumayo     
  Lakh’ilizwi siyalizwa, Lihlala lis’khuza  Kokubi nasovalweni Emhlabeni     
  Konke ‘kulung’ esinako, Nokunqob’ iz’lingo  Nemi cabango engcwele, Inge yAkhe     
  Moya ohlanzekileyo, Bon’ abawileyo  Thina sibe indlu yAkho, Ngeqiniso

title: 271 Kom’ Izono Zibomvu
content:
# 271 Kom’ Izono Zibomvu

   Nom’ izono zibomvu, Ziya kuba njengeqhwa  Nom’ izono zibomvu, Ziya kuba njengeqhwa  Noma sezi the tebu, Zingaba mhlophe,  Ezakho ezibomvu, Ezakho ezibomvu  Ziya kuba njenge qhwa, Ziya kuba njenge qhwa     
  Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo; Buya kuNkulunkulu!  Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo; Buya kuNkulunkulu!   Yen’ ohawu kelayo, Nothand’ ol’khulu  Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo, Zwan’ izwi el’ ncengayo  Buyela kuJehova, Buyela kuJehova     
  Wosus’ izono zenu, Soze azikhumbule,  Wosus’ izono zenu, Soze azikhumbule,  Bhekani ki Mi zizwe; Ush’ uJehova  Wosus’ izono zenu, Wosus’ izono zenu,   Soze azikhumbule,Soze azikhumbule

title: 272 Phons’ Intambo Kok’phila Kul’ Iza
content:
# 272 Phons’ Intambo Kok’phila Kul’ Iza

   Phons’ intambo yoku’phila kul’iza, Nang’ umfowethu ungamsindisa  O, ngubani ozozidela Aphons’ iNtambo yoK’phila emfela?     
 CHORUS  Phonsa iNtambo! yoK’phila!, Omunye uyamuka,   Phonsa iNtambo! Yona yoK’phila! Kushon’ omunye namhla.     
  Phons’ iNtambo yoK’phila masinya, Ngani uyalibala kangaka?  Mbon’ esecwila, wenze manje; Ngomkhumbi woKuphila, yana kude.     
  Phons’ iNtambo yoK’phila kofayo, Eshon’ osizin’ olwesabekayo!  Kuwo esililo amaza, Masinya azomkhukhula amanzi     
  Sizodlul’ isi’khathi sokulenga, Bawelel’ ogwini lokulahlwa   Kaloku mfowethu, sheshisa! Phons’ iNtambo namuhla basindiswe

title: 273 Yam’ Ezingalweni Zika Jesu
content:
# 273 Yam’ Ezingalweni Zika Jesu

   Yam’ e’ngalweni zika, Jesu Angakusiza, akusize  Wethembel’ othandweni lwAkhe Akufak’ ingoma.     
 CHORUS Yama kuYe, ezingalweni, Themba lonke uthando lwAkhe. Yama kuYe, ubhek’ ekhaya, Themb’ uMsindisi wAkho     
 Yam’ e’ngalweni zika Jesu, Wovul’ indlela, vul’ indlela Lapho eya khon’ uMlandela Uhloniph’ ilizwi.     
 Yam’ e’ngalweni zika Jesu; Leth’ ok’ thandayo, ok’thandayo Lowo muthwalo osindayo Wunxusele kuYe.     
 Yam’ e’ngalweni zika Jesu, Kubeke konke, konke kuYe Inomus’ inhliziyo yAkhe Akaswele mehlo

title: 274 Owam’ Umsindis’ Uyangincengela
content:
# 274 Owam’ Umsindis’ Uyangincengela

   Owam’ uMsindis’ uyangincengela, Ziyi ngcosan’ iz’hlobo, unothando  Manjena uhlal’ engelusa ngomusa, Sengathi lowam’ angaba ngowakho     
 CHORUS  U Msindisi, Ungowakho Owam’ ut’ ang’kutshele Yena ngowakho     
  Ngino Baba, Yenake ungiphile, Okubusisekile kwaphakade  Ngizo bizwa ngiMhlangabez’emafini, Sengathi ungabizwa nawe futhi!     
  Ingubo emhlophe nobukhazikhazi, Ing’lindel’ ab’khosini ngingayazi!  Nxa ngiyemukela nokukhanya kwayo S’hlobo, ngingathanda futh’ inge yakho?     
  Sengiphiwe ukuthula njengomfula, Loko izihlobo azikwazanga  Yen’uKrestu nguMqambi noMlethi wakho, Sengathi futhi kungaba ngokwakho     
  Esekutholil’ uJesu, tshel’ abanye, U Msindisi wami ngowakho nawe   Thandaza Abaleth’ eb’khosini nabo, Wophendulw’ umthandazo ngenxa yakho

title: 275 Iphakade! - Phi?
content:
# 275 Iphakade! - Phi?

   Iphakade! – phi? Kus’ emoyeni  Kukhona njal’ emsindweni, ek’thuleni  Umbuz’ ophakeme, Iphakade! – phi?  Umbuz’ ophakeme, Iphakade! – phi?     
  Iphakade! – phi? O! Iphakade! – phi?  Nabahlengiwe, noma nabalahliwe?  La, noma laphaya - Iphakade! – phi?   La, noma laphaya - Iphakade! – phi?     
  Iphakade! – phi? Kunga kanjani?  Udakisiwe bes’ uthath’ umhlaba nje!  Wenz’ ungaqokile - Iphakade! – phi?  Wenz’ ungaqokile - Iphakade! – phi?     
  Iphakade! – phi? O! s’hlobo, bheka  Manje iNkos’ ingayek’ ukwahlula  Namhla kukhonjw’ iphakade lakho!–phi?  Namhla kukhonjw’ iphakade lakho!–phi?     
  Iphakade! – phi? O! Iphakade! – phi?  S’hlobo ungalali; bes’uthathizwe  Ungakaphenduli - Iphakade! – phi?  Ungakaphenduli - Iphakade! – phi?

title: 276 Yen’ UJesu Wez’ Ebhetlehema
content:
# 276 Yen’ UJesu Wez’ Ebhetlehema

    Yen’ uJesu wez’ eBetlehema, Wazalelw’ emkhombeni ngosizi   O, isimanga ngelAkh’ igama Engifuna mina   Engifu... funa mina O, isimanga ngelAkh’ igama   Engifuna mina     
   Yen’uJesu esiphambanweni, Wakhok’ical’ el’khulu ngasinda   O, isimanga, kwaba kanjani Engifela mina,   Engifela…fela mina O, isimanga, kwaba kanjani    Engifela mina     
   Yen’ uJesu wakuyo indulo, Ngisazula kude nesibaya   Ngokuthamba wanceng’ inhliziyo Ememeza mina    Engimemeza... mina... Ngokuthamba wanceng’ inhliziyo   Ememeza mina     
   Yen’ uJesu wovela phezulu, Sihl’ is’thembiso semnyak’ edlule   O, ngoMubona ehla ngamafu Ezolanda mina   Ezola-landa... mina... O, ngoMubona ehla ngamafu   Ezolanda mina

title: 277 Kukhanya Yandulela
content:
# 277 Kukhanya Yandulela

    Kukhanya yandulela emnyameni Hola mina   Ngikude nekhaya ebubini Hola mina   Gcina izinyawo ngingabheki;   Khashana kwenel’ unyawo lwami     
  Zange nempela-nje ngithandazele Ukukholwa,  Ngithand’ indlela ngizikhethele Ngibe ngedwa,  Ngesaba, ngiyathanda okuhle,  Kohlwa into zobami ubusha     
  Loku ngibusisiwe ngamandl’ Akho Mangiholwe  Ngedlul’ engcingweni ebamba nko Sekusile,  Kusasa ingelosi zethabe,  Ngengakuthanda sekusilele

title: 278 Akhuyam’ Indlela
content:
# 278 Akhuyam’ Indlela

   Akuyon’ indlela, Nom’ imnyama Nkosi!  Ngihole ngokwAkho, Ung’khethel’ eyami  Ngingezikhethele ngingethande loko,  Ngikhethele Wena ngothi-ke ngime ngqo!     
  NgoWakho uMbuso, Vezake indlela,  Nokukhanya kuwo, Hleze ng’shiy’indlela  Gcin’ uk’phila kwami, noma kuhle, kubi  Ngokubona kwAkho Ngithole nantoni     
  Ngikhethel’ is’hlobo, Ng’xwale nom’ impilo  Ngikhethel’ okwami, ‘Nala nob’ indlala  Kunga khethi mina, kok’khulu nok’ncane  Ngu Wena Mandl’ ami, Nakuko okunye

title: 279 O’ Nhliziyo ‘Zithobe
content:
# 279 O’ Nhliziyo ‘Zithobe

   O, nhliziyo zithobe, Nami mehlw’ elanga   Ek’kholweni kumhlophe KuJesu kukhanya     
 CHORUS  Zanini kiMi, en’si ndwayo;  Nin’ abakhathele nginganiphumuza;  Thwalan’ ijoka nifunde ngaMi;  Ngi munene Ngithobiles nothi; Nithol’ ukuphumula     
  Ingcebo nenjabulo, Akusizi muntu  Kuphela kuhl’ uthando, Lon’alubuhlungu     
  Is’duduz’ esikhulu, Senziwa nguJesu   Wen’uhlahliwe yini? Phenduka ungafi!     
  Uthule njengo mfula, Nengoma yAkh’ enhle  Kana’ Mthwal’ onzima, Lilul’ im’hla yonke

title: 280 Nmbusi Wethu
content:
# 280 Nmbusi Wethu

   Ingoma ezimnandi, Ngelanga elihle  Sibonga uMsindisi, Ngenhlalo neNdlela     
 CHORUS  Bonga... bonga uMsindisi wethu  Bonga... bonga Ubukhosi bAkhe     
  Waye thanda’ abantwana, Nxa elapha phansi;  Noma esezulwini, Loku ebathanda     
  Sithanda ukuMbonga, Sizw’ indaba yAkhe  Nxa esahlala lapha Khona eGalile     
  O’ Nkos’ eBusisiwe! Siya guqa kuWe  Sicela ukusizwa, Siphilele Wena

title: 281 Kwavela Inkanyezi Eb’suku
content:
# 281 Kwavela Inkanyezi Eb’suku

   Kwavel’ inkanyez’ ebusuku, Yakhanyiswa nguNkulunkulu  Im’sebe yahola izazi; Zaqondiswa kuMsindisi     
 CHORUS   Kusa khanya, kusa khanya, Inkanyezi ezintabeni!  Kusa khanya, kusa khanya Insindiso eNkosini     
  Zazi ngeM’bhalo iqiniso, Lenkanyezi ekhanyisayo;  Zalindel’ uk’khanya khashana, Oku nguKrestu indonsa     
  Solandel’ uk’khanya kwendulo, Loko kukhanya okwashiwo;  Solandela siy’ ezulwini, Sifike ‘kuphumuleni

title: 282 Inguzhu Zilishumi Lenkulungwane
content:
# 282 Inguzhu Zilishumi Lenkulungwane

   Zwan’ amazwi walalele; Ehlatshelelwa phezulu  U Jesu uyabusa le, Liyathaba izulu  Ehlez’ esihlalweni, Wobusa emhlabeni  Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen     
  Busa Nkosi yamakhosi, Busa kube phakade  Abakho bangehlukani, Lab’ osuba lobile  Benenjabulo yAkho, Besindisiwe njalo  Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen     
  Phangis’ ubuye, Msindisi Usuku lwAkho luze  Nxase kuhlatshwa umkhosi, Umhlaba uyadlula  Sizohlabelela sithi, Dumo, dum’ eNkosini  Aleluya! Aleluya! Aleluya! Amen

title: 283 Wena Na? Mina Na?
content:
# 283 Wena Na? Mina Na?

  Omuny’ uzongena ngesango, Pambili, phambili Ezwe ubukhosi bakhona, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yini? Athath’ indlela yegolide, Abone okuhle khona le Adl’ izethembiso zakade, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?     
 Isiphambano siyothulwa Phambili, phambili Wethemb’ uzophiwa umqhele, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi? Omunye uzobon’ iNkosi, Ekhululekil’ osizini Ethokoza naYo phakade, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?     
 Omunye uzongqongqotha le Phambili, phambili Ilizwi lithi, Angikwazi Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi? Omuny’ uzoncenga’ angaziwa, Kuyize ukuzama kwakhe Omunye uzoncintshw’ umvuzo Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?     
 Ingoma enhle yokunqoba, Phambili, phambili Yoculwa ngabasindileyo Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi? Omunye uyobingelela, Abakade baf’ emhlabeni Bazohlala ebukhosini, Kumbe nguwe, kumbe yimi?

title: 284 Edlula Amalanga
content:
# 284 Edlula Amalanga

   Bakhon’ abane sizungu, Edlula amalanga  Bakon’ abahluphekayo, Edlula amalanga  Sibo moyizela-ke Ngendlela yethu yonke  Okuhle! singakwenza, Edlula amalanga     
 CHORUS  Edlula, edlula, edlula, edlula  Oku hle! Singekwenza Edlula amalanga     
  Mabu ngabikh’ ubuvila, Edlula amalanga  Ubuso abukhanye, nge! Edlula amalanga  Izwi linezinhlupho, Kukhona ukukhala  Siza yen’ owileyo, Edlula amalanga     
  Zonk’ izibopho zothanda, Edlula amalanga  Siya zishiya emuva, Edlula amalanga  Kodwa imbewu enhle, Esiyihlanyelayo   Iyo sijabulisa, Edlula amalanga

title: 285 Ikhon’ Indawo Y’kuphumla
content:
# 285 Ikhon’ Indawo Y’kuphumla 

   Ikhon’ indawo Yok’phumla KuY’ uNkulunkulu  Laph’ isono singehluphe KuY’ uNkulunkulu     
 CHORUS  O, Jesu Mhlengi omhle!, Ovela kuBaba  Siphase silindile, KuY’ uNkulunkulu
