  Ikhon’ indawo emnandi, KuY’ uNkulunkulu  La kukhon’ uMsindisi KuY’ uNkulunkulu     
  Ikhon’ indawo yekhefu, KuY’ uNkulunkulu  Lapho konke kuthe cwaka, KuY’ uNkulunkulu

title: 286 Thwala Mina
content:
# 286 Thwala Mina

 O, ngondele lolosuku! Nxa abahlengwayoBeseZion ngezimhlophe, Besekhaya labo     
CHORUSO, ngithwale, ngithwale Ngi yeZion;Ngithwal’ ungise msizini wothando, Emsizin’ wabangcwele     
Ngi yozwa o-aleluya, Iz’xulu zibashoUmphefumlo ujabula, Nabahlengiweyo     
Thabani ngalo losuku, Lufiswa sihambiLophelisa izinhlungu, Baphumle kuMenzi

title: 287 Ngesikhathi Sokulingwa
content:
# 287 Ngesikhathi Sokulingwa

   Nges’khathi sok’ lingwa;  Baba ng’ph’amandla; Funa ngikuphike, ngidede kuWe  Nxa ngithengezela ng’bambe ngesandla  Ngothando lwAkho ungavumi ngiwe     
  Ngokuzitika ngingadonswa yizwe  Ububi busa yekile ukung’ bamba  Ngothando lwAkho Baba mangi gcinwe  Kuchithwe izitha kanye nolaka     
  Uma kuvela kuWe inhlupheko  Noma buhlungu bung’phath’ emhlabeni  Vuma ngisibone isandla sAkho  Ngencike kuWe ekuhluphekeni. Amen

title: 288 Into YoKupha uJesu
content:
# 288 Into YoKupha uJesu

   Baleth’ iz’ pho kuJesu, Zabekw’ enyaweni  Ukuthand’ uMsindisi, kwabenza bamuphe  Ngomusa nangamazwi, Nokusiz’ abanye  Konke uyakubala, Kube kuhle kuYe     
 CHORUS  Ulethile kuJesu, Isipho esihle  Wathi, Nans’ inhliziyo! Wayibek’ ezinyaweni     
  Kwaku khon’ isihambi, Esasiqaphele  Iziph’ ezakhishwayo, Zabalwa zabanhle  Sasifisa kakhulu, Ukuleth’ isipho  Kodwa sema eduze, Singena lutho nje     
  Sakhala sathi, Nkosi, ngiyazi unomsa  Thabatha lonk’ okwami, Nenhliziyo embi  U Jesu waphendula, Wath’ Isipho sakho  Sihle kunazo zonke, Ezalethwa kiMi

title: 289 Ngi Thathe Ngi Nje
content:
# 289 Ngi Thathe Ngi Nje

   Jesu Nkosi, ngiyakhala, Nkosi ngisize ngiyafa  Letha ukuphila kwAkho Ungi thathe ngi nje     
 CHORUS  Ngithathe, Nkosi, Ngithathe ngi nje  Sondeza usindiso, Ungithathe ngi nje     
  Ngigcwele izono Jesu, Ngegazi lAkho ngihlanze  Ngokuthanda kwAkho ngenze Ungi thathe ngi nje     
  Emihle imisebenzi Ayikho kimina Nkosi  Ngebizo lAkho ngi size, Ungithathe nje     
  Ngiya guqa kuWe Nkosi, Ngibhek’ enyaweni zAkho  Umsebenzi uqaliwe, Ungithathe ngi nje     
  Nxa uthanda ngisebenze, Ingqondo yikhaliphise  Mina ungisebenzise Ungithathe ngi nje     
  Ukuphela komsebenzi, Nxa seyiphelile impi  Ukukhala kwami koba Nkosi, ng’thathe ngi nje

title: 290 Sebenzela uJesu
content:
# 290 Sebenzela uJesu

   Thaba! Siya sebenzel’ iNkosi Siya vuma ukuyenzela  Konke ekushoyo Yona kithi; Sizo kwenza ngokuphelele     
 CHORUS  Jesu ngaWe-ke! Sizoqhubeka, Ngokuthokoza  U sibusise Emsebenzini wAkho     
  Ngokwenama siyashumayela, Ngothando lwaYo ezizweni  NoJes’ ubukhosi buka; Yise Uzothela izibusiso     
  Ngothuthoba silandel’ iNkosi; Siyahamba ngokuphelela  Siyabaqondisa abeduki, Kulo iWundlu laY’iNkosi

title: 291 Li Fanele iWundlu
content:
# 291 Li Fanele iWundlu

 Lifanele iWundlu! Lifanele iWundlu! Lifanele iWundlu! Lahlatshwa     
CHORUSDumo Aleluya! Mbonge Aleluya!Dumo Aleluya! I Wundlu!     
 Msindisi leth’ umbuso Uzoqeda izono Letha umbuso wAkho oNgcwele!     
 Ingathi singahlala siMthanda, siMdumisa Size sifik’ eZion’ siMbone

title: 292 Izandlana Ezimbili
content:
# 292 Izandlana Ezimbili

  UJesu-ke ngi zoMsebenzela Ngolimi-ke ngizoMbonga; Indletshana zam’ zizokuzwa, Ngizohlabelela ngezwi.     
 CHORUS Nkosi, siyeza-ke, Nxa sise ngabantwana nje Nkosi, siyeza-ke Sifunde ngaWe     
 Ngizohamba endleleni yAkhe, Eya ezulwini lAkhe; Amehlwana azakufunda, Zika Jesu izindaba.     
 Ngizopha uJesu inhliziyo Awusindis’ umphefumlo; Inhlalwana yam’ ngi Mphe yona, Okwami ngokwAkhe kona.

title: 293 Nqonqo! Nqonqo!
content:
# 293 Nqonqo! Nqonqo!

   Nqonqo nqonqo ngubani, Umi umi omuhle  Usihamb’ esinomusa, Kazang’ abonwe onje  Ngaloko mphefumlo wami  Ungeze wavula na? Ungeze wavula na?     
  Nqonqo nqonqo nguJesu, Umi umi omuhle  Isivalo silukhuni, kuthandele ukhula  Lubambe esivalweni  Kunga vulwa kanjani? Kunga vulwa kanjani?     
  Nqonqo nqonqo usemi, Ulindile omuhle  Bon’ isandla sinenxeba, Sabethelelwa wena  Namehlo asalindile   Umvimbele njalo na? Umvimbele njalo na?

title: 294 Yembesa Ngo Kuphila kwAkhe
content:
# 294 Yembesa Ngo Kuphila kwAkhe

 Bheka kuJesu kana sono, Baba ngiph’ ukuphila kwAkhe;Impilo yam’ igcwel’ isono, Ngembes’ impilo yakw’ emhlophe.     
 CHORUS Ngembes’ impilo yakw’ emhlophe, Ngomazi Yena ngokugcwele; Ipmilo yam’ igcwel’ isono, Ngembes’ impilo yakw’ emhlophe.     
   Made amanxeba esono, Ngiyesab’ amabal’ abomvu;   Jesu, ngembes’ impilo yAkho, Ngize ngisind’ ekwahluleni.     
   Ngikhalel’ ukuthethelelwa, Jesu, ngibon’ ‘ingub’ emhlophe;   Ngi ph’eyakho ngi lahla lena, Ngojabula ngihamba naWe.     
   Ngi buyiswa ngokufa kwakho, Ngenziwe nguYe ngaba mhlophe;   Ngi hlanjululwe yizwi lAkhe, Ngi khany’ekubuyeni kwAkhe.

title: 295 Hlabani uMkhosi weMpi
content:
# 295 Hlabani uMkhosi weMpi

   Hlabani umkhosi nas’ isitha; Vusan’ is’miso seNkosi  Hlomani izikhali nonkana, Thembel’ an’ ezwini leNkosi     
 CHORUS   Vukani mabutho, buthanani  Qhubelan’ ilizwi phambili  Hambani nimemeze, Hosana!  uKrestu yiNduna yomkhosi     
  Amandl’ okulwa siyowathola: Sazi ukuthi sonqoba  Isihlangu sethu siyakhanya, Sonqoba ngenxa yokulunga     
  Nkosi ephakamileyo sizwe, Ngomusa wAkho sisize  Nxa impi yonke isiphelile Siyozuza umqhele kuWe

title: 296 Msindisi Ngi Hole
content:
# 296 Msindisi Ngi Hole

   Msindisi ng’hole kahle, Ngi ngeduk’ endleleni  Ngophepha nginga kuWe Ngihleli othandweni     
 CHORUS  Ng’hole, ng’hole, Msindisi ng’hole kahle  Ngomusa ungihole, Ngihole yonk’ indlela     
  Wen’ uyinqaba yami, Kuzo zonk’ iziphepho  Ngosinda nxa ngi kuWe, Wen’ ulithemba lami     
  Msindisi, njalo ng’hole, Phesheya kwenhlupheko  Ngofik’ ezwen’ elihle Laph’ inyembez’ azikho

title: 297 Zibethelw’ Emthini
content:
# 297 Zibethelw’ Emthini

   Kwaba khon’ owavuma ‘kufela mina, Ukuz’ ongafanel’ aphile  Indlela yesiphambano wayihamba, Ezami zaxolelwa zonke     
 CHORUS    Zibethelw’ emthini, Zibethelw’ emthini;    Wezwa ‘buhlung’ obukhulu    U Jesu emthini wakhala ngomunyu Ethwel’ izono zami lapho     
  Kimina unesineke ethandeka, Ehlanzis’ eyam’ inhliziyo  Phinde ngilahlwe sengi nok’ khululeka, Ezam’ zingezi bethelweyo     
  Ngonamathel’ uMsindisi ngingadeli, Ngohamba ngithokoza njalo  Ng’cule ngomlomo nangenhliziyo yami, Ngith’ ezam’ zesuliw’ izono

title: 298 Qha! Okwami, Konke OkwaAkho
content:
# 298 Qha! Okwami, Konke OkwaAkho

   Yek’ ubuhlungu nosizi, Ngihleli nginga kholwa!  Nxa ngisathi kuY’ uJesu; Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho  Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho, Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho  Nxa ngisathi kuY’ uJesu, Konk’ okwam’ qha! okwAkho     
  Noko ngabuya ngabuya, NgaMbon’ efa emthini  Nenhliziyo yathi kuYe, Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe  Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe; Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe  Nenhliziyo yathi kuYe, Nxenye yim’ nxenye nguWe     
  Nsuku zonke wangi ncenga, Ngelashwa ngohlanzeka  Ngehliswa ngazithoba-Ke, Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho  Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho, Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho;   Ngehliswa ngazithoba-Ke Ncan’ okwam’ kun’ okwAkho     
  Luphakeme kunezulu, Lujule kunolwandle  Nkosi, lunqobil’ uthando Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho  Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho, Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho  Nkosi, lunqobil’ uthando Qha! okwam’ konk’ okwAkho

title: 299 Zename Njalo
content:
# 299 Zename Njalo

   Zename njal’ iz’nhliziyo, Kunga ngen’ ukusola  Lok’ uyasinak’ uBaba Es’thanda enomusa     
 CHORUS  Mazename njalo njalo, Sizungezwe kukhanya  Inobuhl’ indlela yemfanelo Sename njalo njalo     
  Siholwa isandla sAkhe, Isono asilutho  Uthembis’ ukusisiza Singaphuth’ isi’ thembiso     
  Uma siyek’ umsebenzi Sizw’ ub’ hlungu bokona  Siya mbozwa-mbo ithunzi! Licime ukwethaba     
  Yek’ injabulo yomsulwa! Ndlela yakh’ imhlophe  Masithath’ iseluleko, Zond’ ok’bi, thand’ okuhle

title: 300 Mphumula Bakhatheleyo
content:
# 300 Mphumula Bakhatheleyo

   Khon’ekhaya labangcwele, Bophumul’ abeNkosi  Bophumul’ abosizi, Bophumul’ abosizi  Waya khona uMsindisi Ukufez’ ufiso lwam’  Ngophumula nam’     
 CHORUS  Ngaphesheya kweJordani, Ensimini yasEden’  Ngasemthini wokuphila, Ngophumula nam     
  Ungilungisele indlu, Eya kuma phakade  Ngoba ngiyohlala njalo, Kulelozwe elihle  Wophumul’ okhathele, Wophumul’ okhathele  Wophumul’ okhathele, Ngophumula nam’     
  Ubuhlungu bungengene, Nosizi luyoxoshwa  Kepha ngoba naw’ umqhele Wokuphila laphaya!  Zophumul’ intandane, Zophumul’ intandane  Zophumul’ intandane, Ngophumula nam’     
  Zindl’ amafa obukhosi, Hubani ngoku nqoba  Amasango ayovulwa Seningen’ ezulwini   Bophumul’ abanqobi, Bophumul’ abanqobi  Bophumul’ abanqobi, Ngophumula nam’?
